query.sql: select /*+ report */ -- session info a.username ora_user, b.spid ora_pid, a.sid ora_sid, a.serial# serial#, round(b.pga_used_mem/1024/1024,3) pga_used_mb, -- client info a.osuser cln_user, a.process cln_pid, a.machine cln_host, SUBSTR(a.program,1,23) prog, -- wait event a.STATE, a.wait_class, a.EVENT event, -- sql info c.sql_id sqlid, c.child_number childnum, plan_hash_value, executions execs, ROUND((elapsed_time/DECODE(NVL(executions,0),0,1,executions))/1000000,2) avg_etime_secs, SUBSTR(sql_text,1,41) FROM v$session a, v$process b, v$sql c WHERE a.status = 'ACTIVE' -- shows only active sessions AND a.username IS NOT NULL -- ignore background processes AND a.paddr = b.addr AND a.sql_id = c.sql_id AND a.sql_child_number = c.child_number AND sql_text NOT LIKE 'select /*+ report */%' -- don't show this query --ORDER BY sql_id, sql_child_number ORDER BY avg_etime_secs DESC

display.name: LMM batch - ETL
display.description: time of completion of FSA reports in 80 days between GTLMMPROC_01 to GTLMMPROC_102 excluding rd Friday

query.sql: ---- time of completion of group 1 reports in one day for one countries select * from ( with switch0 as ( select --scb_country , end_time, reporting_date from scb_job_stats@LNK_GT where reporting_date>=sysdate-:DAYS and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' --and scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --and trim(to_char(reporting_date,'day')) <> 'friday' and job_name ='LMM_ESSBASE_LOAD.CORRECT_TIMEBAND' ) SELECT sjs.reporting_date, round(to_number((s0.end_time-sjs.start_time)*24*60),2) group1_ELAPSED_MINS FROM scb_job_stats@LNK_GT sjs,switch0 s0 where --sjs.scb_country=s0.scb_country sjs.reporting_date=s0.reporting_date --and sjs.scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and upper(sjs.job_name) ='LOADSOURCETABLES.CLEAROLDDATA' and sjs.job_success='Y' and sjs.reporting_date>=sysdate-:DAYS and sjs.reporting_date<=sysdate-1 --and trim(to_char(sjs.reporting_date,'day')) <> 'friday' --group by sjs.scb_country ) res where trim(to_char(res.reporting_date,'day')) <> 'friday' order by 1

SELECT -- session info a.username ora_user, a.osuser os_user, b.spid ora_pid, a.sid SID, a.serial# serial#, ROUND(b.pga_used_mem/1024/1024,3) pga_used_mb, DECODE(a.command, 0,NULL, 1,'CRE TAB', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CRE CLUSTER', 5,'ALT CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DRP CLUSTER', 9,'CRE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALT INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CRE SEQ', 14,'ALT SEQ', 15,'ALT TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQ', 17,'GRANT', 18,'REVOKE', 19,'CRE SYN', 20,'DROP SYN', 21,'CRE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CRE PROC', 25,'ALT PROC', 26,'LOCK TABLE', 28,'RENAME', 29,'COMMENT', 30,'AUDIT', 31,'NOAUDIT', 32,'CRE DBLINK', 33,'DROP DBLINK', 34,'CRE DB', 35,'ALTER DB', 36,'CRE RBS', 37,'ALT RBS', 38,'DROP RBS', 39,'CRE TBLSPC', 40,'ALT TBLSPC', 41,'DROP TBLSPC', 42,'ALT SESSION', 43,'ALT USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXEC', 48,'SET XACTN', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CRE USER', 52,'CRE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CRE SCHEMA', 57,'CRE CTLFILE', 58,'ALTER TRACING', 59,'CRE TRIGGER', 60,'ALT TRIGGER', 61,'DRP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TAB', 63,'ANALYZE IX', 64, 'ANALYZE CLUS', 65,'CRE PROFILE', 66,'DRP PROFILE', 67,'ALT PROFILE', 68,'DRP PROC', 69,'DRP PROC', 70,'ALT RESOURCE', 71,'CRE SNPLOG', 72,'ALT SNPLOG', 73,'DROP SNPLOG', 74,'CREATE SNAP', 75,'ALT SNAP', 76,'DROP SNAP', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 85,'TRUNC TAB', 86,'TRUNC CLUST', 88,'ALT VIEW', 91,'CRE FUNC', 92,'ALT FUNC', 93,'DROP FUNC', 94,'CRE PKG', 95,'ALT PKG', 96,'DROP PKG', 97,'CRE PKG BODY', 98,'ALT PKG BODY', 99,'DRP PKG BODY', TO_CHAR(a.command)) command, -- client info a.osuser cln_user, a.process cln_pid, a.machine cln_host, SUBSTR(a.program,1,23) prog, job, -- wait event a.last_call_et Waits, a.STATE, a.wait_class, a.EVENT event, -- sql info c.sql_id SQL_ID, c.child_number child, plan_hash_value, executions execs, ROUND((elapsed_time/DECODE(NVL(executions,0),0,1,executions))/1000000,2) avg_etime_secs, SUBSTR(sql_text,1,100) FROM v$session a LEFT JOIN dba_jobs_running d ON a.sid = d.sid LEFT JOIN v$sql c ON a.sql_id = c.sql_id AND a.sql_child_number = c.child_number, v$process b WHERE a.paddr = b.addr --AND a.status = 'ACTIVE' -- shows only active sessions --AND a.username IS NOT NULL --and a.osuser='fmdsadm' --AND a.sid != -- ( SELECT DISTINCT sid FROM v$mystat WHERE rownum < 2 -- ) -- don't show this query AND a.sid = :SID ORDER BY waits ASC

display.name: Active SQL
display.description: The Current or last SQL for the selected session
display.tooltip: The Current or last SQL for the selected session

query.sql: select replace(q.SQL_FULLTEXT,chr(0)) sql_text from gv$session s,gv$sql q where s.sql_address = q.address and s.sql_hash_value = q.hash_value and s.sid = :SID

SELECT sp.inst_id, plan_hash_value,LPAD(' ',4*(DEPTH-1))||operation||' '||options ||' '||object_name ||' '||DECODE(id, 0, 'Cost = '||position) "Query Plan",lpad( CASE WHEN cardinality > 1000000 THEN to_char(trunc(cardinality/1000000)) || 'M' WHEN cardinality > 1000 THEN to_char(trunc(cardinality/1000)) || 'K' ELSE cardinality || ' ' END , 6 , ' ' ) AS "Rows" -- nvl(entries,0) as "Rowsource Time" FROM gv$sql_plan sp /*,(select sql_id, sql_exec_id, sql_plan_line_id, sql_plan_hash_value, count(*) entries from v$active_session_history where sql_id = :SQL_ID and sql_exec_id = (select sql_exec_id from v$active_session_history where sql_id = :SQL_ID and rownum=1) group by sql_id, sql_exec_id, sql_plan_line_id, sql_plan_hash_value ) ash WHERE sp.sql_id = :SQL_ID AND ash.sql_id(+) = sp.sql_id AND ash.sql_plan_line_id(+)= sp.id ORDER by sp.plan_hash_value, sp.id */ WHERE sp.sql_id = :SQL_ID order by sp.plan_hash_value,sp.inst_id,sp.child_address,sp.id

SELECT LPAD(' ',4*(DEPTH-1))||operation||' '||options ||' '||object_name ||' '||DECODE(id, 0, 'Cost = '||position) "Query Plan",lpad( CASE WHEN cardinality > 1000000 THEN to_char(trunc(cardinality/1000000)) || 'M' WHEN cardinality > 1000 THEN to_char(trunc(cardinality/1000)) || 'K' ELSE cardinality || ' ' END , 6 , ' ' ) AS "Rows", nvl(entries,0) as "Rowsource Time(s)" FROM gv$sql_plan sp,(select sql_id, sql_exec_id, sql_plan_line_id, sql_plan_hash_value, count(*) entries from gv$active_session_history where sql_id = :SQL_ID and sql_exec_id = (select sql_exec_id from gv$active_session_history where sql_id = :SQL_ID and rownum=1) group by sql_id, sql_exec_id, sql_plan_line_id, sql_plan_hash_value ) ash WHERE sp.sql_id = :SQL_ID AND ash.sql_id(+) = sp.sql_id AND ash.sql_plan_line_id(+)= sp.id ORDER by sp.plan_hash_value, sp.id
select event,p1,p2, case when p3 = 0 then null else p3 end p3 from gv$session_wait where sid = :SID
select s.SID,s.status,s.username,s.process,s.LOGON_TIME, s.logon_time since,s.server,s.type,p.spid,p.TRACEID, s.serial# from gv$session s, gv$process p where sid = :SID and s.paddr = p.addr
select osuser,machine,terminal,CLIENT_INFO,CLIENT_IDENTIFIER from gv$session where sid = :SID

select decode(command, 0,null, 1,'CRE TAB', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CRE CLUSTER', 5,'ALT CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DRP CLUSTER', 9,'CRE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALT INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CRE SEQ', 14,'ALT SEQ', 15,'ALT TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQ', 17,'GRANT', 18,'REVOKE', 19,'CRE SYN', 20,'DROP SYN', 21,'CRE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CRE PROC', 25,'ALT PROC', 26,'LOCK TABLE', 28,'RENAME', 29,'COMMENT', 30,'AUDIT', 31,'NOAUDIT', 32,'CRE DBLINK', 33,'DROP DBLINK', 34,'CRE DB', 35,'ALTER DB', 36,'CRE RBS', 37,'ALT RBS', 38,'DROP RBS', 39,'CRE TBLSPC', 40,'ALT TBLSPC', 41,'DROP TBLSPC', 42,'ALT SESSION', 43,'ALT USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXEC', 48,'SET XACTN', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CRE USER', 52,'CRE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CRE SCHEMA', 57,'CRE CTLFILE', 58,'ALTER TRACING', 59,'CRE TRIGGER', 60,'ALT TRIGGER', 61,'DRP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TAB', 63,'ANALYZE IX', 64,'ANALYZE CLUS', 65,'CRE PROFILE', 66,'DRP PROFILE', 67,'ALT PROFILE', 68,'DRP PROC', 69,'DRP PROC', 70,'ALT RESOURCE', 71,'CRE SNPLOG', 72,'ALT SNPLOG', 73,'DROP SNPLOG', 74,'CREATE SNAP', 75,'ALT SNAP', 76,'DROP SNAP', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 85,'TRUNC TAB', 86,'TRUNC CLUST', 88,'ALT VIEW', 91,'CRE FUNC', 92,'ALT FUNC', 93,'DROP FUNC', 94,'CRE PKG', 95,'ALT PKG', 96,'DROP PKG', 97,'CRE PKG BODY', 98,'ALT PKG BODY', 99,'DRP PKG BODY', to_char(command)) "Command" ,LAST_CALL_ET,program,module,action from gv$session where sid = :SID

with locks as( select session_id,lock_type, mode_held,mode_requested,lock_id1,lock_id2,blocking_others from sys.dba_lock), waiters as ( select w.session_id waiting_session, h.session_id holding_session, w.lock_type lock_type, h.mode_held mode_held, w.mode_requested mode_requested, w.lock_id1, w.lock_id2 from locks w, locks h where h.blocking_others = 'Blocking' and h.mode_held != 'None' and h.mode_held != 'Null' and w.mode_requested != 'None' and w.lock_type = h.lock_type and w.lock_id1 = h.lock_id1 and w.lock_id2 = h.lock_id2 and (w.session_id = :SID or h.session_id = :SID)), blockers as( select holding_session waiting_session, to_number(null) holding_session, 'None' lock_type, null mode_held, null mode_requested, null lock_id1, null lock_id2 from waiters minus select waiting_session waiting_session, to_number(null) holding_session, 'None' lock_type, null mode_held, null mode_requested, null lock_id1, null lock_id2 from waiters), waiters_blockers as( select waiting_session,holding_session,lock_type,mode_held,mode_requested,lock_id1,lock_id2 from waiters union all select waiting_session,holding_session,lock_type,mode_held,mode_requested,lock_id1,lock_id2 from blockers), lock_objects as( select session_id,cnt lock_obj_count, case when cnt = 1 then object_name else null end object_name, object_id,owner,object_type from( select session_id,count(distinct object_name) cnt,max(object_name) object_name, max(lo.object_id) object_id, max(ao.owner) owner,max(object_type) object_type from gv$locked_object lo,all_objects ao,waiters_blockers wb where lo.object_id = ao.object_id and (wb.waiting_session = lo.session_id or wb.holding_session = lo.session_id) group by session_id)), wait_block_ses as( select waiting_session,holding_session,lock_type,mode_held,mode_requested, s.username,s.osuser,s.CLIENT_INFO,s.CLIENT_IDENTIFIER,o.object_name,o.owner,o.object_id,module,o.object_type,o.lock_obj_count, decode(s.command, 0,null, 1,'CRE TAB', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CRE CLUSTER', 5,'ALT CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DRP CLUSTER', 9,'CRE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALT INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CRE SEQ', 14,'ALT SEQ', 15,'ALT TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQ', 17,'GRANT', 18,'REVOKE', 19,'CRE SYN', 20,'DROP SYN', 21,'CRE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CRE PROC', 25,'ALT PROC', 26,'LOCK TABLE', 28,'RENAME', 29,'COMMENT', 30,'AUDIT', 31,'NOAUDIT', 32,'CRE DBLINK', 33,'DROP DBLINK', 34,'CRE DB', 35,'ALTER DB', 36,'CRE RBS', 37,'ALT RBS', 38,'DROP RBS', 39,'CRE TBLSPC', 40,'ALT TBLSPC', 41,'DROP TBLSPC', 42,'ALT SESSION', 43,'ALT USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXEC', 48,'SET XACTN', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CRE USER', 52,'CRE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CRE SCHEMA', 57,'CRE CTLFILE', 58,'ALTER TRACING', 59,'CRE TRIGGER', 60,'ALT TRIGGER', 61,'DRP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TAB', 63,'ANALYZE IX', 64,'ANALYZE CLUS', 65,'CRE PROFILE', 66,'DRP PROFILE', 67,'ALT PROFILE', 68,'DRP PROC', 69,'DRP PROC', 70,'ALT RESOURCE', 71,'CRE SNPLOG', 72,'ALT SNPLOG', 73,'DROP SNPLOG', 74,'CREATE SNAP', 75,'ALT SNAP', 76,'DROP SNAP', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 85,'TRUNC TAB', 86,'TRUNC CLUST', 88,'ALT VIEW', 91,'CRE FUNC', 92,'ALT FUNC', 93,'DROP FUNC', 94,'CRE PKG', 95,'ALT PKG', 96,'DROP PKG', 97,'CRE PKG BODY', 98,'ALT PKG BODY', 99,'DRP PKG BODY', to_char(s.command)) command from waiters_blockers wb, gv$session s, lock_objects o where s.sid = wb.waiting_session and o.session_id(+) = wb.waiting_session ) select case when holding_session is null then 'Lock' else 'Lock Waiting' end status, waiting_session, username, object_name, object_id,owner,object_type from wait_block_ses start with holding_session is null connect by prior waiting_session = holding_session

SELECT TRUNC(sl.elapsed_seconds/60) || ':' || MOD(sl.elapsed_seconds,60) elapsed, TRUNC(sl.time_remaining/60) || ':' || MOD(sl.time_remaining,60) remaining, ROUND(sl.sofar/sl.totalwork*100, 2) progress_pct, inst_id FROM gv$session_longops sl WHERE sql_id =:SQL_ID AND time_remaining > 0
SELECT 'ALTER SYSTEM KILL SESSION '''||v.SID||','||v.SERIAL#||''' IMMEDIATE;' as sql_st FROM V$SESSION v WHERE v.sid = :SID AND v.STATUS='ACTIVE'

display.name: 2 ALM job status - all jobs 1 country - UVT
display.description: Display Dispaly ALM batch job status - average of single job in 30 days

query.sql: -- max, min and average of last 30 days SELECT scb_country COUNTRYNAME, JOB_NAME JOBNAME, Round(avg(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS) / 60, 0) AS avg_Mins FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where --scb_country=UPPER(:COUNTRY) --scb_country=trim(UPPER(:COUNTRY)) scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --and job_name = 'scb_exec_alm_process' and reporting_date>=sysdate-91 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' group by job_name,scb_country order by 3 desc

display.name: Job Stats
display.description: Dispaly ALM batch job status - single job in 30 days

query.sql: SELECT REPORTING_DATE, Round(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) AS ELAPSED_Mins FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where scb_country=:COUNTRYNAME and job_name in (:JOBNAME) and reporting_date>=sysdate-361 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' order by REPORTING_DATE

display.name: 2 ALM job status - group 1 drilldown - UVT

query.sql: -- drilldown of group 1 report timing with rbau as (SELECT reporting_date, --start_time stime end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and lower(job_name) = 'scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_rep_load_rbau' and reporting_date>=sysdate-61 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' ), C1e as (SELECT reporting_date, end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --and (lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_parallel' --or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_fermat_check_errors' --or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_tables') and ( ( scb_country in ('VN','BD','NP','PH','LK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','GH') and lower(job_name) = 'pack_scb_data_adjustment.scb_common_data_adjustments') or ( scb_country not in ('VN','BD','NP','PH','LK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','GH') and (lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_parallel' or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_fermat_check_errors') ) ) and reporting_date>=sysdate-61 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' ), C2e as (SELECT reporting_date, end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and lower(job_name) = 'scb_exec_alm_process' and reporting_date>=sysdate-61 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' ) SELECT c0.scb_country COUNTRY, --c0.reporting_date, to_char(c0.reporting_date,'YYYYMMDD') rdate, --c0.reporting_date RD, to_char(c0.start_time+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') etl_start_time_SGT, to_char(c1e.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') etl_end_time_SGT, round((c1e.etime-c0.start_time)*24*60,0) ETL_mins, to_char(c2e.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') bau_end_time_SGT, round((c2e.etime-c1e.etime)*24*60,0) BAU_mins, to_char(rbau.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') rbau_end_time_SGT, round((rbau.etime-c2e.etime)*24*60,0) RBAU_mins, round((rbau.etime-c0.start_time)*24*60,0) group1_total_mins, c0.reporting_date RD FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats c0 left join rbau on c0.reporting_date=rbau.reporting_date left join c1e on c0.reporting_date=c1e.reporting_date left join c2e on c0.reporting_date=c2e.reporting_date where c0.scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and c0.job_name = 'init_scb_cpy_ext_table_data' --and c0.reporting_date='05-Sep-16' --and c0.reporting_date=rbau.reporting_date --and c0.reporting_date=c1e.reporting_date --and c0.reporting_date=c2e.reporting_date and c0.reporting_date>=sysdate-61 and c0.reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and c0.job_success='Y' order by c0.reporting_date desc

with s0 as ( -- max, min and average of last 7 days SELECT scb_country, JOB_NAME, Round(avg(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS) / 60, 2) AS avg_Mins FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where scb_country=:COUNTRY --and job_name = '&job' and reporting_date>=sysdate-361 and reporting_date<sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' group by scb_country,job_name order by scb_country,job_name ) SELECT sjs.REPORTING_DATE, sjs.SCB_COUNTRY, sjs.JOB_NAME, CASE WHEN lower(sjs.job_name) = 'init_scb_cpy_ext_table_data' THEN 'ETL started' WHEN (sjs.scb_country in ('VN','BD','NP','PH','LK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','GH') and lower(sjs.job_name) = 'pack_scb_data_adjustment.scb_common_data_adjustments') THEN 'ETL completed' WHEN (sjs.scb_country not in ('VN','BD','NP','PH','LK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','GH') and (lower(sjs.job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_parallel' or lower(sjs.job_name) = 'init_scb_fermat_check_errors')) THEN 'ETL completed' WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'INIT_DASH_CPY_STG_DATA' THEN 'BAU started' WHEN lower(sjs.job_name) = 'scb_exec_alm_process' THEN 'BAU completed' WHEN lower(sjs.job_name) = 'scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_rep_load_rbau' THEN 'Group1 completed' WHEN lower(sjs.job_name) = 'scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_rep_load_rliq' THEN 'Group2 completed' WHEN lower(sjs.job_name) = 'scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_batch_end' THEN 'Group3 completed' WHEN lower(sjs.job_name) = 'scb_context_drop' THEN 'All completed' END stage, sjs.START_TIME, sjs.END_TIME, sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS, ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) AS ELAPSED_Mins, case when ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) > ROUND(s0.avg_Mins*1.1,2) then '>'||to_char(s0.avg_Mins) --when ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) <= s0.avg_Mins --else --to_char(s0.avg_Mins) end avg_Mins FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats sjs, s0 WHERE sjs.scb_country =:COUNTRY and sjs.scb_country=s0.scb_country and sjs.job_name=s0.job_name AND sjs.reporting_date=:RD AND sjs.job_success ='Y' AND (lower(sjs.job_name)<>'ins_scb_file_stats') ORDER BY sjs.start_time

display.name: 1 RAY job graph - 1 job all countries
display.description: time of completion of single job in 30 days for all countries

query.sql: SELECT scb_country COUNTRYNAME, --JOB_NAME JOBNAME, Round(avg(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS) / 60, 0) AS avg_Mins FROM fmtrpt_b3l_prod.SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS where reporting_date>=sysdate-11 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_name like '%CREATE_CONTEXT%' and job_status='Y' AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) group by scb_country,job_name order by 2 desc

SELECT -- session info a.inst_id INST_ID, a.username ora_user, a.osuser os_user, a.status, a.sid SID, a.serial# serial#, DECODE(a.command, 0,NULL, 1,'CRE TAB', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CRE CLUSTER', 5,'ALT CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DRP CLUSTER', 9,'CRE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALT INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CRE SEQ', 14,'ALT SEQ', 15,'ALT TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQ', 17,'GRANT', 18,'REVOKE', 19,'CRE SYN', 20,'DROP SYN', 21,'CRE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CRE PROC', 25,'ALT PROC', 26,'LOCK TABLE', 28,'RENAME', 29,'COMMENT', 30,'AUDIT', 31,'NOAUDIT', 32,'CRE DBLINK', 33,'DROP DBLINK', 34,'CRE DB', 35,'ALTER DB', 36,'CRE RBS', 37,'ALT RBS', 38,'DROP RBS', 39,'CRE TBLSPC', 40,'ALT TBLSPC', 41,'DROP TBLSPC', 42,'ALT SESSION', 43,'ALT USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXEC', 48,'SET XACTN', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CRE USER', 52,'CRE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CRE SCHEMA', 57,'CRE CTLFILE', 58,'ALTER TRACING', 59,'CRE TRIGGER', 60,'ALT TRIGGER', 61,'DRP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TAB', 63,'ANALYZE IX', 64, 'ANALYZE CLUS', 65,'CRE PROFILE', 66,'DRP PROFILE', 67,'ALT PROFILE', 68,'DRP PROC', 69,'DRP PROC', 70,'ALT RESOURCE', 71,'CRE SNPLOG', 72,'ALT SNPLOG', 73,'DROP SNPLOG', 74,'CREATE SNAP', 75,'ALT SNAP', 76,'DROP SNAP', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 85,'TRUNC TAB', 86,'TRUNC CLUST', 88,'ALT VIEW', 91,'CRE FUNC', 92,'ALT FUNC', 93,'DROP FUNC', 94,'CRE PKG', 95,'ALT PKG', 96,'DROP PKG', 97,'CRE PKG BODY', 98,'ALT PKG BODY', 99,'DRP PKG BODY', TO_CHAR(a.command)) command, -- client info a.osuser cln_user, a.process cln_pid, a.machine cln_host, SUBSTR(a.program,1,23) prog, d.job, --ds.what job_name, -- wait event
a.STATE, a.wait_class, a.EVENT event, -- sql info c.sql_id SQL_ID, c.child_number child, plan_hash_value, executions execs, a.last_call_et Waits, ROUND((elapsed_time/DECODE(NVL(executions,0),0,1,executions))/1000000,2) avg_etime_secs, SUBSTR(sql_text,1,100) FROM gv$session a LEFT JOIN dba_jobs_running d ON a.sid = d.sid --LEFT JOIN dba_jobs ds --on d.job=ds.job LEFT JOIN gv$sql c ON a.sql_id = c.sql_id and a.inst_id=c.INST_ID AND a.sql_child_number = c.child_number WHERE a.status = 'ACTIVE' -- shows only active sessions --AND a.username = 'RAY2_GBL_PROD' and a.inst_id=:INSTANCE_ID --and a.username is not null AND a.username = 'RAY2_GBL_PROD' --AND a.username = 'GTF_PROD' --AND a.username = 'FMTALM_SG_PROD' --and a.inst_id=2 --and a.sid=:SID --and a.sid=948 --and a.event <> 'Streams AQ: waiting for messages in the queue' and a.osuser <>'1509991' --and a.sid=:sid --and a.osuser='fmdsadm' --AND a.sid != -- ( SELECT DISTINCT sid FROM gv$mystat WHERE rownum < 2 -- ) -- don't show this query ORDER BY waits

display.name: Active SQL
display.description: The Current or last SQL for the selected session
display.tooltip: The Current or last SQL for the selected session

query.sql: select replace(q.SQL_FULLTEXT,chr(0)) sql_text from gv$session s,gv$sql q where s.sql_address = q.address and s.sql_hash_value = q.hash_value and s.inst_id=q.inst_id and s.sid = :SID and a.inst_id=:INST_ID

SELECT plan_hash_value,LPAD(' ',4*(DEPTH-1))||operation||' '||options ||' '||object_name ||' '||DECODE(id, 0, 'Cost = '||position) "Query Plan",lpad( CASE WHEN cardinality > 1000000 THEN to_char(trunc(cardinality/1000000)) || 'M' WHEN cardinality > 1000 THEN to_char(trunc(cardinality/1000)) || 'K' ELSE cardinality || ' ' END , 6 , ' ' ) AS "Rows" -- nvl(entries,0) as "Rowsource Time" FROM v$sql_plan sp /*,(select sql_id, sql_exec_id, sql_plan_line_id, sql_plan_hash_value, count(*) entries from v$active_session_history where sql_id = :SQL_ID and sql_exec_id = (select sql_exec_id from v$active_session_history where sql_id = :SQL_ID and rownum=1) group by sql_id, sql_exec_id, sql_plan_line_id, sql_plan_hash_value ) ash WHERE sp.sql_id = :SQL_ID AND ash.sql_id(+) = sp.sql_id AND ash.sql_plan_line_id(+)= sp.id ORDER by sp.plan_hash_value, sp.id */ WHERE sp.sql_id = :SQL_ID order by sp.plan_hash_value,sp.child_address,sp.id

SELECT LPAD(' ',4*(DEPTH-1))||operation||' '||options ||' '||object_name ||' '||DECODE(id, 0, 'Cost = '||position) "Query Plan",lpad( CASE WHEN cardinality > 1000000 THEN to_char(trunc(cardinality/1000000)) || 'M' WHEN cardinality > 1000 THEN to_char(trunc(cardinality/1000)) || 'K' ELSE cardinality || ' ' END , 6 , ' ' ) AS "Rows", nvl(entries,0) as "Rowsource Time(s)" FROM v$sql_plan sp,(select sql_id, sql_exec_id, sql_plan_line_id, sql_plan_hash_value, count(*) entries from v$active_session_history where sql_id = :SQL_ID and sql_exec_id = (select sql_exec_id from v$active_session_history where sql_id = :SQL_ID and rownum=1) group by sql_id, sql_exec_id, sql_plan_line_id, sql_plan_hash_value ) ash WHERE sp.sql_id = :SQL_ID AND ash.sql_id(+) = sp.sql_id AND ash.sql_plan_line_id(+)= sp.id ORDER by sp.plan_hash_value, sp.id
select event,p1,p2, case when p3 = 0 then null else p3 end p3 from gv$session_wait where sid = :SID and inst_id=:INST_ID

select s.SID,s.status,s.username,s.process,s.LOGON_TIME, s.logon_time since,s.server,s.type,p.spid,p.TRACEID, s.serial# from gv$session s, gv$process p where sid = :SID and s.paddr = p.addr and s.inst_id=p.inst_id and s.inst_id=:INST_ID
select osuser,machine,terminal,CLIENT_INFO,CLIENT_IDENTIFIER from gv$session where sid = :SID and inst_id=:INST_ID

select decode(command, 0,null, 1,'CRE TAB', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CRE CLUSTER', 5,'ALT CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DRP CLUSTER', 9,'CRE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALT INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CRE SEQ', 14,'ALT SEQ', 15,'ALT TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQ', 17,'GRANT', 18,'REVOKE', 19,'CRE SYN', 20,'DROP SYN', 21,'CRE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CRE PROC', 25,'ALT PROC', 26,'LOCK TABLE', 28,'RENAME', 29,'COMMENT', 30,'AUDIT', 31,'NOAUDIT', 32,'CRE DBLINK', 33,'DROP DBLINK', 34,'CRE DB', 35,'ALTER DB', 36,'CRE RBS', 37,'ALT RBS', 38,'DROP RBS', 39,'CRE TBLSPC', 40,'ALT TBLSPC', 41,'DROP TBLSPC', 42,'ALT SESSION', 43,'ALT USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXEC', 48,'SET XACTN', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CRE USER', 52,'CRE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CRE SCHEMA', 57,'CRE CTLFILE', 58,'ALTER TRACING', 59,'CRE TRIGGER', 60,'ALT TRIGGER', 61,'DRP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TAB', 63,'ANALYZE IX', 64,'ANALYZE CLUS', 65,'CRE PROFILE', 66,'DRP PROFILE', 67,'ALT PROFILE', 68,'DRP PROC', 69,'DRP PROC', 70,'ALT RESOURCE', 71,'CRE SNPLOG', 72,'ALT SNPLOG', 73,'DROP SNPLOG', 74,'CREATE SNAP', 75,'ALT SNAP', 76,'DROP SNAP', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 85,'TRUNC TAB', 86,'TRUNC CLUST', 88,'ALT VIEW', 91,'CRE FUNC', 92,'ALT FUNC', 93,'DROP FUNC', 94,'CRE PKG', 95,'ALT PKG', 96,'DROP PKG', 97,'CRE PKG BODY', 98,'ALT PKG BODY', 99,'DRP PKG BODY', to_char(command)) "Command" ,LAST_CALL_ET,program,module,action from gv$session where sid = :SID

with locks as( select session_id,lock_type, mode_held,mode_requested,lock_id1,lock_id2,blocking_others from sys.dba_lock), waiters as ( select w.session_id waiting_session, h.session_id holding_session, w.lock_type lock_type, h.mode_held mode_held, w.mode_requested mode_requested, w.lock_id1, w.lock_id2 from locks w, locks h where h.blocking_others = 'Blocking' and h.mode_held != 'None' and h.mode_held != 'Null' and w.mode_requested != 'None' and w.lock_type = h.lock_type and w.lock_id1 = h.lock_id1 and w.lock_id2 = h.lock_id2 and (w.session_id = :SID or h.session_id = :SID)), blockers as( select holding_session waiting_session, to_number(null) holding_session, 'None' lock_type, null mode_held, null mode_requested, null lock_id1, null lock_id2 from waiters minus select waiting_session waiting_session, to_number(null) holding_session, 'None' lock_type, null mode_held, null mode_requested, null lock_id1, null lock_id2 from waiters), waiters_blockers as( select waiting_session,holding_session,lock_type,mode_held,mode_requested,lock_id1,lock_id2 from waiters union all select waiting_session,holding_session,lock_type,mode_held,mode_requested,lock_id1,lock_id2 from blockers), lock_objects as( select session_id,cnt lock_obj_count, case when cnt = 1 then object_name else null end object_name, object_id,owner,object_type from( select session_id,count(distinct object_name) cnt,max(object_name) object_name, max(lo.object_id) object_id, max(ao.owner) owner,max(object_type) object_type from gv$locked_object lo,all_objects ao,waiters_blockers wb where lo.object_id = ao.object_id and (wb.waiting_session = lo.session_id or wb.holding_session = lo.session_id) group by session_id)), wait_block_ses as( select waiting_session,holding_session,lock_type,mode_held,mode_requested, s.username,s.osuser,s.CLIENT_INFO,s.CLIENT_IDENTIFIER,o.object_name,o.owner,o.object_id,module,o.object_type,o.lock_obj_count, decode(s.command, 0,null, 1,'CRE TAB', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CRE CLUSTER', 5,'ALT CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DRP CLUSTER', 9,'CRE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALT INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CRE SEQ', 14,'ALT SEQ', 15,'ALT TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQ', 17,'GRANT', 18,'REVOKE', 19,'CRE SYN', 20,'DROP SYN', 21,'CRE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CRE PROC', 25,'ALT PROC', 26,'LOCK TABLE', 28,'RENAME', 29,'COMMENT', 30,'AUDIT', 31,'NOAUDIT', 32,'CRE DBLINK', 33,'DROP DBLINK', 34,'CRE DB', 35,'ALTER DB', 36,'CRE RBS', 37,'ALT RBS', 38,'DROP RBS', 39,'CRE TBLSPC', 40,'ALT TBLSPC', 41,'DROP TBLSPC', 42,'ALT SESSION', 43,'ALT USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXEC', 48,'SET XACTN', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CRE USER', 52,'CRE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CRE SCHEMA', 57,'CRE CTLFILE', 58,'ALTER TRACING', 59,'CRE TRIGGER', 60,'ALT TRIGGER', 61,'DRP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TAB', 63,'ANALYZE IX', 64,'ANALYZE CLUS', 65,'CRE PROFILE', 66,'DRP PROFILE', 67,'ALT PROFILE', 68,'DRP PROC', 69,'DRP PROC', 70,'ALT RESOURCE', 71,'CRE SNPLOG', 72,'ALT SNPLOG', 73,'DROP SNPLOG', 74,'CREATE SNAP', 75,'ALT SNAP', 76,'DROP SNAP', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 85,'TRUNC TAB', 86,'TRUNC CLUST', 88,'ALT VIEW', 91,'CRE FUNC', 92,'ALT FUNC', 93,'DROP FUNC', 94,'CRE PKG', 95,'ALT PKG', 96,'DROP PKG', 97,'CRE PKG BODY', 98,'ALT PKG BODY', 99,'DRP PKG BODY', to_char(s.command)) command from waiters_blockers wb, v$session s, lock_objects o where s.sid = wb.waiting_session and o.session_id(+) = wb.waiting_session ) select case when holding_session is null then 'Lock' else 'Lock Waiting' end status, waiting_session, username, object_name, object_id,owner,object_type from wait_block_ses start with holding_session is null connect by prior waiting_session = holding_session

SELECT TRUNC(sl.elapsed_seconds/60) || ':' || MOD(sl.elapsed_seconds,60) elapsed, TRUNC(sl.time_remaining/60) || ':' || MOD(sl.time_remaining,60) remaining, ROUND(sl.sofar/sl.totalwork*100, 2) progress_pct FROM gv$session_longops sl WHERE sql_id =:SQL_ID and inst_id=:INST_ID AND time_remaining > 0
SELECT 'ALTER SYSTEM KILL SESSION '''||v.SID||','||v.SERIAL#||''' IMMEDIATE;' as sql_st FROM V$SESSION v WHERE v.sid = :SID AND v.STATUS='ACTIVE'

-- temp space and memory usage SELECT s.sid,s.serial#, s.sql_id, operation_id, w.operation_type, ROUND(w.actual_mem_used/1024/1024,2) mem_mb, ROUND(w.tempseg_size /1024/1024,2) temp_mb, w.TABLESPACE temp_tbs FROM v$session s, v$sql_workarea_active w WHERE s.sid =w.sid AND TABLESPACE IS NOT NULL --and s.status='ACTIVE' and S.SID=:SID ORDER BY 1

select to_char(trunc(a.end_time,'MI'),'HH24:MI') end_time, b.wait_class wait_class, round((sum(a.time_waited) / 10),2) sample_count from gv$waitclassmetric_history a, gv$system_wait_class b where a.wait_class# = b.wait_class# and b.wait_class != 'Idle' and a.inst_id = b.inst_id group by trunc(a.end_time,'MI'), b.wait_class order by trunc(a.end_time,'MI'),2

with sod as (SELECT reporting_date, scb_country, start_time stime, end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where (lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_cpy_ext_table_data' or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_cpy_ext_table_data_ts') --and reporting_date=to_date(:RDATE,'yyyymmdd') and (reporting_date between to_date(:RDATE1,'yyyymmdd') and sysdate) and job_success='Y' AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) ), ce as (SELECT reporting_date, scb_country, start_time stime, end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where ( (scb_country in ('VN','BD','NP','PH','LK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','GH') and lower(job_name) = 'pack_scb_data_adjustment.scb_common_data_adjustments') or (scb_country in ('KR') and lower(job_name) = 'pack_cust_process.cust_adj_time_series') or ( scb_country not in ('VN','BD','NP','PH','LK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','GH','KR') and (lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_parallel' or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_fermat_check_errors' or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_tables') ) AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) ) --and reporting_date=to_date(:RDATE,'yyyymmdd') and (reporting_date between to_date(:RDATE1,'yyyymmdd') and sysdate) and job_success='Y' ) select c0.reporting_date,c0.scb_country,round(sum(c0.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS)/60,2) mins FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats c0 left join ce on c0.reporting_date=ce.reporting_date and c0.scb_country=ce.scb_country left join sod on c0.reporting_date=sod.reporting_date and c0.scb_country=sod.scb_country where (c0.reporting_date between to_date(:RDATE1,'yyyymmdd') and sysdate) and c0.job_success='Y' and (c0.scb_country=sod.scb_country and c0.reporting_date=sod.reporting_date and c0.start_time>=sod.stime) and (c0.scb_country=ce.scb_country and c0.reporting_date=ce.reporting_date and c0.end_time<=ce.etime) --and c0.scb_country in ('HK','MY','EU','SG') and c0.scb_country=:COUNTRY AND ( (c0.scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (c0.scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (c0.scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (c0.scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) group by c0.reporting_date,c0.scb_country order by 1,2

display.name: 2 ALM job status - all jobs 1 country
display.description: Display Dispaly ALM batch job status - average of single job in 30 days

query.sql: -- max, min and average of last 30 days SELECT scb_country COUNTRYNAME, JOB_NAME JOBNAME, Round(avg(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS) / 60, 0) AS avg_Mins FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where --scb_country=UPPER(:COUNTRY) --scb_country=trim(UPPER(:COUNTRY)) scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --and job_name = 'scb_exec_alm_process' and reporting_date>=sysdate-91 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) group by job_name,scb_country order by 3 desc

display.name: Job Stats
display.description: Dispaly ALM batch job status - single job in 30 days

query.sql: SELECT REPORTING_DATE, Round(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) AS ELAPSED_Mins FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where scb_country=:COUNTRYNAME and job_name in (:JOBNAME) and reporting_date>=sysdate-361 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) --OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US')) ) order by REPORTING_DATE

select inst_id,program,module,event,SQL_ID,machine, lpad( to_char( trunc(24*(sysdate-s.logon_time)) ) || to_char(trunc(sysdate) + (sysdate-s.logon_time) , ':MI:SS' ) , 10, ' ') AS UP_time from gv$session s where type!='BACKGROUND' and status='ACTIVE' and sql_id is not null

select inst_id, (cpu_time/1000000) "CPU_Seconds", disk_reads "Disk_Reads", buffer_gets "Buffer_Gets", executions "Executions", case when rows_processed = 0 then null else round((buffer_gets/nvl(replace(rows_processed,0,1),1))) end "Buffer_gets/rows_proc", round((buffer_gets/nvl(replace(executions,0,1),1))) "Buffer_gets/executions", (elapsed_time/1000000) "Elapsed_Seconds", substr(sql_text,1,500) "SQL", module "Module",sql_id from gv$sql s where sql_id =:SQL_ID

SELECT sp.inst_id, plan_hash_value,LPAD(' ',4*(DEPTH-1))||operation||' '||options ||' '||object_name ||' '||DECODE(id, 0, 'Cost = '||position) "Query Plan",lpad( CASE WHEN cardinality > 1000000 THEN to_char(trunc(cardinality/1000000)) || 'M' WHEN cardinality > 1000 THEN to_char(trunc(cardinality/1000)) || 'K' ELSE cardinality || ' ' END , 6 , ' ' ) AS "Rows" -- nvl(entries,0) as "Rowsource Time" FROM gv$sql_plan sp /*,(select sql_id, sql_exec_id, sql_plan_line_id, sql_plan_hash_value, count(*) entries from v$active_session_history where sql_id = :SQL_ID and sql_exec_id = (select sql_exec_id from v$active_session_history where sql_id = :SQL_ID and rownum=1) group by sql_id, sql_exec_id, sql_plan_line_id, sql_plan_hash_value ) ash WHERE sp.sql_id = :SQL_ID AND ash.sql_id(+) = sp.sql_id AND ash.sql_plan_line_id(+)= sp.id ORDER by sp.plan_hash_value, sp.id */ WHERE sp.sql_id = :SQL_ID and sp.inst_id=:INST_ID order by sp.plan_hash_value,sp.inst_id,sp.child_address,sp.id

SELECT LPAD(' ',4*(DEPTH-1))||operation||' '||options ||' '||object_name ||' '||DECODE(id, 0, 'Cost = '||position) "Query Plan",lpad( CASE WHEN cardinality > 1000000 THEN to_char(trunc(cardinality/1000000)) || 'M' WHEN cardinality > 1000 THEN to_char(trunc(cardinality/1000)) || 'K' ELSE cardinality || ' ' END , 6 , ' ' ) AS "Rows", nvl(entries,0) as "Rowsource Time(s)" FROM gv$sql_plan sp,(select sql_id, sql_exec_id, sql_plan_line_id, sql_plan_hash_value, count(*) entries from gv$active_session_history where sql_id = :SQL_ID and sql_exec_id = (select sql_exec_id from gv$active_session_history where sql_id = :SQL_ID and rownum=1) group by sql_id, sql_exec_id, sql_plan_line_id, sql_plan_hash_value ) ash WHERE sp.sql_id = :SQL_ID AND ash.sql_id(+) = sp.sql_id AND ash.sql_plan_line_id(+)= sp.id ORDER by sp.plan_hash_value, sp.id

select inst_id, position,datatype_string,value_string value,sql_id, to_char(last_captured,'hh:MI:SS') from gv$sql_bind_capture where last_captured is not null and sql_id=:SQL_ID order by last_captured,position

SELECT TRUNC(sl.elapsed_seconds/60) || ':' || MOD(sl.elapsed_seconds,60) elapsed, TRUNC(sl.time_remaining/60) || ':' || MOD(sl.time_remaining,60) remaining, ROUND(sl.sofar/sl.totalwork*100, 2) progress_pct, inst_id FROM gv$session_longops sl WHERE sql_id =:SQL_ID AND time_remaining > 0

SELECT -- session info a.username ora_user, a.osuser os_user, b.spid ora_pid, a.sid SID, a.serial# serial#, ROUND(b.pga_used_mem/1024/1024,3) pga_used_mb, DECODE(a.command, 0,NULL, 1,'CRE TAB', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CRE CLUSTER', 5,'ALT CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DRP CLUSTER', 9,'CRE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALT INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CRE SEQ', 14,'ALT SEQ', 15,'ALT TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQ', 17,'GRANT', 18,'REVOKE', 19,'CRE SYN', 20,'DROP SYN', 21,'CRE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CRE PROC', 25,'ALT PROC', 26,'LOCK TABLE', 28,'RENAME', 29,'COMMENT', 30,'AUDIT', 31,'NOAUDIT', 32,'CRE DBLINK', 33,'DROP DBLINK', 34,'CRE DB', 35,'ALTER DB', 36,'CRE RBS', 37,'ALT RBS', 38,'DROP RBS', 39,'CRE TBLSPC', 40,'ALT TBLSPC', 41,'DROP TBLSPC', 42,'ALT SESSION', 43,'ALT USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXEC', 48,'SET XACTN', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CRE USER', 52,'CRE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CRE SCHEMA', 57,'CRE CTLFILE', 58,'ALTER TRACING', 59,'CRE TRIGGER', 60,'ALT TRIGGER', 61,'DRP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TAB', 63,'ANALYZE IX', 64, 'ANALYZE CLUS', 65,'CRE PROFILE', 66,'DRP PROFILE', 67,'ALT PROFILE', 68,'DRP PROC', 69,'DRP PROC', 70,'ALT RESOURCE', 71,'CRE SNPLOG', 72,'ALT SNPLOG', 73,'DROP SNPLOG', 74,'CREATE SNAP', 75,'ALT SNAP', 76,'DROP SNAP', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 85,'TRUNC TAB', 86,'TRUNC CLUST', 88,'ALT VIEW', 91,'CRE FUNC', 92,'ALT FUNC', 93,'DROP FUNC', 94,'CRE PKG', 95,'ALT PKG', 96,'DROP PKG', 97,'CRE PKG BODY', 98,'ALT PKG BODY', 99,'DRP PKG BODY', TO_CHAR(a.command)) command, -- client info a.osuser cln_user, a.process cln_pid, a.machine cln_host, SUBSTR(a.program,1,23) prog, d.job, ds.what job_name, a.action, -- wait event a.STATE, a.wait_class, a.EVENT event, -- sql info c.sql_id SQL_ID, c.child_number child, plan_hash_value, executions execs, a.last_call_et Waits, ROUND((elapsed_time/DECODE(NVL(executions,0),0,1,executions))/1000000,2) avg_etime_secs, SUBSTR(sql_text,1,100) FROM v$session a LEFT JOIN dba_jobs_running d ON a.sid = d.sid LEFT JOIN dba_jobs ds on d.job=ds.job LEFT JOIN v$sql c ON a.sql_id = c.sql_id AND a.sql_child_number = c.child_number, v$process b WHERE a.paddr = b.addr AND a.status = 'ACTIVE' -- shows only active sessions --and a.event <> 'Streams AQ: waiting for messages in the queue' --AND a.username IS NOT NULL AND a.username = :USERNAME --and a.osuser='fmdsadm' AND a.sid != ( SELECT DISTINCT sid FROM v$mystat WHERE rownum < 2 ) -- don't show this query ORDER BY waits ASC
