query.sql: select TABLESPACE_NAME "Tablespace", BLOCK_SIZE "Block_Size", INITIAL_EXTENT "Initial_Extent", NEXT_EXTENT "Next_Extent", MIN_EXTENTS "Minimum_Extents", MAX_EXTENTS "Maximum_Extents", PCT_INCREASE "Percent_Increase", MIN_EXTLEN "Minimum_Extent_Length", STATUS "Status", CONTENTS "Contents", LOGGING "Logging", FORCE_LOGGING "Force_Logging", EXTENT_MANAGEMENT "Extent_Management", ALLOCATION_TYPE "Allocation_Type", PLUGGED_IN "Plugged_In", SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT "Segment_Space_Management" from sys.dba_tablespaces where (:TABLESPACE_NAME is null or instr(lower(tablespace_name),lower(:TABLESPACE_NAME)) > 0) order by 1

bind.tooltip: Name or part of name to search for (case insensitive).

query.sql: select TABLESPACE_NAME "Tablespace", BLOCK_SIZE "Block_Size", INITIAL_EXTENT "Initial_Extent", NEXT_EXTENT "Next_Extent", MIN_EXTENTS "Minimum_Extents", MAX_EXTENTS "Maximum_Extents", PCT_INCREASE "Percent_Increase", MIN_EXTLEN "Minimum_Extent_Length", STATUS "Status", CONTENTS "Contents", LOGGING "Logging", FORCE_LOGGING "Force_Logging", EXTENT_MANAGEMENT "Extent_Management", ALLOCATION_TYPE "Allocation_Type", PLUGGED_IN "Plugged_In", SEGMENT_SPACE_MANAGEMENT "Segment_Space_Management", DEF_TAB_COMPRESSION "Default_Tab_Compression", RETENTION "Retention", BIGFILE "Big File" from sys.dba_tablespaces where (:TABLESPACE_NAME is null or instr(lower(tablespace_name),lower(:TABLESPACE_NAME)) > 0) order by 1

bind.tooltip: Name or part of name to search for (case insensitive).

query.sql: WITH s0 AS (SELECT etl_process_date tstart, etl_country_code country FROM scb_etl_log WHERE etl_rd = to_date(:RD,'yyyymmdd') AND upper(etl_msg_txt) LIKE upper('[SCB_OBI_EDM_EXTRACT]: Process Started at ==>%') ) SELECT sel.etl_rd RD, sw0.tstart tstart, sel.etl_process_date tend, sw0.country COUNTRYNAME, ROUND(((to_date(TO_CHAR(sel.etl_process_date , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') - to_date(TO_CHAR(sw0.tstart , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss')) * 86400),2) AS ELAPSED_SECS FROM scb_etl_log sel, s0 sw0 WHERE etl_rd = to_date(:RD,'yyyymmdd') AND upper(etl_msg_txt) LIKE upper('[SCB_OBI_EDM_EXTRACT]: Process Completed at ==>%') AND sel.etl_country_code = sw0.country --and sw0.country='KR' ORDER BY country

WITH s0 AS (SELECT etl_process_date tstart, etl_country_code country FROM scb_etl_log WHERE etl_rd = to_date(:RD,'yyyymmdd') AND upper(etl_msg_txt) LIKE upper('[SCB_OBI_EDM_EXTRACT]: Process Started at ==>%') ) SELECT sel.etl_rd, ROUND(((to_date(TO_CHAR(sel.etl_process_date , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') - to_date(TO_CHAR(sw0.tstart , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss')) * 86400),2) AS ELAPSED_SECS FROM scb_etl_log sel, s0 sw0 WHERE etl_rd = to_date(:RD,'yyyymmdd') AND upper(etl_msg_txt) LIKE upper('[SCB_OBI_EDM_EXTRACT]: Process Completed at ==>%') AND sel.etl_country_code = sw0.country and sel.etl_country_code=:COUNTRYNAME ORDER BY country

WITH s0 AS (SELECT etl_rd, etl_process_date tstart, etl_country_code country FROM scb_etl_log WHERE etl_rd = to_date(:RD,'yyyymmdd') and etl_process_id='TDE_EXT' AND etl_msg_txt LIKE '[SCB_TDE_EXTRACT_MAS][SCB_TDE_EXTRACT_MAS]: Cursor Startted%' AND ( (etl_country_code IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(etl_rd,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (etl_country_code IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(etl_rd,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (etl_country_code IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(etl_rd,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (etl_country_code IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(etl_rd,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) ) SELECT sw0.country COUNTRYNAME, sel.etl_rd RD, sw0.tstart tstart, sel.etl_process_date tend, ROUND(((to_date(TO_CHAR(sel.etl_process_date , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') - to_date(TO_CHAR(sw0.tstart , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss')) *24*60),2) AS ELAPSED_MinS FROM scb_etl_log sel, s0 sw0 WHERE sel.etl_rd = to_date(:RD,'yyyymmdd') and sel.etl_rd=sw0.etl_rd and etl_process_id='TDE_EXT' AND etl_msg_txt LIKE '[SCB_TDE_EXTRACT_MAS][SCB_TDE_EXTRACT_MAS]: Cursor Finished%' AND sel.etl_country_code = sw0.country AND ( (sel.etl_country_code IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(sel.etl_rd,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (sel.etl_country_code IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(sel.etl_rd,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (sel.etl_country_code IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(sel.etl_rd,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (sel.etl_country_code IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(sel.etl_rd,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) --and sw0.country='KR' ORDER BY sel.etl_country_code

WITH s0 AS (SELECT etl_rd, etl_process_date tstart, etl_country_code country, etl_session_id FROM scb_etl_log WHERE etl_rd>=sysdate-91 and etl_rd<=sysdate-1 and etl_process_id='TDE_EXT' and etl_country_code=upper(:COUNTRYNAME) AND etl_msg_txt LIKE '[SCB_TDE_EXTRACT_MAS][SCB_TDE_EXTRACT_MAS]: Cursor Startted%' AND ( (etl_country_code IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(etl_rd,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (etl_country_code IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(etl_rd,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (etl_country_code IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(etl_rd,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (etl_country_code IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(etl_rd,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) ) SELECT sel.etl_rd, sel.etl_rd, ROUND(((to_date(TO_CHAR(sel.etl_process_date , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') - to_date(TO_CHAR(sw0.tstart , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss')) *24*60),2) AS ELAPSED_MINS FROM scb_etl_log sel, s0 sw0 WHERE sel.etl_rd>=sysdate-91 and sel.etl_rd<=sysdate-1 and sel.etl_rd = sw0.etl_rd and sel.etl_process_id='TDE_EXT' AND sel.etl_msg_txt LIKE '[SCB_TDE_EXTRACT_MAS][SCB_TDE_EXTRACT_MAS]: Cursor Finished%' AND sel.etl_country_code = sw0.country and sel.etl_country_code=upper(:COUNTRYNAME) and sel.etl_session_id=sw0.etl_session_id AND ( (sel.etl_country_code IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(sel.etl_rd,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (sel.etl_country_code IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(sel.etl_rd,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (sel.etl_country_code IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(sel.etl_rd,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (sel.etl_country_code IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(sel.etl_rd,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) ORDER BY sel.etl_country_code

SELECT -- session info a.status, a.username ora_user, a.osuser os_user, b.spid ora_pid, a.sid SID, a.serial# serial#, ROUND(b.pga_used_mem/1024/1024,3) pga_used_mb, DECODE(a.command, 0,NULL, 1,'CRE TAB', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CRE CLUSTER', 5,'ALT CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DRP CLUSTER', 9,'CRE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALT INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CRE SEQ', 14,'ALT SEQ', 15,'ALT TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQ', 17,'GRANT', 18,'REVOKE', 19,'CRE SYN', 20,'DROP SYN', 21,'CRE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CRE PROC', 25,'ALT PROC', 26,'LOCK TABLE', 28,'RENAME', 29,'COMMENT', 30,'AUDIT', 31,'NOAUDIT', 32,'CRE DBLINK', 33,'DROP DBLINK', 34,'CRE DB', 35,'ALTER DB', 36,'CRE RBS', 37,'ALT RBS', 38,'DROP RBS', 39,'CRE TBLSPC', 40,'ALT TBLSPC', 41,'DROP TBLSPC', 42,'ALT SESSION', 43,'ALT USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXEC', 48,'SET XACTN', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CRE USER', 52,'CRE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CRE SCHEMA', 57,'CRE CTLFILE', 58,'ALTER TRACING', 59,'CRE TRIGGER', 60,'ALT TRIGGER', 61,'DRP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TAB', 63,'ANALYZE IX', 64, 'ANALYZE CLUS', 65,'CRE PROFILE', 66,'DRP PROFILE', 67,'ALT PROFILE', 68,'DRP PROC', 69,'DRP PROC', 70,'ALT RESOURCE', 71,'CRE SNPLOG', 72,'ALT SNPLOG', 73,'DROP SNPLOG', 74,'CREATE SNAP', 75,'ALT SNAP', 76,'DROP SNAP', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 85,'TRUNC TAB', 86,'TRUNC CLUST', 88,'ALT VIEW', 91,'CRE FUNC', 92,'ALT FUNC', 93,'DROP FUNC', 94,'CRE PKG', 95,'ALT PKG', 96,'DROP PKG', 97,'CRE PKG BODY', 98,'ALT PKG BODY', 99,'DRP PKG BODY', TO_CHAR(a.command)) command, -- client info a.osuser cln_user, a.process cln_pid, a.machine cln_host, SUBSTR(a.program,1,23) prog, d.job, ds.what job_name, a.action, -- wait event a.STATE, a.wait_class, a.EVENT event, -- sql info a.blocking_session_status b_state, a.blocking_session b_sess, --blocking_session_serial# b_ser, a.blocking_instance b_inst, c.sql_id SQL_ID, c.child_number child, plan_hash_value, executions execs, a.last_call_et Waits, ROUND((elapsed_time/DECODE(NVL(executions,0),0,1,executions))/1000000,2) avg_etime_secs, SUBSTR(sql_text,1,100) FROM v$session a LEFT JOIN dba_jobs_running d ON a.sid = d.sid LEFT JOIN dba_jobs ds on d.job=ds.job LEFT JOIN v$sql c ON a.sql_id = c.sql_id AND a.sql_child_number = c.child_number, v$process b WHERE a.paddr = b.addr AND a.status = 'ACTIVE' -- shows only active sessions AND a.username IS NOT NULL --and a.username='FMTALM_US_PROD' and a.event <> 'Streams AQ: waiting for messages in the queue' --and a.action<>'waiting for a task' --AND a.username = :USERNAME --and a.osuser<>'1509991' and a.username not in ('SYS') --AND a.sid != -- ( SELECT DISTINCT sid FROM v$mystat WHERE rownum < 2 -- ) -- don't show this query ORDER BY waits ASC

display.name: Active SQL
display.description: The Current or last SQL for the selected session
display.tooltip: The Current or last SQL for the selected session

query.sql: select replace(q.SQL_FULLTEXT,chr(0)) sql_text from v$session s,v$sql q where s.sql_address = q.address and s.sql_hash_value = q.hash_value and s.sid = :SID
select * from table(dbms_xplan.display_cursor(:SQL_ID,nvl(:CHILD,0),'typical +peeked_binds'))
select event,p1text,p1,p2text,p2,p3text, case when p3 = 0 then null else p3 end p3 from v$session_wait where sid = :SID

select s.SID,s.status,s.username,s.process,s.LOGON_TIME, s.logon_time since,s.server,s.type,p.spid,p.TRACEID, s.serial#,RESOURCE_CONSUMER_GROUP from v$session s, v$process p where sid = :SID and s.paddr = p.addr and s.status='ACTIVE' order by 5
select osuser,machine,terminal,CLIENT_INFO,CLIENT_IDENTIFIER from v$session where sid = :SID

select decode(command, 0,null, 1,'CRE TAB', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CRE CLUSTER', 5,'ALT CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DRP CLUSTER', 9,'CRE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALT INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CRE SEQ', 14,'ALT SEQ', 15,'ALT TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQ', 17,'GRANT', 18,'REVOKE', 19,'CRE SYN', 20,'DROP SYN', 21,'CRE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CRE PROC', 25,'ALT PROC', 26,'LOCK TABLE', 28,'RENAME', 29,'COMMENT', 30,'AUDIT', 31,'NOAUDIT', 32,'CRE DBLINK', 33,'DROP DBLINK', 34,'CRE DB', 35,'ALTER DB', 36,'CRE RBS', 37,'ALT RBS', 38,'DROP RBS', 39,'CRE TBLSPC', 40,'ALT TBLSPC', 41,'DROP TBLSPC', 42,'ALT SESSION', 43,'ALT USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXEC', 48,'SET XACTN', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CRE USER', 52,'CRE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CRE SCHEMA', 57,'CRE CTLFILE', 58,'ALTER TRACING', 59,'CRE TRIGGER', 60,'ALT TRIGGER', 61,'DRP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TAB', 63,'ANALYZE IX', 64,'ANALYZE CLUS', 65,'CRE PROFILE', 66,'DRP PROFILE', 67,'ALT PROFILE', 68,'DRP PROC', 69,'DRP PROC', 70,'ALT RESOURCE', 71,'CRE SNPLOG', 72,'ALT SNPLOG', 73,'DROP SNPLOG', 74,'CREATE SNAP', 75,'ALT SNAP', 76,'DROP SNAP', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 85,'TRUNC TAB', 86,'TRUNC CLUST', 88,'ALT VIEW', 91,'CRE FUNC', 92,'ALT FUNC', 93,'DROP FUNC', 94,'CRE PKG', 95,'ALT PKG', 96,'DROP PKG', 97,'CRE PKG BODY', 98,'ALT PKG BODY', 99,'DRP PKG BODY', to_char(command)) "Command" ,LAST_CALL_ET,program,module,action from v$session where sid = :SID

with locks as( select session_id,lock_type, mode_held,mode_requested,lock_id1,lock_id2,blocking_others from sys.dba_lock), waiters as ( select w.session_id waiting_session, h.session_id holding_session, w.lock_type lock_type, h.mode_held mode_held, w.mode_requested mode_requested, w.lock_id1, w.lock_id2 from locks w, locks h where h.blocking_others = 'Blocking' and h.mode_held != 'None' and h.mode_held != 'Null' and w.mode_requested != 'None' and w.lock_type = h.lock_type and w.lock_id1 = h.lock_id1 and w.lock_id2 = h.lock_id2 and (w.session_id = :SID or h.session_id = :SID)), blockers as( select holding_session waiting_session, to_number(null) holding_session, 'None' lock_type, null mode_held, null mode_requested, null lock_id1, null lock_id2 from waiters minus select waiting_session waiting_session, to_number(null) holding_session, 'None' lock_type, null mode_held, null mode_requested, null lock_id1, null lock_id2 from waiters), waiters_blockers as( select waiting_session,holding_session,lock_type,mode_held,mode_requested,lock_id1,lock_id2 from waiters union all select waiting_session,holding_session,lock_type,mode_held,mode_requested,lock_id1,lock_id2 from blockers), lock_objects as( select session_id,cnt lock_obj_count, case when cnt = 1 then object_name else null end object_name, object_id,owner,object_type from( select session_id,count(distinct object_name) cnt,max(object_name) object_name, max(lo.object_id) object_id, max(ao.owner) owner,max(object_type) object_type from gv$locked_object lo,all_objects ao,waiters_blockers wb where lo.object_id = ao.object_id and (wb.waiting_session = lo.session_id or wb.holding_session = lo.session_id) group by session_id)), wait_block_ses as( select waiting_session,holding_session,lock_type,mode_held,mode_requested, s.username,s.osuser,s.CLIENT_INFO,s.CLIENT_IDENTIFIER,o.object_name,o.owner,o.object_id,module,o.object_type,o.lock_obj_count, decode(s.command, 0,null, 1,'CRE TAB', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CRE CLUSTER', 5,'ALT CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DRP CLUSTER', 9,'CRE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALT INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CRE SEQ', 14,'ALT SEQ', 15,'ALT TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQ', 17,'GRANT', 18,'REVOKE', 19,'CRE SYN', 20,'DROP SYN', 21,'CRE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CRE PROC', 25,'ALT PROC', 26,'LOCK TABLE', 28,'RENAME', 29,'COMMENT', 30,'AUDIT', 31,'NOAUDIT', 32,'CRE DBLINK', 33,'DROP DBLINK', 34,'CRE DB', 35,'ALTER DB', 36,'CRE RBS', 37,'ALT RBS', 38,'DROP RBS', 39,'CRE TBLSPC', 40,'ALT TBLSPC', 41,'DROP TBLSPC', 42,'ALT SESSION', 43,'ALT USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXEC', 48,'SET XACTN', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CRE USER', 52,'CRE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CRE SCHEMA', 57,'CRE CTLFILE', 58,'ALTER TRACING', 59,'CRE TRIGGER', 60,'ALT TRIGGER', 61,'DRP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TAB', 63,'ANALYZE IX', 64,'ANALYZE CLUS', 65,'CRE PROFILE', 66,'DRP PROFILE', 67,'ALT PROFILE', 68,'DRP PROC', 69,'DRP PROC', 70,'ALT RESOURCE', 71,'CRE SNPLOG', 72,'ALT SNPLOG', 73,'DROP SNPLOG', 74,'CREATE SNAP', 75,'ALT SNAP', 76,'DROP SNAP', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 85,'TRUNC TAB', 86,'TRUNC CLUST', 88,'ALT VIEW', 91,'CRE FUNC', 92,'ALT FUNC', 93,'DROP FUNC', 94,'CRE PKG', 95,'ALT PKG', 96,'DROP PKG', 97,'CRE PKG BODY', 98,'ALT PKG BODY', 99,'DRP PKG BODY', to_char(s.command)) command from waiters_blockers wb, v$session s, lock_objects o where s.sid = wb.waiting_session and o.session_id(+) = wb.waiting_session ) select case when holding_session is null then 'Lock' else 'Lock Waiting' end status, waiting_session, username, object_name, object_id,owner,object_type from wait_block_ses start with holding_session is null connect by prior waiting_session = holding_session

SELECT 'SQLDEV:GAUGE:0:100:0:100:' || DECODE( sofar, NULL, 100, DECODE( totalwork, 0, 100, NULL, sofar, ROUND(sofar/totalwork*100,0))) as progress --, username , elapsed_seconds "Elapsed/s" , time_remaining "Remaining/s" , message -- , sid, serial#, NVL( sql_id, '[NULL]' ) AS sql_id , to_char(last_update_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') last_update_time --, sql_exec_id FROM v$session_longops WHERE sql_id =:SQL_ID and sid=:SID AND time_remaining > 0 -- AND sofar <> totalwork -- if you want to see active operations only ORDER BY SIGN( sofar - NVL( totalwork, 0 )), last_update_time DESC

SELECT 'SQLDEV:GAUGE:0:100:0:100:' || DECODE( sofar, NULL, 100, DECODE( totalwork, 0, 100, NULL, sofar, ROUND(sofar/totalwork*100,0))) as progress --, username , elapsed_seconds "Elapsed/s" , time_remaining "Remaining/s" , message -- , sid, serial#, NVL( sql_id, '[NULL]' ) AS sql_id , to_char(last_update_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') last_update_time , sql_exec_start, sql_plan_line_id --, sql_exec_id FROM v$session_longops WHERE sql_id =:SQL_ID and sid=:SID AND time_remaining > 0 -- AND sofar <> totalwork -- if you want to see active operations only ORDER BY SIGN( sofar - NVL( totalwork, 0 )), last_update_time DESC
SELECT 'ALTER SYSTEM KILL SESSION '''||v.SID||','||v.SERIAL#||''' IMMEDIATE;' as sql_st FROM V$SESSION v WHERE v.sid = :SID AND v.STATUS='ACTIVE'

-- temp space and memory usage SELECT s.sid,s.serial#, s.sql_id, operation_id, w.operation_type, ROUND(w.actual_mem_used/1024/1024,2) mem_mb, ROUND(w.tempseg_size /1024/1024,2) temp_mb, w.TABLESPACE temp_tbs FROM v$session s, v$sql_workarea_active w WHERE s.sid =w.sid AND TABLESPACE IS NOT NULL --and s.status='ACTIVE' and S.SID=:SID ORDER BY 1

SELECT -- session info a.inst_id INST_ID, a.username ora_user, a.osuser os_user, a.status, a.sid SID, a.serial# serial#, DECODE(a.command, 0,NULL, 1,'CRE TAB', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CRE CLUSTER', 5,'ALT CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DRP CLUSTER', 9,'CRE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALT INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CRE SEQ', 14,'ALT SEQ', 15,'ALT TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQ', 17,'GRANT', 18,'REVOKE', 19,'CRE SYN', 20,'DROP SYN', 21,'CRE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CRE PROC', 25,'ALT PROC', 26,'LOCK TABLE', 28,'RENAME', 29,'COMMENT', 30,'AUDIT', 31,'NOAUDIT', 32,'CRE DBLINK', 33,'DROP DBLINK', 34,'CRE DB', 35,'ALTER DB', 36,'CRE RBS', 37,'ALT RBS', 38,'DROP RBS', 39,'CRE TBLSPC', 40,'ALT TBLSPC', 41,'DROP TBLSPC', 42,'ALT SESSION', 43,'ALT USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXEC', 48,'SET XACTN', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CRE USER', 52,'CRE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CRE SCHEMA', 57,'CRE CTLFILE', 58,'ALTER TRACING', 59,'CRE TRIGGER', 60,'ALT TRIGGER', 61,'DRP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TAB', 63,'ANALYZE IX', 64, 'ANALYZE CLUS', 65,'CRE PROFILE', 66,'DRP PROFILE', 67,'ALT PROFILE', 68,'DRP PROC', 69,'DRP PROC', 70,'ALT RESOURCE', 71,'CRE SNPLOG', 72,'ALT SNPLOG', 73,'DROP SNPLOG', 74,'CREATE SNAP', 75,'ALT SNAP', 76,'DROP SNAP', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 85,'TRUNC TAB', 86,'TRUNC CLUST', 88,'ALT VIEW', 91,'CRE FUNC', 92,'ALT FUNC', 93,'DROP FUNC', 94,'CRE PKG', 95,'ALT PKG', 96,'DROP PKG', 97,'CRE PKG BODY', 98,'ALT PKG BODY', 99,'DRP PKG BODY', TO_CHAR(a.command)) command, -- client info a.osuser cln_user, a.process cln_pid, a.machine cln_host, SUBSTR(a.program,1,23) prog, d.job, --ds.what job_name, -- wait event
a.STATE, a.wait_class, a.EVENT event, -- sql info c.sql_id SQL_ID, c.child_number child, plan_hash_value, executions execs, a.last_call_et Waits, ROUND((elapsed_time/DECODE(NVL(executions,0),0,1,executions))/1000000,2) avg_etime_secs, SUBSTR(sql_text,1,100) FROM gv$session a LEFT JOIN dba_jobs_running d ON a.sid = d.sid --LEFT JOIN dba_jobs ds --on d.job=ds.job LEFT JOIN gv$sql c ON a.sql_id = c.sql_id and a.inst_id=c.INST_ID AND a.sql_child_number = c.child_number WHERE a.status = 'ACTIVE' -- shows only active sessions --AND a.username = 'RAY2_GBL_PROD' and a.inst_id=:INSTANCE_ID --and a.username is not null --AND a.username = :USER --AND a.username = 'GTF_PROD' --AND a.username = 'FMTALM_SG_PROD' --and a.inst_id=2 --and a.sid=:SID --and a.sid=948 --and a.event <> 'Streams AQ: waiting for messages in the queue' --and a.osuser <>'1509991' --and a.sid=:sid --and a.osuser='fmdsadm' --AND a.sid != -- ( SELECT DISTINCT sid FROM gv$mystat WHERE inst_id=:INSTANCE_ID and rownum < 2 -- ) -- don't show this query ORDER BY waits

select s.SID,s.status,s.username,s.process,s.LOGON_TIME, s.logon_time since,s.server,s.type,p.spid,p.TRACEID, s.serial# from gv$session s, gv$process p where sid = :SID and s.paddr = p.addr and s.inst_id=p.inst_id and s.inst_id=:INST_ID
select osuser,machine,terminal,CLIENT_INFO,CLIENT_IDENTIFIER from gv$session where sid = :SID and inst_id=:INST_ID

select decode(command, 0,null, 1,'CRE TAB', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CRE CLUSTER', 5,'ALT CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DRP CLUSTER', 9,'CRE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALT INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CRE SEQ', 14,'ALT SEQ', 15,'ALT TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQ', 17,'GRANT', 18,'REVOKE', 19,'CRE SYN', 20,'DROP SYN', 21,'CRE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CRE PROC', 25,'ALT PROC', 26,'LOCK TABLE', 28,'RENAME', 29,'COMMENT', 30,'AUDIT', 31,'NOAUDIT', 32,'CRE DBLINK', 33,'DROP DBLINK', 34,'CRE DB', 35,'ALTER DB', 36,'CRE RBS', 37,'ALT RBS', 38,'DROP RBS', 39,'CRE TBLSPC', 40,'ALT TBLSPC', 41,'DROP TBLSPC', 42,'ALT SESSION', 43,'ALT USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXEC', 48,'SET XACTN', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CRE USER', 52,'CRE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CRE SCHEMA', 57,'CRE CTLFILE', 58,'ALTER TRACING', 59,'CRE TRIGGER', 60,'ALT TRIGGER', 61,'DRP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TAB', 63,'ANALYZE IX', 64,'ANALYZE CLUS', 65,'CRE PROFILE', 66,'DRP PROFILE', 67,'ALT PROFILE', 68,'DRP PROC', 69,'DRP PROC', 70,'ALT RESOURCE', 71,'CRE SNPLOG', 72,'ALT SNPLOG', 73,'DROP SNPLOG', 74,'CREATE SNAP', 75,'ALT SNAP', 76,'DROP SNAP', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 85,'TRUNC TAB', 86,'TRUNC CLUST', 88,'ALT VIEW', 91,'CRE FUNC', 92,'ALT FUNC', 93,'DROP FUNC', 94,'CRE PKG', 95,'ALT PKG', 96,'DROP PKG', 97,'CRE PKG BODY', 98,'ALT PKG BODY', 99,'DRP PKG BODY', to_char(command)) "Command" ,LAST_CALL_ET,program,module,action from gv$session where sid = :SID and inst_id=:INST_ID

WITH locks AS (SELECT session_id, lock_type, mode_held, mode_requested, lock_id1, lock_id2, blocking_others FROM sys.dba_lock ), waiters AS (SELECT w.session_id waiting_session, h.session_id holding_session, w.lock_type lock_type, h.mode_held mode_held, w.mode_requested mode_requested, w.lock_id1, w.lock_id2 FROM locks w, locks h WHERE h.blocking_others = 'Blocking' AND h.mode_held != 'None' AND h.mode_held != 'Null' AND w.mode_requested != 'None' AND w.lock_type = h.lock_type AND w.lock_id1 = h.lock_id1 AND w.lock_id2 = h.lock_id2 AND (w.session_id = :SID OR h.session_id = :SID) ), blockers AS (SELECT holding_session waiting_session, to_number(NULL) holding_session, 'None' lock_type, NULL mode_held, NULL mode_requested, NULL lock_id1, NULL lock_id2 FROM waiters MINUS SELECT waiting_session waiting_session, to_number(NULL) holding_session, 'None' lock_type, NULL mode_held, NULL mode_requested, NULL lock_id1, NULL lock_id2 FROM waiters ), waiters_blockers AS (SELECT waiting_session, holding_session, lock_type, mode_held, mode_requested, lock_id1, lock_id2 FROM waiters UNION ALL SELECT waiting_session, holding_session, lock_type, mode_held, mode_requested, lock_id1, lock_id2 FROM blockers ), lock_objects AS (SELECT session_id, cnt lock_obj_count, CASE WHEN cnt = 1 THEN object_name ELSE NULL END object_name, object_id, owner, object_type FROM (SELECT session_id, COUNT(DISTINCT object_name) cnt, MAX(object_name) object_name, MAX(lo.object_id) object_id, MAX(ao.owner) owner, MAX(object_type) object_type FROM gv$locked_object lo, all_objects ao, waiters_blockers wb WHERE lo.object_id = ao.object_id AND (wb.waiting_session = lo.session_id OR wb.holding_session = lo.session_id and lo.inst_id=:INST_ID) GROUP BY session_id ) ), wait_block_ses AS (SELECT waiting_session, holding_session, lock_type, mode_held, mode_requested, s.username, s.osuser, s.CLIENT_INFO, s.CLIENT_IDENTIFIER, o.object_name, o.owner, o.object_id, module, o.object_type, o.lock_obj_count, DECODE(s.command, 0,NULL, 1,'CRE TAB', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CRE CLUSTER', 5,'ALT CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DRP CLUSTER', 9,'CRE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALT INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CRE SEQ', 14,'ALT SEQ', 15,'ALT TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQ', 17,'GRANT', 18,'REVOKE', 19,'CRE SYN', 20,'DROP SYN', 21,'CRE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CRE PROC', 25,'ALT PROC', 26,'LOCK TABLE', 28,'RENAME', 29,'COMMENT', 30,'AUDIT', 31,'NOAUDIT', 32,'CRE DBLINK', 33,'DROP DBLINK', 34,'CRE DB', 35,'ALTER DB', 36,'CRE RBS', 37,'ALT RBS', 38,'DROP RBS', 39,'CRE TBLSPC', 40,'ALT TBLSPC', 41,'DROP TBLSPC', 42,'ALT SESSION', 43,'ALT USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXEC', 48,'SET XACTN', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CRE USER', 52,'CRE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CRE SCHEMA', 57,'CRE CTLFILE', 58,'ALTER TRACING', 59,'CRE TRIGGER', 60,'ALT TRIGGER', 61,'DRP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TAB', 63,'ANALYZE IX', 64, 'ANALYZE CLUS', 65,'CRE PROFILE', 66,'DRP PROFILE', 67,'ALT PROFILE', 68,'DRP PROC', 69,'DRP PROC', 70,'ALT RESOURCE', 71,'CRE SNPLOG', 72,'ALT SNPLOG', 73,'DROP SNPLOG', 74,'CREATE SNAP', 75,'ALT SNAP', 76,'DROP SNAP', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 85,'TRUNC TAB', 86,'TRUNC CLUST', 88,'ALT VIEW', 91,'CRE FUNC', 92,'ALT FUNC', 93,'DROP FUNC', 94,'CRE PKG', 95,'ALT PKG', 96,'DROP PKG', 97,'CRE PKG BODY', 98,'ALT PKG BODY', 99,'DRP PKG BODY', TO_CHAR(s.command)) command FROM waiters_blockers wb, gv$session s, lock_objects o WHERE s.sid = wb.waiting_session AND o.session_id(+) = wb.waiting_session and s.inst_id=:INST_ID) SELECT CASE WHEN holding_session IS NULL THEN 'Lock' ELSE 'Lock Waiting' END status, waiting_session, username, object_name, object_id, owner, object_type FROM wait_block_ses START WITH holding_session IS NULL CONNECT BY prior waiting_session = holding_session

SELECT TRUNC(sl.elapsed_seconds/60) || ':' || MOD(sl.elapsed_seconds,60) elapsed, TRUNC(sl.time_remaining/60) || ':' || MOD(sl.time_remaining,60) remaining, ROUND(sl.sofar/sl.totalwork*100, 2) progress_pct FROM gv$session_longops sl WHERE sql_id =:SQL_ID and inst_id=:INST_ID AND time_remaining > 0
SELECT 'ALTER SYSTEM KILL SESSION '''||v.SID||','||v.SERIAL#||''' IMMEDIATE;' as sql_st FROM gV$SESSION v WHERE v.sid = :SID and v.inst_id=:INST_ID

-- temp space and memory usage SELECT s.sid,s.serial#, s.sql_id, operation_id, w.operation_type, ROUND(w.actual_mem_used/1024/1024,2) mem_mb, ROUND(w.tempseg_size /1024/1024,2) temp_mb, w.TABLESPACE temp_tbs FROM gv$session s, gv$sql_workarea_active w WHERE s.sid =w.sid and s.inst_id=w.inst_id and s.inst_id=:INST_ID AND TABLESPACE IS NOT NULL --and s.status='ACTIVE' and S.SID=:SID ORDER BY 1

SELECT -- session info a.inst_id INST_ID, a.username ora_user, a.osuser os_user, a.status, a.sid SID, a.serial# serial#, DECODE(a.command, 0,NULL, 1,'CRE TAB', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CRE CLUSTER', 5,'ALT CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DRP CLUSTER', 9,'CRE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALT INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CRE SEQ', 14,'ALT SEQ', 15,'ALT TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQ', 17,'GRANT', 18,'REVOKE', 19,'CRE SYN', 20,'DROP SYN', 21,'CRE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CRE PROC', 25,'ALT PROC', 26,'LOCK TABLE', 28,'RENAME', 29,'COMMENT', 30,'AUDIT', 31,'NOAUDIT', 32,'CRE DBLINK', 33,'DROP DBLINK', 34,'CRE DB', 35,'ALTER DB', 36,'CRE RBS', 37,'ALT RBS', 38,'DROP RBS', 39,'CRE TBLSPC', 40,'ALT TBLSPC', 41,'DROP TBLSPC', 42,'ALT SESSION', 43,'ALT USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXEC', 48,'SET XACTN', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CRE USER', 52,'CRE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CRE SCHEMA', 57,'CRE CTLFILE', 58,'ALTER TRACING', 59,'CRE TRIGGER', 60,'ALT TRIGGER', 61,'DRP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TAB', 63,'ANALYZE IX', 64, 'ANALYZE CLUS', 65,'CRE PROFILE', 66,'DRP PROFILE', 67,'ALT PROFILE', 68,'DRP PROC', 69,'DRP PROC', 70,'ALT RESOURCE', 71,'CRE SNPLOG', 72,'ALT SNPLOG', 73,'DROP SNPLOG', 74,'CREATE SNAP', 75,'ALT SNAP', 76,'DROP SNAP', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 85,'TRUNC TAB', 86,'TRUNC CLUST', 88,'ALT VIEW', 91,'CRE FUNC', 92,'ALT FUNC', 93,'DROP FUNC', 94,'CRE PKG', 95,'ALT PKG', 96,'DROP PKG', 97,'CRE PKG BODY', 98,'ALT PKG BODY', 99,'DRP PKG BODY', TO_CHAR(a.command)) command, -- client info a.osuser cln_user, a.process cln_pid, a.machine cln_host, SUBSTR(a.program,1,23) prog, d.job, --ds.what job_name, -- wait event
a.STATE, a.wait_class, a.EVENT event, -- sql info c.sql_id SQL_ID, c.child_number child, plan_hash_value, executions execs, a.last_call_et Waits, ROUND((elapsed_time/DECODE(NVL(executions,0),0,1,executions))/1000000,2) avg_etime_secs, SUBSTR(sql_text,1,100) FROM gv$session a LEFT JOIN dba_jobs_running d ON a.sid = d.sid --LEFT JOIN dba_jobs ds --on d.job=ds.job LEFT JOIN gv$sql c ON a.sql_id = c.sql_id and a.inst_id=c.INST_ID AND a.sql_child_number = c.child_number WHERE a.status = 'ACTIVE' -- shows only active sessions --AND a.username = 'RAY2_GBL_PROD' and a.inst_id=:INSTANCE_ID and a.username is not null AND a.username = upper(:USERNAME) --AND a.username = 'FMTALM_SG_PROD' --and a.inst_id=2 --and a.sid=:SID --and a.event <> 'Streams AQ: waiting for messages in the queue' and a.osuser <>'1509991' --and a.sid=:sid --and a.osuser='fmdsadm' --AND a.sid != -- ( SELECT DISTINCT sid FROM v$mystat WHERE rownum < 2 -- ) -- don't show this query ORDER BY waits

holding_session, w.lock_type lock_type, h.mode_held mode_held, w.mode_requested mode_requested, w.lock_id1, w.lock_id2 FROM locks w, locks h WHERE h.blocking_others = 'Blocking' AND h.mode_held != ), blockers AS (SELECT holding_session waiting_session, to_number(NULL) holding_session, 'None' lock_type, NULL mode_held, NULL mode_requested, NULL lock_id1, NULL lock_id2 FROM waiters MINUS SELECT waiting_session waiting_session, to_number(NULL) holding_session, 'None' lock_type, NULL mode_held, NULL mode_requested, NULL lock_id1, NULL lock_id2 FROM waiters ), waiters_blockers AS (SELECT waiting_session, holding_session, lock_type, mode_held, mode_requested, lock_id1, lock_id2 FROM waiters UNION ALL SELECT waiting_session, holding_session, lock_type, mode_held, mode_requested, lock_id1, lock_id2 FROM blockers ), lock_objects AS (SELECT session_id, cnt lock_obj_count, CASE WHEN cnt = 1 THEN object_name ELSE NULL END object_name, object_id, owner, object_type FROM (SELECT session_id, COUNT(DISTINCT object_name) cnt, MAX(object_name) object_name, MAX(lo.object_id) object_id, MAX(ao.owner) owner, MAX(object_type) object_type FROM gv$locked_object lo, all_objects ao, waiters_blockers wb WHERE lo.object_id = ao.object_id AND (wb.waiting_session = lo.session_id OR wb.holding_session = lo.session_id and lo.inst_id=:INST_ID) GROUP BY session_id ) ), wait_block_ses AS (SELECT waiting_session, holding_session, lock_type, mode_held, mode_requested, s.username, s.osuser, s.CLIENT_INFO, s.CLIENT_IDENTIFIER, o.object_name, o.owner, o.object_id, module, o.object_type, o.lock_obj_count, DECODE(s.command, 0,NULL, 1,'CRE TAB', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CRE CLUSTER', 5,'ALT CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DRP CLUSTER', 9,'CRE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALT --SELECT -- TRUNC(sl.elapsed_seconds/60) || ':' || MOD(sl.elapsed_seconds,60) elapsed, -- TRUNC(sl.time_remaining/60) || ':' || MOD(sl.time_remaining,60) remaining, -- ROUND(sl.sofar/sl.totalwork*100, 2) progress_pct -- FROM v$session_longops sl -- WHERE sql_id =:SQL_ID -- AND time_remaining > 0
SELECT 'SQLDEV:GAUGE:0:100:0:100:' || DECODE( sofar, NULL, 100, DECODE( totalwork, 0, 100, NULL, sofar, ROUND(sofar/totalwork*100,0))) as progress --, username , elapsed_seconds "Elapsed/s" , time_remaining "Remaining/s" , message -- , sid, serial#, NVL( sql_id, '[NULL]' ) AS sql_id , to_char(last_update_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') last_update_time , sql_exec_start, sql_plan_line_id --, sql_exec_id FROM gv$session_longops WHERE sql_id =:SQL_ID and sid=:SID and inst_id=:INST_ID AND time_remaining > 0 -- AND sofar <> totalwork -- if you want to see active operations only ORDER BY SIGN( sofar - NVL( totalwork, 0 )), last_update_time DESC
SELECT 'ALTER SYSTEM KILL SESSION '''||v.SID||','||v.SERIAL#||''' IMMEDIATE;' as sql_st FROM gV$SESSION v WHERE v.sid = :SID and v.inst_id=:INST_ID

-- temp space and memory usage SELECT s.sid,s.serial#, s.sql_id, operation_id, w.operation_type, ROUND(w.actual_mem_used/1024/1024,2) mem_mb, ROUND(w.tempseg_size /1024/1024,2) temp_mb, w.TABLESPACE temp_tbs FROM gv$session s, gv$sql_workarea_active w WHERE s.sid =w.sid and s.inst_id=w.inst_id and s.inst_id=:INST_ID AND TABLESPACE IS NOT NULL --and s.status='ACTIVE' and S.SID=:SID ORDER BY 1

SELECT -- session info a.inst_id INST_ID, a.username ora_user, a.osuser os_user, b.spid ora_pid, a.sid SID, a.serial# serial#, ROUND(b.pga_used_mem/1024/1024,3) pga_used_mb, DECODE(a.command, 0,NULL, 1,'CRE TAB', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CRE CLUSTER', 5,'ALT CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DRP CLUSTER', 9,'CRE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALT INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CRE SEQ', 14,'ALT SEQ', 15,'ALT TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQ', 17,'GRANT', 18,'REVOKE', 19,'CRE SYN', 20,'DROP SYN', 21,'CRE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CRE PROC', 25,'ALT PROC', 26,'LOCK TABLE', 28,'RENAME', 29,'COMMENT', 30,'AUDIT', 31,'NOAUDIT', 32,'CRE DBLINK', 33,'DROP DBLINK', 34,'CRE DB', 35,'ALTER DB', 36,'CRE RBS', 37,'ALT RBS', 38,'DROP RBS', 39,'CRE TBLSPC', 40,'ALT TBLSPC', 41,'DROP TBLSPC', 42,'ALT SESSION', 43,'ALT USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXEC', 48,'SET XACTN', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CRE USER', 52,'CRE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CRE SCHEMA', 57,'CRE CTLFILE', 58,'ALTER TRACING', 59,'CRE TRIGGER', 60,'ALT TRIGGER', 61,'DRP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TAB', 63,'ANALYZE IX', 64, 'ANALYZE CLUS', 65,'CRE PROFILE', 66,'DRP PROFILE', 67,'ALT PROFILE', 68,'DRP PROC', 69,'DRP PROC', 70,'ALT RESOURCE', 71,'CRE SNPLOG', 72,'ALT SNPLOG', 73,'DROP SNPLOG', 74,'CREATE SNAP', 75,'ALT SNAP', 76,'DROP SNAP', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 85,'TRUNC TAB', 86,'TRUNC CLUST', 88,'ALT VIEW', 91,'CRE FUNC', 92,'ALT FUNC', 93,'DROP FUNC', 94,'CRE PKG', 95,'ALT PKG', 96,'DROP PKG', 97,'CRE PKG BODY', 98,'ALT PKG BODY', 99,'DRP PKG BODY', TO_CHAR(a.command)) command, -- client info a.osuser cln_user, a.process cln_pid, a.machine cln_host, SUBSTR(a.program,1,23) prog, --d.job, --ds.what job_name, a.action, -- wait event a.STATE, a.wait_class, a.EVENT event, -- sql info c.sql_id SQL_ID, c.child_number child, plan_hash_value, executions execs, a.last_call_et Waits, ROUND((elapsed_time/DECODE(NVL(executions,0),0,1,executions))/1000000,2) avg_etime_secs, SUBSTR(sql_text,1,100) FROM gv$session a --LEFT JOIN dba_jobs_running d --ON a.sid = d.sid --LEFT JOIN dba_jobs ds --on d.job=ds.job LEFT JOIN gv$sql c ON a.sql_id = c.sql_id AND a.inst_id =c.inst_id AND a.sql_child_number = c.child_number left join gv$process b on a.paddr = b.addr AND a.inst_id =b.inst_id WHERE a.status = 'ACTIVE' -- shows only active sessions --AND a.event <> 'Streams AQ: waiting for messages in the queue' AND a.username = :USERNAME --and a.action<>'waiting for a task' --and a.osuser<>'1509991' --and a.osuser='fmdsadm' --AND a.sid != -- ( SELECT DISTINCT sid FROM v$mystat WHERE rownum < 2 -- ) -- don't show this query ORDER BY waits ASC

display.name: Active SQL
display.description: The Current or last SQL for the selected session
display.tooltip: The Current or last SQL for the selected session

query.sql: select replace(q.SQL_FULLTEXT,chr(0)) sql_text from gv$session s,gv$sql q where s.sql_address = q.address and s.inst_id = q.inst_id and s.sql_hash_value = q.hash_value and s.sid = :SID and s.inst_id=:INST_ID
select * from table(dbms_xplan.display_cursor(:SQL_ID,nvl(:CHILD,0),'typical +peeked_binds'))
select event,p1,p2, case when p3 = 0 then null else p3 end p3 from gv$session_wait where sid = :SID and inst_id=:INST_ID

select s.SID,s.status,s.username,s.process,s.LOGON_TIME, s.logon_time since,s.server,s.type,p.spid,p.TRACEID, s.serial# from gv$session s, gv$process p where sid = :SID and s.paddr = p.addr and s.inst_id = p.inst_id and s.inst_id=:INST_ID
select osuser,machine,terminal,CLIENT_INFO,CLIENT_IDENTIFIER from gv$session where sid = :SID and inst_id=:INST_ID

select decode(command, 0,null, 1,'CRE TAB', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CRE CLUSTER', 5,'ALT CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DRP CLUSTER', 9,'CRE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALT INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CRE SEQ', 14,'ALT SEQ', 15,'ALT TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQ', 17,'GRANT', 18,'REVOKE', 19,'CRE SYN', 20,'DROP SYN', 21,'CRE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CRE PROC', 25,'ALT PROC', 26,'LOCK TABLE', 28,'RENAME', 29,'COMMENT', 30,'AUDIT', 31,'NOAUDIT', 32,'CRE DBLINK', 33,'DROP DBLINK', 34,'CRE DB', 35,'ALTER DB', 36,'CRE RBS', 37,'ALT RBS', 38,'DROP RBS', 39,'CRE TBLSPC', 40,'ALT TBLSPC', 41,'DROP TBLSPC', 42,'ALT SESSION', 43,'ALT USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXEC', 48,'SET XACTN', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CRE USER', 52,'CRE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CRE SCHEMA', 57,'CRE CTLFILE', 58,'ALTER TRACING', 59,'CRE TRIGGER', 60,'ALT TRIGGER', 61,'DRP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TAB', 63,'ANALYZE IX', 64,'ANALYZE CLUS', 65,'CRE PROFILE', 66,'DRP PROFILE', 67,'ALT PROFILE', 68,'DRP PROC', 69,'DRP PROC', 70,'ALT RESOURCE', 71,'CRE SNPLOG', 72,'ALT SNPLOG', 73,'DROP SNPLOG', 74,'CREATE SNAP', 75,'ALT SNAP', 76,'DROP SNAP', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 85,'TRUNC TAB', 86,'TRUNC CLUST', 88,'ALT VIEW', 91,'CRE FUNC', 92,'ALT FUNC', 93,'DROP FUNC', 94,'CRE PKG', 95,'ALT PKG', 96,'DROP PKG', 97,'CRE PKG BODY', 98,'ALT PKG BODY', 99,'DRP PKG BODY', to_char(command)) "Command" ,LAST_CALL_ET,program,module,action from gv$session where sid = :SID and inst_id=:INST_ID

with locks as( select session_id,lock_type, mode_held,mode_requested,lock_id1,lock_id2,blocking_others from sys.dba_lock), waiters as ( select w.session_id waiting_session, h.session_id holding_session, w.lock_type lock_type, h.mode_held mode_held, w.mode_requested mode_requested, w.lock_id1, w.lock_id2 from locks w, locks h where h.blocking_others = 'Blocking' and h.mode_held != 'None' and h.mode_held != 'Null' and w.mode_requested != 'None' and w.lock_type = h.lock_type and w.lock_id1 = h.lock_id1 and w.lock_id2 = h.lock_id2 and (w.session_id = :SID or h.session_id = :SID)), blockers as( select holding_session waiting_session, to_number(null) holding_session, 'None' lock_type, null mode_held, null mode_requested, null lock_id1, null lock_id2 from waiters minus select waiting_session waiting_session, to_number(null) holding_session, 'None' lock_type, null mode_held, null mode_requested, null lock_id1, null lock_id2 from waiters), waiters_blockers as( select waiting_session,holding_session,lock_type,mode_held,mode_requested,lock_id1,lock_id2 from waiters union all select waiting_session,holding_session,lock_type,mode_held,mode_requested,lock_id1,lock_id2 from blockers), lock_objects as( select session_id,cnt lock_obj_count, case when cnt = 1 then object_name else null end object_name, object_id,owner,object_type from( select session_id,count(distinct object_name) cnt,max(object_name) object_name, max(lo.object_id) object_id, max(ao.owner) owner,max(object_type) object_type from gv$locked_object lo,all_objects ao,waiters_blockers wb where lo.object_id = ao.object_id and (wb.waiting_session = lo.session_id or wb.holding_session = lo.session_id) group by session_id)), wait_block_ses as( select waiting_session,holding_session,lock_type,mode_held,mode_requested, s.username,s.osuser,s.CLIENT_INFO,s.CLIENT_IDENTIFIER,o.object_name,o.owner,o.object_id,module,o.object_type,o.lock_obj_count, decode(s.command, 0,null, 1,'CRE TAB', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CRE CLUSTER', 5,'ALT CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DRP CLUSTER', 9,'CRE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALT INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CRE SEQ', 14,'ALT SEQ', 15,'ALT TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQ', 17,'GRANT', 18,'REVOKE', 19,'CRE SYN', 20,'DROP SYN', 21,'CRE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CRE PROC', 25,'ALT PROC', 26,'LOCK TABLE', 28,'RENAME', 29,'COMMENT', 30,'AUDIT', 31,'NOAUDIT', 32,'CRE DBLINK', 33,'DROP DBLINK', 34,'CRE DB', 35,'ALTER DB', 36,'CRE RBS', 37,'ALT RBS', 38,'DROP RBS', 39,'CRE TBLSPC', 40,'ALT TBLSPC', 41,'DROP TBLSPC', 42,'ALT SESSION', 43,'ALT USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXEC', 48,'SET XACTN', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CRE USER', 52,'CRE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CRE SCHEMA', 57,'CRE CTLFILE', 58,'ALTER TRACING', 59,'CRE TRIGGER', 60,'ALT TRIGGER', 61,'DRP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TAB', 63,'ANALYZE IX', 64,'ANALYZE CLUS', 65,'CRE PROFILE', 66,'DRP PROFILE', 67,'ALT PROFILE', 68,'DRP PROC', 69,'DRP PROC', 70,'ALT RESOURCE', 71,'CRE SNPLOG', 72,'ALT SNPLOG', 73,'DROP SNPLOG', 74,'CREATE SNAP', 75,'ALT SNAP', 76,'DROP SNAP', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 85,'TRUNC TAB', 86,'TRUNC CLUST', 88,'ALT VIEW', 91,'CRE FUNC', 92,'ALT FUNC', 93,'DROP FUNC', 94,'CRE PKG', 95,'ALT PKG', 96,'DROP PKG', 97,'CRE PKG BODY', 98,'ALT PKG BODY', 99,'DRP PKG BODY', to_char(s.command)) command from waiters_blockers wb, gv$session s, lock_objects o where s.sid = wb.waiting_session and s.inst_id=:INST_ID and o.session_id(+) = wb.waiting_session ) select case when holding_session is null then 'Lock' else 'Lock Waiting' end status, waiting_session, username, object_name, object_id,owner,object_type from wait_block_ses start with holding_session is null connect by prior waiting_session = holding_session

SELECT 'SQLDEV:GAUGE:0:100:0:100:' || DECODE( sofar, NULL, 100, DECODE( totalwork, 0, 100, NULL, sofar, ROUND(sofar/totalwork*100,0))) as progress --, username , elapsed_seconds "Elapsed/s" , time_remaining "Remaining/s" , message -- , sid, serial#, NVL( sql_id, '[NULL]' ) AS sql_id , to_char(last_update_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') last_update_time , sql_exec_start, sql_plan_line_id --, sql_exec_id FROM gv$session_longops WHERE sql_id =:SQL_ID and inst_id=:INST_ID and sid=:SID AND time_remaining > 0 -- AND sofar <> totalwork -- if you want to see active operations only ORDER BY SIGN( sofar - NVL( totalwork, 0 )), last_update_time DESC
SELECT 'ALTER SYSTEM KILL SESSION '''||v.SID||','||v.SERIAL#||''' IMMEDIATE;' as sql_st FROM gV$SESSION v WHERE v.sid = :SID and inst_id=:INST_ID

-- temp space and memory usage SELECT s.sid,s.serial#, s.sql_id, operation_id, w.operation_type, ROUND(w.actual_mem_used/1024/1024,2) mem_mb, ROUND(w.tempseg_size /1024/1024,2) temp_mb, w.TABLESPACE temp_tbs FROM gv$session s, gv$sql_workarea_active w WHERE s.sid =w.sid and s.inst_id = w.inst_id and s.inst_id=:INST_ID AND TABLESPACE IS NOT NULL --and s.status='ACTIVE' and S.SID=:SID ORDER BY 1

SELECT -- session info a.username ora_user, a.osuser os_user, b.spid ora_pid, a.status, a.sid SID, a.serial# SERIAL, ROUND(b.pga_used_mem/1024/1024,3) pga_used_mb, DECODE(a.command, 0,NULL, 1,'CRE TAB', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CRE CLUSTER', 5,'ALT CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DRP CLUSTER', 9,'CRE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALT INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CRE SEQ', 14,'ALT SEQ', 15,'ALT TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQ', 17,'GRANT', 18,'REVOKE', 19,'CRE SYN', 20,'DROP SYN', 21,'CRE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CRE PROC', 25,'ALT PROC', 26,'LOCK TABLE', 28,'RENAME', 29,'COMMENT', 30,'AUDIT', 31,'NOAUDIT', 32,'CRE DBLINK', 33,'DROP DBLINK', 34,'CRE DB', 35,'ALTER DB', 36,'CRE RBS', 37,'ALT RBS', 38,'DROP RBS', 39,'CRE TBLSPC', 40,'ALT TBLSPC', 41,'DROP TBLSPC', 42,'ALT SESSION', 43,'ALT USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXEC', 48,'SET XACTN', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CRE USER', 52,'CRE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CRE SCHEMA', 57,'CRE CTLFILE', 58,'ALTER TRACING', 59,'CRE TRIGGER', 60,'ALT TRIGGER', 61,'DRP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TAB', 63,'ANALYZE IX', 64, 'ANALYZE CLUS', 65,'CRE PROFILE', 66,'DRP PROFILE', 67,'ALT PROFILE', 68,'DRP PROC', 69,'DRP PROC', 70,'ALT RESOURCE', 71,'CRE SNPLOG', 72,'ALT SNPLOG', 73,'DROP SNPLOG', 74,'CREATE SNAP', 75,'ALT SNAP', 76,'DROP SNAP', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 85,'TRUNC TAB', 86,'TRUNC CLUST', 88,'ALT VIEW', 91,'CRE FUNC', 92,'ALT FUNC', 93,'DROP FUNC', 94,'CRE PKG', 95,'ALT PKG', 96,'DROP PKG', 97,'CRE PKG BODY', 98,'ALT PKG BODY', 99,'DRP PKG BODY', TO_CHAR(a.command)) command, -- client info a.osuser cln_user, a.process cln_pid, a.machine cln_host, SUBSTR(a.program,1,30) prog, d.job, --ds.what job_name, -- wait event
a.STATE s_state, a.wait_class, a.EVENT event, a.action, a.blocking_session_status b_state, a.blocking_session b_sess, --blocking_session_serial# b_ser, a.blocking_instance b_inst, -- sql info c.sql_id SQL_ID, c.child_number child, plan_hash_value, executions execs, a.last_call_et Waits, ROUND((elapsed_time/DECODE(NVL(executions,0),0,1,executions))/1000000,2) avg_etime_secs, SUBSTR(sql_text,1,100) FROM v$session a LEFT JOIN dba_jobs_running d ON a.sid = d.sid --LEFT JOIN dba_jobs ds --on d.job=ds.job LEFT JOIN v$sql c ON a.sql_id = c.sql_id AND a.sql_child_number = c.child_number, v$process b WHERE a.paddr = b.addr AND a.status = 'ACTIVE' -- shows only active sessions --AND a.username = 'RAY2_GBL_PROD' --AND a.username = 'IRB_GBL_PROD' AND a.username is not null --AND a.osuser<>'1509991' --and a.username not in ('PUBLIC','SYS') --and a.inst_id=2 --and a.sid=:SID and a.event <> 'Streams AQ: waiting for messages in the queue' --AND a.sid != -- ( SELECT DISTINCT sid FROM v$mystat WHERE rownum < 2 -- ) -- don't show this query --and a.sid=:sid --and a.osuser='fmdsadm' ORDER BY waits ASC

query.sql: select replace(q.SQL_FULLTEXT,chr(0)) sql_text from v$session s,v$sql q where s.sql_address = q.address and s.sql_hash_value = q.hash_value and s.sid = :SID
select * from table(dbms_xplan.display_cursor(:SQL_ID,nvl(:CHILD,0),'typical +peeked_binds'))
select s.SID,s.status,s.username,s.process,s.LOGON_TIME, s.logon_time since,s.server,s.type,p.spid,p.TRACEID, s.serial# from v$session s, v$process p where sid = :SID and s.paddr = p.addr
select osuser,machine,terminal,CLIENT_INFO,CLIENT_IDENTIFIER from v$session where sid = :SID

select decode(command, 0,null, 1,'CRE TAB', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CRE CLUSTER', 5,'ALT CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DRP CLUSTER', 9,'CRE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALT INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CRE SEQ', 14,'ALT SEQ', 15,'ALT TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQ', 17,'GRANT', 18,'REVOKE', 19,'CRE SYN', 20,'DROP SYN', 21,'CRE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CRE PROC', 25,'ALT PROC', 26,'LOCK TABLE', 28,'RENAME', 29,'COMMENT', 30,'AUDIT', 31,'NOAUDIT', 32,'CRE DBLINK', 33,'DROP DBLINK', 34,'CRE DB', 35,'ALTER DB', 36,'CRE RBS', 37,'ALT RBS', 38,'DROP RBS', 39,'CRE TBLSPC', 40,'ALT TBLSPC', 41,'DROP TBLSPC', 42,'ALT SESSION', 43,'ALT USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXEC', 48,'SET XACTN', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CRE USER', 52,'CRE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CRE SCHEMA', 57,'CRE CTLFILE', 58,'ALTER TRACING', 59,'CRE TRIGGER', 60,'ALT TRIGGER', 61,'DRP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TAB', 63,'ANALYZE IX', 64,'ANALYZE CLUS', 65,'CRE PROFILE', 66,'DRP PROFILE', 67,'ALT PROFILE', 68,'DRP PROC', 69,'DRP PROC', 70,'ALT RESOURCE', 71,'CRE SNPLOG', 72,'ALT SNPLOG', 73,'DROP SNPLOG', 74,'CREATE SNAP', 75,'ALT SNAP', 76,'DROP SNAP', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 85,'TRUNC TAB', 86,'TRUNC CLUST', 88,'ALT VIEW', 91,'CRE FUNC', 92,'ALT FUNC', 93,'DROP FUNC', 94,'CRE PKG', 95,'ALT PKG', 96,'DROP PKG', 97,'CRE PKG BODY', 98,'ALT PKG BODY', 99,'DRP PKG BODY', to_char(command)) "Command" ,LAST_CALL_ET,program,module,action from v$session where sid = :SID

--SELECT -- TRUNC(sl.elapsed_seconds/60) || ':' || MOD(sl.elapsed_seconds,60) elapsed, -- TRUNC(sl.time_remaining/60) || ':' || MOD(sl.time_remaining,60) remaining, -- ROUND(sl.sofar/sl.totalwork*100, 2) progress_pct -- FROM v$session_longops sl -- WHERE sql_id =:SQL_ID -- AND time_remaining > 0
SELECT 'SQLDEV:GAUGE:0:100:0:100:' || DECODE( sofar, NULL, 100, DECODE( totalwork, 0, 100, NULL, sofar, ROUND(sofar/totalwork*100,0))) as progress --, username , elapsed_seconds "Elapsed/s" , time_remaining "Remaining/s" , message -- , sid, serial#, NVL( sql_id, '[NULL]' ) AS sql_id , to_char(last_update_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') last_update_time , sql_exec_start, sql_plan_line_id --, sql_exec_id FROM v$session_longops WHERE sql_id =:SQL_ID and sid=:SID --and serial#=:SERIAL AND time_remaining > 0 AND sofar <> totalwork -- if you want to see active operations only ORDER BY SIGN( sofar - NVL( totalwork, 0 )), last_update_time DESC
SELECT 'ALTER SYSTEM KILL SESSION '''||v.SID||','||v.SERIAL#||''' IMMEDIATE;' as sql_st FROM V$SESSION v WHERE v.sid = :SID

SELECT vl.sid, vl.serial#, 'SQLDEV:GAUGE:0:100:0:100:' || DECODE( sofar, NULL, 100, DECODE( totalwork, 0, 100, NULL, sofar, ROUND(sofar/totalwork*100,0))) AS progress , vl.username, vl.elapsed_seconds "Elapsed/s", vl.time_remaining "Remaining/s", vl.message , NVL( vl.sql_id, '[NULL]' ) AS sql_id , TO_CHAR(vl.last_update_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') last_update_time , vl.sql_exec_start , vl.sql_plan_line_id , vl.sql_exec_id FROM v$session_longops vl LEFT JOIN v$session vs ON vl.sid =vs.sid AND vl.serial#=vs.serial# WHERE 1 =1 AND vs.status ='ACTIVE' --and username='RAY2_GBL_PROD' AND sofar <> totalwork -- if you want to see active operations only ORDER BY SIGN( sofar - NVL( totalwork, 0 )), vl.last_update_time DESC --target, sid

SELECT sid, serial#, 'SQLDEV:GAUGE:0:100:0:100:' || DECODE( sofar, NULL, 100, DECODE( totalwork, 0, 100, NULL, sofar, ROUND(sofar/totalwork*100,0))) AS progress , username, elapsed_seconds "Elapsed/s", time_remaining "Remaining/s", MESSAGE , NVL( sql_id, '[NULL]' ) AS sql_id , TO_CHAR(last_update_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') last_update_time FROM v$session_longops WHERE 1=1 --and username='RAY2_GBL_PROD' AND sofar <> totalwork -- if you want to see active operations only ORDER BY SIGN( sofar - NVL( totalwork, 0 )), last_update_time DESC --target, sid
SELECT * FROM v$session WHERE sid = :SID AND serial# = :SERIAL#

SELECT s.username , se.event , SUM( total_waits ) total_waits , ROUND( SUM( time_waited )/10, 2 ) "Time waited / s" , AVG( average_wait ) avg_wait , MAX( se.wait_class ) wait_class FROM v$session_event se , v$session s WHERE s.sid = :SID AND s.serial# = :SERIAL# AND se.sid = s.sid --AND se.inst_id = s.inst_id -- AND se.wait_class <> 'Idle' -- AND s.username IS NOT NULL GROUP BY s.username, se.event ORDER BY MAX( DECODE( se.wait_class, 'Idle', 1, 0 )), "Time waited / s" DESC
select * from v$sql where SQL_ID = :SQL_ID

-- Displays SQL plans from all cluster nodes when on RAC. -- Captured while still in memory. Metrics below are for ALL executions of each child cursor. -- If STATISTICS_LEVEL was set to ALL at the time of the hard-parse then A-Rows column is populated. SELECT RPAD('SQL_ID: '||v.sql_id, 13)||' '||RPAD('Child: '||v.child_number, 11) inst_child, t.plan_table_output FROM v$sql v , TABLE( DBMS_XPLAN.DISPLAY('v$sql_plan_statistics_all', NULL, 'ADVANCED ALLSTATS ALL' , ' sql_id = '''||v.sql_id||''' AND child_number = '||v.child_number)) t WHERE v.sql_id = NVL( :SQL_ID, 'NULL!' ) AND v.loaded_versions > 0

SELECT CASE WHEN :SQL_ID = '[NULL]' THEN TO_CLOB( 'SQL_ID IS NULL' ) ELSE dbms_sqltune.report_sql_monitor( type=>'TEXT', sql_id => :SQL_ID , SESSION_ID => :SID, SESSION_SERIAL => :SERIAL#, SQL_EXEC_ID => :SQL_EXEC_ID ) END AS report FROM dual

SELECT CASE WHEN :SQL_ID = '[NULL]' THEN TO_CLOB( 'SQL_ID IS NULL' ) ELSE dbms_sqltune.report_sql_monitor( type=>'EM', sql_id => :SQL_ID , SESSION_ID => :SID, SESSION_SERIAL => :SERIAL#, SQL_EXEC_ID => :SQL_EXEC_ID ) END AS report FROM dual

SELECT -- session info a.inst_id INST_ID, a.username ora_user, a.osuser os_user, --b.spid ora_pid, a.sid SID, a.serial# serial#, --ROUND(b.pga_used_mem/1024/1024,3) pga_used_mb, DECODE(a.command, 0,NULL, 1,'CRE TAB', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CRE CLUSTER', 5,'ALT CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DRP CLUSTER', 9,'CRE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALT INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CRE SEQ', 14,'ALT SEQ', 15,'ALT TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQ', 17,'GRANT', 18,'REVOKE', 19,'CRE SYN', 20,'DROP SYN', 21,'CRE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CRE PROC', 25,'ALT PROC', 26,'LOCK TABLE', 28,'RENAME', 29,'COMMENT', 30,'AUDIT', 31,'NOAUDIT', 32,'CRE DBLINK', 33,'DROP DBLINK', 34,'CRE DB', 35,'ALTER DB', 36,'CRE RBS', 37,'ALT RBS', 38,'DROP RBS', 39,'CRE TBLSPC', 40,'ALT TBLSPC', 41,'DROP TBLSPC', 42,'ALT SESSION', 43,'ALT USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXEC', 48,'SET XACTN', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CRE USER', 52,'CRE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CRE SCHEMA', 57,'CRE CTLFILE', 58,'ALTER TRACING', 59,'CRE TRIGGER', 60,'ALT TRIGGER', 61,'DRP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TAB', 63,'ANALYZE IX', 64, 'ANALYZE CLUS', 65,'CRE PROFILE', 66,'DRP PROFILE', 67,'ALT PROFILE', 68,'DRP PROC', 69,'DRP PROC', 70,'ALT RESOURCE', 71,'CRE SNPLOG', 72,'ALT SNPLOG', 73,'DROP SNPLOG', 74,'CREATE SNAP', 75,'ALT SNAP', 76,'DROP SNAP', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 85,'TRUNC TAB', 86,'TRUNC CLUST', 88,'ALT VIEW', 91,'CRE FUNC', 92,'ALT FUNC', 93,'DROP FUNC', 94,'CRE PKG', 95,'ALT PKG', 96,'DROP PKG', 97,'CRE PKG BODY', 98,'ALT PKG BODY', 99,'DRP PKG BODY', TO_CHAR(a.command)) command, -- client info a.osuser cln_user, a.process cln_pid, a.machine cln_host, SUBSTR(a.program,1,23) prog, --d.job, --ds.what job_name, a.action, -- wait event a.STATE, a.wait_class, a.EVENT event, -- sql info c.sql_id SQL_ID, c.child_number child, plan_hash_value, executions execs, a.last_call_et Waits, ROUND((elapsed_time/DECODE(NVL(executions,0),0,1,executions))/1000000,2) avg_etime_secs, SUBSTR(sql_text,1,100) FROM gv$session a --LEFT JOIN dba_jobs_running d --ON a.sid = d.sid --LEFT JOIN dba_jobs ds --on d.job=ds.job LEFT JOIN gv$sql c ON a.sql_id = c.sql_id AND a.inst_id =c.inst_id AND a.sql_child_number = c.child_number --left join gv$process b --on a.paddr = b.addr --AND a.inst_id =b.inst_id WHERE a.status = 'ACTIVE' -- shows only active sessions --AND a.event <> 'Streams AQ: waiting for messages in the queue' AND a.username = :USERNAME --and a.action<>'waiting for a task' and a.osuser<>'1509991' --and a.osuser='fmdsadm' --AND a.sid != -- ( SELECT DISTINCT sid FROM v$mystat WHERE rownum < 2 -- ) -- don't show this query ORDER BY waits ASC

query.sql: select replace(q.SQL_FULLTEXT,chr(0)) sql_text from gv$session s,gv$sql q where s.sql_address = q.address and s.inst_id = q.inst_id and s.sql_hash_value = q.hash_value and s.sid = :SID and s.inst_id=:INST_ID
select * from table(dbms_xplan.display_cursor(:SQL_ID,nvl(:CHILD,0),'typical +peeked_binds'))
select event,p1,p2, case when p3 = 0 then null else p3 end p3 from gv$session_wait where sid = :SID and inst_id=:INST_ID

select s.SID,s.status,s.username,s.process,s.LOGON_TIME, s.logon_time since,s.server,s.type,p.spid,p.TRACEID, s.serial# from gv$session s, gv$process p where sid = :SID and s.paddr = p.addr and s.inst_id = p.inst_id and s.inst_id=:INST_ID

with locks as( select session_id,lock_type, mode_held,mode_requested,lock_id1,lock_id2,blocking_others from sys.dba_lock), waiters as ( select w.session_id waiting_session, h.session_id holding_session, w.lock_type lock_type, h.mode_held mode_held, w.mode_requested mode_requested, w.lock_id1, w.lock_id2 from locks w, locks h where h.blocking_others = 'Blocking' and h.mode_held != 'None' and h.mode_held != 'Null' and w.mode_requested != 'None' and w.lock_type = h.lock_type and w.lock_id1 = h.lock_id1 and w.lock_id2 = h.lock_id2 and (w.session_id = :SID or h.session_id = :SID)), blockers as( select holding_session waiting_session, to_number(null) holding_session, 'None' lock_type, null mode_held, null mode_requested, null lock_id1, null lock_id2 from waiters minus select waiting_session waiting_session, to_number(null) holding_session, 'None' lock_type, null mode_held, null mode_requested, null lock_id1, null lock_id2 from waiters), waiters_blockers as( select waiting_session,holding_session,lock_type,mode_held,mode_requested,lock_id1,lock_id2 from waiters union all select waiting_session,holding_session,lock_type,mode_held,mode_requested,lock_id1,lock_id2 from blockers), lock_objects as( select session_id,cnt lock_obj_count, case when cnt = 1 then object_name else null end object_name, object_id,owner,object_type from( select session_id,count(distinct object_name) cnt,max(object_name) object_name, max(lo.object_id) object_id, max(ao.owner) owner,max(object_type) object_type from gv$locked_object lo,all_objects ao,waiters_blockers wb where lo.object_id = ao.object_id and (wb.waiting_session = lo.session_id or wb.holding_session = lo.session_id) group by session_id)), wait_block_ses as( select waiting_session,holding_session,lock_type,mode_held,mode_requested, s.username,s.osuser,s.CLIENT_INFO,s.CLIENT_IDENTIFIER,o.object_name,o.owner,o.object_id,module,o.object_type,o.lock_obj_count, decode(s.command, 0,null, 1,'CRE TAB', 2,'INSERT', 3,'SELECT', 4,'CRE CLUSTER', 5,'ALT CLUSTER', 6,'UPDATE', 7,'DELETE', 8,'DRP CLUSTER', 9,'CRE INDEX', 10,'DROP INDEX', 11,'ALT INDEX', 12,'DROP TABLE', 13,'CRE SEQ', 14,'ALT SEQ', 15,'ALT TABLE', 16,'DROP SEQ', 17,'GRANT', 18,'REVOKE', 19,'CRE SYN', 20,'DROP SYN', 21,'CRE VIEW', 22,'DROP VIEW', 23,'VAL INDEX', 24,'CRE PROC', 25,'ALT PROC', TBLSPC', 41,'DROP TBLSPC', 42,'ALT SESSION', 43,'ALT USER', 44,'COMMIT', 45,'ROLLBACK', 46,'SAVEPOINT', 47,'PL/SQL EXEC', 48,'SET XACTN', 49,'SWITCH LOG', 50,'EXPLAIN', 51,'CRE USER', 52,'CRE ROLE', 53,'DROP USER', 54,'DROP ROLE', 55,'SET ROLE', 56,'CRE SCHEMA', 57,'CRE CTLFILE', 58,'ALTER TRACING', 59,'CRE TRIGGER', 60,'ALT TRIGGER', 61,'DRP TRIGGER', 62,'ANALYZE TAB', 63,'ANALYZE IX', 64,'ANALYZE CLUS', 65,'CRE PROFILE', 66,'DRP PROFILE', 67,'ALT PROFILE', 68,'DRP PROC', 69,'DRP PROC', 70,'ALT RESOURCE', 71,'CRE SNPLOG', 72,'ALT SNPLOG', 73,'DROP SNPLOG', 74,'CREATE SNAP', 75,'ALT SNAP', 76,'DROP SNAP', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 79,'ALTER ROLE', 85,'TRUNC TAB', 86,'TRUNC CLUST', 88,'ALT VIEW', 91,'CRE FUNC', 92,'ALT FUNC', 93,'DROP FUNC', 94,'CRE PKG', 95,'ALT PKG', 96,'DROP PKG', 97,'CRE PKG BODY', 98,'ALT PKG BODY', 99,'DRP PKG BODY', to_char(s.command)) command from waiters_blockers wb, gv$session s, lock_objects o where s.sid = wb.waiting_session and s.inst_id=:INST_ID and o.session_id(+) = wb.waiting_session ) select case when holding_session is null then 'Lock' else 'Lock Waiting' end status, waiting_session, username, object_name, object_id,owner,object_type from wait_block_ses start with holding_session is null connect by prior waiting_session = holding_session

SELECT 'SQLDEV:GAUGE:0:100:0:100:' || DECODE( sofar, NULL, 100, DECODE( totalwork, 0, 100, NULL, sofar, ROUND(sofar/totalwork*100,0))) as progress --, username , elapsed_seconds "Elapsed/s" , time_remaining "Remaining/s" , message -- , sid, serial#, NVL( sql_id, '[NULL]' ) AS sql_id , to_char(last_update_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') last_update_time , sql_exec_start, sql_plan_line_id --, sql_exec_id FROM gv$session_longops WHERE sql_id =:SQL_ID and inst_id=:INST_ID and sid=:SID AND time_remaining > 0 -- AND sofar <> totalwork -- if you want to see active operations only ORDER BY SIGN( sofar - NVL( totalwork, 0 )), last_update_time DESC
SELECT 'ALTER SYSTEM KILL SESSION '''||v.SID||','||v.SERIAL#||''' IMMEDIATE;' as sql_st FROM gV$SESSION v WHERE v.sid = :SID and inst_id=:INST_ID

-- temp space and memory usage SELECT s.sid,s.serial#, s.sql_id, operation_id, w.operation_type, ROUND(w.actual_mem_used/1024/1024,2) mem_mb, ROUND(w.tempseg_size /1024/1024,2) temp_mb, w.TABLESPACE temp_tbs FROM gv$session s, gv$sql_workarea_active w WHERE s.sid =w.sid and s.inst_id = w.inst_id and s.inst_id=:INST_ID AND TABLESPACE IS NOT NULL --and s.status='ACTIVE' and S.SID=:SID ORDER BY 1

99,'DRP PKG BODY', TO_CHAR(a.command)) command, -- client info a.osuser cln_user, a.process cln_pid, a.machine cln_host, SUBSTR(a.program,1,23) prog, --d.job, --ds.what job_name, a.action, -- wait event a.STATE, a.wait_class, a.EVENT event, -- sql info c.sql_id SQL_ID, c.child_number child, plan_hash_value, executions execs, a.last_call_et Waits, ROUND((elapsed_time/DECODE(NVL(executions,0),0,1,executions))/1000000,2) avg_etime_secs, SUBSTR(sql_text,1,100) FROM v$session a --LEFT JOIN dba_jobs_running d --ON a.sid = d.sid --LEFT JOIN dba_jobs query.sql: select replace(q.SQL_FULLTEXT,chr(0)) sql_text from gv$session s,gv$sql q where s.sql_address = q.address and s.sql_hash_value = q.hash_value and s.sid = :SID

SELECT sp.inst_id, plan_hash_value,LPAD(' ',4*(DEPTH-1))||operation||' '||options ||' '||object_name ||' '||DECODE(id, 0, 'Cost = '||position) "Query Plan",lpad( CASE WHEN cardinality > 1000000 THEN to_char(trunc(cardinality/1000000)) || 'M' WHEN cardinality > 1000 THEN to_char(trunc(cardinality/1000)) || 'K' ELSE cardinality || ' ' END , 6 , ' ' ) AS "Rows" -- nvl(entries,0) as "Rowsource Time" FROM gv$sql_plan sp /*,(select sql_id, sql_exec_id, sql_plan_line_id, sql_plan_hash_value, count(*) entries from v$active_session_history where sql_id = :SQL_ID and sql_exec_id = (select sql_exec_id from v$active_session_history where sql_id = :SQL_ID and rownum=1) group by sql_id, sql_exec_id, sql_plan_line_id, sql_plan_hash_value ) ash WHERE sp.sql_id = :SQL_ID AND ash.sql_id(+) = sp.sql_id AND ash.sql_plan_line_id(+)= sp.id ORDER by sp.plan_hash_value, sp.id */ WHERE sp.sql_id = :SQL_ID order by sp.plan_hash_value,sp.inst_id,sp.child_address,sp.id

SELECT LPAD(' ',4*(DEPTH-1))||operation||' '||options ||' '||object_name ||' '||DECODE(id, 0, 'Cost = '||position) "Query Plan",lpad( CASE WHEN cardinality > 1000000 THEN to_char(trunc(cardinality/1000000)) || 'M' WHEN cardinality > 1000 THEN to_char(trunc(cardinality/1000)) || 'K' ELSE cardinality || ' ' END , 6 , ' ' ) AS "Rows", nvl(entries,0) as "Rowsource Time(s)" FROM gv$sql_plan sp,(select sql_id, sql_exec_id, sql_plan_line_id, sql_plan_hash_value, count(*) entries from gv$active_session_history where sql_id = :SQL_ID and sql_exec_id = (select sql_exec_id from gv$active_session_history where sql_id = :SQL_ID and rownum=1) group by sql_id, sql_exec_id, sql_plan_line_id, sql_plan_hash_value ) ash WHERE sp.sql_id = :SQL_ID AND ash.sql_id(+) = sp.sql_id AND ash.sql_plan_line_id(+)= sp.id ORDER by sp.plan_hash_value, sp.id
select event,p1,p2, case when p3 = 0 then null else p3 end p3 from gv$session_wait where sid = :SID
select s.SID,s.status,s.username,s.process,s.LOGON_TIME, s.logon_time since,s.server,s.type,p.spid,p.TRACEID, s.serial# from gv$session s, gv$process p where sid = :SID and s.paddr = p.addr
select osuser,machine,terminal,CLIENT_INFO,CLIENT_IDENTIFIER from gv$session where sid = :SID

holding_session, w.lock_type lock_type, h.mode_held mode_held, w.mode_requested mode_requested, w.lock_id1, w.lock_id2 from locks w, locks h where h.blocking_others = 'Blocking' and h.mode_held != waiting_session,holding_session,lock_type,mode_held,mode_requested,lock_id1,lock_id2 from waiters union all select waiting_session,holding_session,lock_type,mode_held,mode_requested,lock_id1,lock_id2 from blockers), lock_objects as( select session_id,cnt lock_obj_count, case when cnt = 1 then object_name else null end object_name, object_id,owner,object_type from( select session_id,count(distinct object_name) cnt,max(object_name) object_name, max(lo.object_id) object_id, max(ao.owner) owner,max(object_type) object_type from gv$locked_object lo,all_objects ao,waiters_blockers wb where 97,'CRE PKG BODY', 98,'ALT PKG BODY', 99,'DRP PKG BODY', to_char(s.command)) command from waiters_blockers wb, gv$session s, lock_objects o where s.sid = wb.waiting_session and o.session_id(+) = wb.waiting_session ) select case when holding_session is null then 'Lock' else 'Lock Waiting' end status, waiting_session, username, object_name, object_id,owner,object_type from wait_block_ses start with holding_session is null connect by prior waiting_session = holding_session

SELECT TRUNC(sl.elapsed_seconds/60) || ':' || MOD(sl.elapsed_seconds,60) elapsed_mins, TRUNC(sl.time_remaining/60) || ':' || MOD(sl.time_remaining,60) remaining_mins, ROUND(sl.sofar/sl.totalwork*100, 2) progress_pct, opname, sql_id, start_time, last_update_time FROM gv$session_longops sl WHERE sql_id =:SQL_ID and sid=:SID AND time_remaining > 0
SELECT 'ALTER SYSTEM KILL SESSION '''||v.SID||','||v.SERIAL#||''' IMMEDIATE;' as sql_st FROM V$SESSION v WHERE v.sid = :SID AND v.STATUS='ACTIVE'

-- temp space and memory usage SELECT s.sid,s.serial#, s.sql_id, operation_id, w.operation_type, ROUND(w.actual_mem_used/1024/1024,2) mem_mb, ROUND(w.tempseg_size /1024/1024,2) temp_mb, w.TABLESPACE temp_tbs FROM v$session s, v$sql_workarea_active w WHERE s.sid =w.sid AND TABLESPACE IS NOT NULL --and s.status='ACTIVE' and S.SID=:SID ORDER BY 1

with switch0 as ( select scb_country ,end_time, reporting_date from scbrpt.scb_job_stats where reporting_date>=sysdate-91 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and scb_country=upper(:country) and job_name ='scb_exec_alm_process' ) SELECT sjs.reporting_date, round(to_number((s0.end_time-sjs.start_time)*24*60),2) bau_ELAPSED_MINS FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats sjs,switch0 s0 where sjs.scb_country=s0.scb_country and sjs.reporting_date=s0.reporting_date and sjs.scb_country=upper(:country) and sjs.job_name ='init_scb_cpy_ext_table_data' and sjs.reporting_date>=sysdate-91 and sjs.reporting_date<=sysdate-1 --group by sjs.scb_country order by 1

display.name: 1 ALM BAU graph - single
display.description: time of completion of group 1 reports in one day for one countries

query.sql: ---- time of completion of group 1 reports in one day for one countries with switch0 as ( select scb_country ,end_time, reporting_date from scbrpt.scb_job_stats where reporting_date>=sysdate-31 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' and scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and lower(job_name) ='scb_exec_alm_process' ) SELECT sjs.reporting_date, round(to_number((s0.end_time-sjs.start_time)*24*60),2) group1_ELAPSED_MINS FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats sjs,switch0 s0 where sjs.scb_country=s0.scb_country and sjs.reporting_date=s0.reporting_date and sjs.scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and upper(sjs.job_name) ='INIT_DASH_CPY_STG_DATA' and sjs.job_success='Y' and sjs.reporting_date>=sysdate-31 and sjs.reporting_date<=sysdate-1 --group by sjs.scb_country order by 1

query.sql: ---- time of completion of group 1 reports in one day for one countries with switch0 as ( select scb_country ,end_time, reporting_date from scbrpt.scb_job_stats where reporting_date>=sysdate-31 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' and scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and (lower(job_name) ='init_scb_check_errors_parallel' or lower(job_name) ='init_scb_fermat_check_errors') ) SELECT sjs.reporting_date, round(to_number((s0.end_time-sjs.start_time)*24*60),2) group1_ELAPSED_MINS FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats sjs,switch0 s0 where sjs.scb_country=s0.scb_country and sjs.reporting_date=s0.reporting_date and sjs.scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and lower(sjs.job_name) ='init_scb_cpy_ext_table_data' and sjs.job_success='Y' and sjs.reporting_date>=sysdate-31 and sjs.reporting_date<=sysdate-1 --group by sjs.scb_country order by 1

query.sql: -- avg time of completion of group 1 reports in 30 days for all countries with switch0 as ( select scb_country ,end_time, reporting_date from scbrpt.scb_job_stats where reporting_date>=sysdate-31 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' --and scb_country='HK' and job_name ='scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_rep_load_rbau' AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) ) SELECT sjs.scb_country, round(avg(to_number((s0.end_time-sjs.start_time)*24*60)),2) AVG_MINS FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats sjs,switch0 s0 where sjs.scb_country=s0.scb_country and sjs.reporting_date=s0.reporting_date --and sjs.scb_country='HK' and sjs.job_name ='init_scb_cpy_ext_table_data' and sjs.job_success='Y' and sjs.reporting_date>=sysdate-31 and sjs.reporting_date<=sysdate-1 AND ( (sjs.scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(sjs.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (sjs.scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(sjs.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (sjs.scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(sjs.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (sjs.scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(sjs.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) group by sjs.scb_country order by 2 desc

query.sql: select * from ( with switch0 as ( select scb_country ,end_time, reporting_date from scbrpt.scb_job_stats where --reporting_date>=sysdate-31 --and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 --and job_success='Y' --and scb_country='HK' and job_name ='scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_rep_load_rbau' AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) ) SELECT sjs.scb_country, trim(TO_CHAR(sjs.reporting_date,'YYYY')) country_year, round(avg(to_number((s0.end_time-sjs.start_time)*24*60)),2) AVG_MINS FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats sjs,switch0 s0 where sjs.scb_country=s0.scb_country and sjs.reporting_date=s0.reporting_date --and sjs.scb_country='HK' and sjs.job_name ='init_scb_cpy_ext_table_data' and sjs.job_success='Y' --and sjs.reporting_date>=sysdate-31 --and sjs.reporting_date<=sysdate-1 AND ( (sjs.scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(sjs.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (sjs.scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(sjs.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (sjs.scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(sjs.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (sjs.scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(sjs.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) group by sjs.scb_country,trim(TO_CHAR(sjs.reporting_date,'YYYY')) order by 1,2 ) a where a.avg_mins>0 order by 1,2

query.sql: ---- time of completion of group 1 reports in one day for one countries WITH switch0 AS (SELECT scb_country , end_time, reporting_date FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats WHERE reporting_date >=sysdate-361 AND reporting_date <=sysdate AND job_success ='Y' AND scb_country =UPPER(trim(REPLACE(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) AND lower(job_name) ='scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_rep_load_rbau' AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) ) SELECT sjs.reporting_date, ROUND(to_number((s0.end_time-sjs.start_time)*24*60),2) group1_ELAPSED_MINS FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats sjs, switch0 s0 WHERE sjs.scb_country =s0.scb_country AND sjs.reporting_date =s0.reporting_date AND sjs.scb_country =UPPER(trim(REPLACE(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) AND lower(sjs.job_name) ='init_scb_cpy_ext_table_data' --and lower(sjs.job_name) ='scb_fermat_gather_stats' --and lower(sjs.job_name) ='scb_exec_alm_process' AND sjs.job_success ='Y' AND sjs.reporting_date >=sysdate-361 AND sjs.reporting_date <=sysdate AND ( (sjs.scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(sjs.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (sjs.scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(sjs.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (sjs.scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(sjs.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (sjs.scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(sjs.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) and not (sjs.scb_country = 'IN' and sjs.reporting_date='31-Aug-16') --group by sjs.scb_country ORDER BY 1
