query.sql:
-- drilldown of group 1 report timing with rbau as (SELECT reporting_date, --start_time stime end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and lower(job_name) = 'scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_rep_load_rbau' and reporting_date>=sysdate-61 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) ), rbliq as (SELECT reporting_date, --start_time stime end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and lower(job_name) = 'scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_rep_load_rliq' and reporting_date>=sysdate-61 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) ), postobi as (SELECT reporting_date, --start_time stime end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and ( (lower(job_name) ='scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_batch_end' and scb_country in ('KR','HK','CN','SG','BD','LK','KE','GH','NP','ZA','BW','NG','ZW','PH','VN')) or (lower(job_name) ='scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_post_load' and scb_country in ('JP','BN','TW','MY','ID','TH','IN','PK','AE','OM','QA','BH','JO','EU','US')) ) and reporting_date>=sysdate-61 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) ), C1e as (SELECT reporting_date, end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --and (lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_parallel' --or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_fermat_check_errors' --or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_tables') and ( ( scb_country in ('VN','BD','NP','PH','LK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','GH') and lower(job_name) = 'pack_scb_data_adjustment.scb_common_data_adjustments') or ( scb_country not in ('VN','BD','NP','PH','LK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','GH') and (lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_parallel' or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_fermat_check_errors') ) ) and reporting_date>=sysdate-61 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) ), C2e as (SELECT reporting_date, end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and lower(job_name) = 'scb_exec_alm_process' and reporting_date>=sysdate-61 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) ) SELECT c0.scb_country COUNTRY, --c0.reporting_date, to_char(c0.reporting_date,'YYYYMMDD') rdate, --c0.reporting_date RD, to_char(c0.start_time+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') etl_start_time_SGT, to_char(c1e.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') etl_end_time_SGT, round((c1e.etime-c0.start_time)*24*60,0) ETL_mins, to_char(c2e.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') bau_end_time_SGT, round((c2e.etime-c1e.etime)*24*60,0) BAU_mins,
to_char(rbau.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') rbau_end_time_SGT, round((rbau.etime-c2e.etime)*24*60,0) RBAU_mins, round((rbau.etime-c0.start_time)*24*60,0) group1_total_mins,
to_char(rliq.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') rliq_end_time_SGT, round((rliq.etime-rbau.etime)*24*60,0) rliq_mins, round((postobi.etime-c0.start_time)*24*60,0) group2_total_mins,
to_char(postobi.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') postobiee_end_time_SGT, round((postobi.etime-rliq.etime)*24*60,0) postobiee_mins, round((postobi.etime-c0.start_time)*24*60,0) group3_total_mins,
round((postobi.etime-c0.start_time)*24*60,0) total_mins,
c0.reporting_date RD FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats c0 left join rbau on c0.reporting_date=rbau.reporting_date left join c1e on c0.reporting_date=c1e.reporting_date left join c2e on c0.reporting_date=c2e.reporting_date left join rliq on c0.reporting_date=rliq.reporting_date left join postobi on c0.reporting_date=postobi.reporting_date where c0.scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and c0.job_name = 'init_scb_cpy_ext_table_data' --and c0.reporting_date='05-Sep-16' --and c0.reporting_date=rbau.reporting_date --and c0.reporting_date=c1e.reporting_date --and c0.reporting_date=c2e.reporting_date and c0.reporting_date>=sysdate-61 and c0.reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and c0.job_success='Y' AND ( (c0.scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (c0.scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (c0.scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (c0.scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) order by c0.reporting_date desc

display.name: 1 ALM job graph - 1 job all countries
display.description: time of completion of single job in 30 days for all countries

query.sql: SELECT scb_country COUNTRYNAME, --JOB_NAME JOBNAME, Round(avg(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS) / 60, 0) AS avg_Mins FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where reporting_date>=sysdate-11 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and upper(job_name) =UPPER(trim(replace(:JOB,chr(100),''))) and job_success='Y' AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) group by scb_country,job_name order by 2 desc

display.name: 2 ALM Group 1 reports - all countries yearly

query.sql: -- alm group 1 all countries yearly select * from ( with switch0 as ( select scb_country ,end_time, reporting_date from scbrpt.scb_job_stats where --reporting_date>=sysdate-31 --and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 --and job_success='Y' --and scb_country='HK' and job_name ='scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_rep_load_rbau' AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) ) SELECT sjs.scb_country, trim(TO_CHAR(sjs.reporting_date,'YYYY')) country_year, round(avg(to_number((s0.end_time-sjs.start_time)*24*60)),2) AVG_MINS FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats sjs,switch0 s0 where sjs.scb_country=s0.scb_country and sjs.reporting_date=s0.reporting_date --and sjs.scb_country='HK' and sjs.job_name ='init_scb_cpy_ext_table_data' and sjs.job_success='Y' --and sjs.reporting_date>=sysdate-31 --and sjs.reporting_date<=sysdate-1 AND ( (sjs.scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(sjs.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (sjs.scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(sjs.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (sjs.scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(sjs.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (sjs.scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(sjs.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) group by sjs.scb_country,trim(TO_CHAR(sjs.reporting_date,'YYYY')) order by 1,2 ) a where a.avg_mins>0

display.name: 2 ALM job status - 1 job 1 country
display.description: Display Dispaly ALM batch job status - average of single job in 30 days

query.sql: -- max, min and average of last 30 days SELECT scb_country COUNTRYNAME, JOB_NAME JOBNAME, Round(avg(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS) / 60, 0) AS avg_Mins FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where --scb_country=UPPER(:COUNTRY) --scb_country=trim(UPPER(:COUNTRY)) upper(scb_country)=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and upper(job_name) = UPPER(trim(:JOB)) and reporting_date>=sysdate-31 --and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) group by job_name,scb_country order by job_name

display.name: 3 ALM job status - all groups Drilldown by country

query.sql: -- drilldown of group 1 report timing with rbau as (SELECT reporting_date, --start_time stime end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and lower(job_name) = 'scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_rep_load_rbau' and reporting_date>=sysdate-361 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') --AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ) ) ), rliq as (SELECT reporting_date, --start_time stime end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and lower(job_name) = 'scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_rep_load_rliq' and reporting_date>=sysdate-361 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') --AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ) ) ), postobi as (SELECT reporting_date, --start_time stime end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and ( (lower(job_name) ='scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_batch_end' and scb_country in ('KR','HK','CN','SG','BD','LK','KE','GH','NP','ZA','BW','NG','ZW','PH','VN')) or (lower(job_name) ='scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_post_load' and scb_country in ('JP','BN','TW','MY','ID','TH','IN','PK','AE','OM','QA','BH','JO','EU','US')) ) and reporting_date>=sysdate-361 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') --AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ) ) ), C1e as (SELECT reporting_date, end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --and (lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_parallel' --or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_fermat_check_errors' --or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_tables') and ( ( scb_country in ('VN','BD','NP','PH','LK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','GH') and lower(job_name) = 'pack_scb_data_adjustment.scb_common_data_adjustments') or (scb_country in ('KR') and lower(job_name) = 'pack_cust_process.cust_adj_time_series') or ( scb_country not in ('VN','BD','NP','PH','LK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','GH','KR') and (lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_parallel' or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_fermat_check_errors') ) ) and reporting_date>=sysdate-361 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') --AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ) ) ), C2e as (SELECT reporting_date, end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and lower(job_name) = 'scb_exec_alm_process' and reporting_date>=sysdate-361 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') --AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ) ) ) SELECT c0.scb_country COUNTRY, --c0.reporting_date, to_char(c0.reporting_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') rdate, --c0.reporting_date RD, to_char(c0.start_time+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') etl_start_time_SGT, to_char(c1e.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') etl_end_time_SGT, round((c1e.etime-c0.start_time)*24*60,0) ETL_mins, to_char(c2e.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') bau_end_time_SGT, round((c2e.etime-c1e.etime)*24*60,0) BAU_mins, --group1 to_char(rbau.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') rbau_end_time_SGT, round((rbau.etime-c2e.etime)*24*60,0) RBAU_mins, round((rbau.etime-c0.start_time)*24*60,0) group1_total_mins, --group2 to_char(rliq.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') rliq_end_time_SGT, round((rliq.etime-rbau.etime)*24*60,0) rliq_mins, --round((rliq.etime-c0.start_time)*24*60,0) group2_total_mins, --group3 to_char(postobi.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') postobiee_end_time_SGT, round((postobi.etime-rliq.etime)*24*60,0) postobiee_mins, --round((postobi.etime-c0.start_time)*24*60,0) group3_total_mins, --total round((postobi.etime-c0.start_time)*24*60,0) total_mins, c0.reporting_date RD FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats c0 left join rbau on c0.reporting_date=rbau.reporting_date left join c1e on c0.reporting_date=c1e.reporting_date left join c2e on c0.reporting_date=c2e.reporting_date left join rliq on c0.reporting_date=rliq.reporting_date left join postobi on c0.reporting_date=postobi.reporting_date where c0.scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and c0.job_name = 'init_scb_cpy_ext_table_data' --and c0.reporting_date='05-Sep-16' --and c0.reporting_date=rbau.reporting_date --and c0.reporting_date=c1e.reporting_date --and c0.reporting_date=c2e.reporting_date and c0.reporting_date>=sysdate-361 and c0.reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and c0.job_success='Y' AND ( (c0.scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (c0.scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (c0.scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (c0.scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') --AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ) ) order by c0.reporting_date desc

with s0 as ( -- max, min and average of last 7 days SELECT scb_country, JOB_NAME, Round(avg(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS) / 60, 2) AS avg_Mins FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where scb_country=:COUNTRY --and job_name = '&job' and reporting_date>=sysdate-361 and reporting_date<sysdate-1 AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) and job_success='Y' group by scb_country,job_name order by scb_country,job_name ) SELECT sjs.REPORTING_DATE, sjs.SCB_COUNTRY, sjs.JOB_NAME, CASE WHEN lower(sjs.job_name) = 'init_scb_cpy_ext_table_data' THEN 'ETL started' WHEN (sjs.scb_country in ('VN','BD','NP','PH','LK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','GH') and lower(sjs.job_name) = 'pack_scb_data_adjustment.scb_common_data_adjustments') THEN 'ETL completed' WHEN (sjs.scb_country in ('KR') and lower(sjs.job_name) = 'pack_cust_process.cust_adj_time_series') THEN 'ETL completed' WHEN (sjs.scb_country not in ('VN','BD','NP','PH','LK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','GH','KR') and (lower(sjs.job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_parallel' or lower(sjs.job_name) = 'init_scb_fermat_check_errors')) THEN 'ETL completed' WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'INIT_DASH_CPY_STG_DATA' THEN 'BAU started' WHEN lower(sjs.job_name) = 'scb_exec_alm_process' THEN 'BAU completed' WHEN lower(sjs.job_name) = 'scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_rep_load_rbau' THEN 'Group1 completed' WHEN lower(sjs.job_name) = 'scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_rep_load_rliq' THEN 'Group2 completed' WHEN lower(sjs.job_name) = 'scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_batch_end' THEN 'Group3 completed' WHEN lower(sjs.job_name) = 'scb_context_drop' THEN 'All completed' END stage, ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) AS ELAPSED_Mins, case when ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) > ROUND(s0.avg_Mins*1.1,2) then '>'||to_char(s0.avg_Mins) --when ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) <= s0.avg_Mins --else --to_char(s0.avg_Mins) end avg_Mins, sjs.START_TIME, sjs.END_TIME --sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS, FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats sjs, s0 WHERE sjs.scb_country =:COUNTRY and sjs.scb_country=s0.scb_country and sjs.job_name=s0.job_name AND sjs.reporting_date=:RD AND sjs.job_success ='Y' --AND (lower(sjs.job_name)<>'ins_scb_file_stats') ORDER BY sjs.start_time

display.name: 3 ALM job status - all groups Drilldown by rd

query.sql: -- drilldown of all groups report timing with rbau as (SELECT reporting_date, --start_time stime scb_country, end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where lower(job_name) = 'scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_rep_load_rbau' and reporting_date=to_date(:rd_yyyymmdd,'yyyymmdd') and job_success='Y' ), rliq as (SELECT reporting_date, --start_time stime scb_country, end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where lower(job_name) = 'scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_rep_load_rliq' and reporting_date=to_date(:rd_yyyymmdd,'yyyymmdd') and job_success='Y' ), postobi as (SELECT reporting_date, --start_time stime scb_country, end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where ( (scb_country in ('KR','HK','CN','SG','BD','LK','KE','GH','NP','ZA','BW','NG','ZW','PH','VN') and lower(job_name) = 'scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_batch_end') or ( scb_country in ('JP','BN','TW','MY','ID','TH','IN','PK','AE','OM','QA','BH','JO','EU','US') and lower(job_name) = 'scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_post_load') ) and reporting_date=to_date(:rd_yyyymmdd,'yyyymmdd') and job_success='Y' ), C1e as (SELECT reporting_date, scb_country, end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where ( (scb_country in ('VN','BD','NP','PH','LK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','GH') and lower(job_name) = 'pack_scb_data_adjustment.scb_common_data_adjustments') or (scb_country in ('KR') and lower(job_name) = 'pack_cust_process.cust_adj_time_series') or ( scb_country not in ('VN','BD','NP','PH','LK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','GH','KR') and (lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_parallel' or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_fermat_check_errors' or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_tables') ) ) and reporting_date=to_date(:rd_yyyymmdd,'yyyymmdd') and job_success='Y' ), C2e as (SELECT reporting_date, scb_country, end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where lower(job_name) = 'scb_exec_alm_process' and reporting_date=to_date(:rd_yyyymmdd,'yyyymmdd') and job_success='Y' ) SELECT c0.scb_country COUNTRY, --c0.reporting_date, to_char(c0.reporting_date,'YYYYMMDD') rdate, --c0.reporting_date RD, to_char(c0.start_time+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') etl_start_time_SGT, to_char(c1e.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') etl_end_time_SGT, round((c1e.etime-c0.start_time)*24*60,0) ETL_mins, to_char(c2e.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') bau_end_time_SGT, round((c2e.etime-c1e.etime)*24*60,0) BAU_mins, to_char(rbau.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') rbau_end_time_SGT, round((rbau.etime-c2e.etime)*24*60,0) RBAU_mins, round((rbau.etime-c0.start_time)*24*60,0) group1_total_mins, --group2 to_char(rliq.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') rliq_end_time_SGT, round((rliq.etime-rbau.etime)*24*60,0) rliq_mins, --round((rliq.etime-c0.start_time)*24*60,0) group2_total_mins, --group3 to_char(postobi.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') postobiee_end_time_SGT, round((postobi.etime-rliq.etime)*24*60,0) postobiee_mins, --round((postobi.etime-c0.start_time)*24*60,0) group3_total_mins, --total round((postobi.etime-c0.start_time)*24*60,0) total_mins, c0.reporting_date RD FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats c0 left join rbau on c0.reporting_date=rbau.reporting_date and c0.scb_country=rbau.scb_country left join c1e on c0.reporting_date=c1e.reporting_date and c0.scb_country=c1e.scb_country left join c2e on c0.reporting_date=c2e.reporting_date and c0.scb_country=c2e.scb_country left join rliq on c0.reporting_date=rliq.reporting_date and c0.scb_country=rliq.scb_country left join postobi on c0.reporting_date=postobi.reporting_date and c0.scb_country=postobi.scb_country where c0.job_name = 'init_scb_cpy_ext_table_data' --and c0.reporting_date='05-Sep-16' --and c0.reporting_date=rbau.reporting_date --and c0.reporting_date=c1e.reporting_date --and c0.reporting_date=c2e.reporting_date and c0.reporting_date=to_date(:rd_yyyymmdd,'yyyymmdd') and c0.job_success='Y' order by 3

sjs.job_name=s0.job_name AND sjs.reporting_date=:RD AND sjs.job_success ='Y' --AND (lower(sjs.job_name)<>'ins_scb_file_stats') ORDER BY sjs.start_time

display.name: 3 ALM job status - Group 1 Drilldown - by country

query.sql: -- drilldown of group 1 report timing with rbau as (SELECT reporting_date, --start_time stime end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and lower(job_name) = 'scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_rep_load_rbau' and reporting_date>=sysdate-181 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' --AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) -- OR (scb_country IN ('BD') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) -- OR (scb_country IN ('NP') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) -- OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) ), C1e as (SELECT reporting_date, end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --and (lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_parallel' --or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_fermat_check_errors' --or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_tables') and ( (scb_country in ('VN','BD','NP','PH','LK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','GH') and lower(job_name) = 'pack_scb_data_adjustment.scb_common_data_adjustments') or (scb_country in ('KR') and lower(job_name) = 'pack_cust_process.cust_adj_time_series') or (scb_country in ('HK','SG','EU') and lower(job_name) = 'scb_alm_etl_complete') or (scb_country not in ('VN','BD','NP','PH','LK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','GH','KR','HK','SG','EU') and (lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_parallel' or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_fermat_check_errors' or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_tables') ) ) and reporting_date>=sysdate-181 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' --AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) -- OR (scb_country IN ('BD') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) -- OR (scb_country IN ('NP') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) -- OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) ), C2e as (SELECT reporting_date, end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and lower(job_name) in ( 'scb_exec_alm_process','scb_exec_alm_process_bau') and reporting_date>=sysdate-181 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' --AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) -- OR (scb_country IN ('BD') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) -- OR (scb_country IN ('NP') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) -- OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) ) SELECT c0.scb_country COUNTRY, --c0.reporting_date, to_char(c0.reporting_date,'YYYYMMDD') RDATE, --c0.reporting_date RD, to_char(c0.start_time+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') etl_start_time_SGT, to_char(c1e.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') etl_end_time_SGT, round((c1e.etime-c0.start_time)*24*60,0) ETL_mins, to_char(c2e.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') bau_end_time_SGT, round((c2e.etime-c1e.etime)*24*60,0) BAU_mins, to_char(rbau.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') rbau_end_time_SGT, round((rbau.etime-c2e.etime)*24*60,0) RBAU_mins, round((rbau.etime-c0.start_time)*24*60,0) group1_total_mins, c0.reporting_date RD FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats c0 left join rbau on c0.reporting_date=rbau.reporting_date left join c1e on c0.reporting_date=c1e.reporting_date left join c2e on c0.reporting_date=c2e.reporting_date where c0.scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and c0.job_name = 'init_scb_cpy_ext_table_data' --and c0.reporting_date='05-Sep-16' --and c0.reporting_date=rbau.reporting_date --and c0.reporting_date=c1e.reporting_date --and c0.reporting_date=c2e.reporting_date and c0.reporting_date>=sysdate-181 and c0.reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and c0.job_success='Y' --AND ( (c0.scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) -- OR (c0.scb_country IN ('BD') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) -- OR (c0.scb_country IN ('NP') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) -- OR (c0.scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) order by c0.reporting_date desc

with s0 as ( -- max, min and average of last 7 days SELECT scb_country, JOB_NAME, Round(avg(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS) / 60, 2) AS avg_Mins, Round(median(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS) / 60, 2) AS median_Mins FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where scb_country=UPPER(:COUNTRY) --and job_name = '&job' and reporting_date>=sysdate-361 and reporting_date<sysdate-1 AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) and job_success='Y' group by scb_country,job_name order by scb_country,job_name ) SELECT sjs.REPORTING_DATE, sjs.SCB_COUNTRY, sjs.JOB_NAME, CASE WHEN lower(sjs.job_name) = 'init_scb_cpy_ext_table_data' THEN 'ETL started' WHEN (sjs.scb_country in ('VN','BD','NP','PH','LK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','GH') and lower(sjs.job_name) = 'pack_scb_data_adjustment.scb_common_data_adjustments') THEN 'ETL completed' WHEN (sjs.scb_country in ('KR') and lower(sjs.job_name) = 'pack_cust_process.cust_adj_time_series') THEN 'ETL completed' WHEN (sjs.scb_country in ('HK','SG','EU') and lower(sjs.job_name) = 'scb_alm_etl_complete') THEN 'ETL completed' WHEN (sjs.scb_country not in ('VN','BD','NP','PH','LK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','GH','KR','HK','SG','EU') and (lower(sjs.job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_parallel' or lower(sjs.job_name) = 'init_scb_fermat_check_errors')) THEN 'ETL completed' WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'INIT_DASH_CPY_STG_DATA' THEN 'BAU started' WHEN lower(sjs.job_name) = 'scb_exec_alm_process' THEN 'BAU completed' WHEN lower(sjs.job_name) = 'scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_rep_load_rbau' THEN 'Group1 completed' WHEN lower(sjs.job_name) = 'scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_rep_load_rliq' THEN 'Group2 completed' WHEN lower(sjs.job_name) = 'scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_batch_end' THEN 'Group3 completed' WHEN lower(sjs.job_name) = 'scb_context_drop' THEN 'All completed' END stage, ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) AS ELAPSED_Mins, case when ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) > ROUND(s0.avg_Mins,2) then '>'||to_char(s0.avg_Mins) --when ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) <= s0.avg_Mins --else --to_char(s0.avg_Mins) end avg_Mins, case when ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) > ROUND(s0.median_Mins,2) then '>'||to_char(s0.median_Mins) --when ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) <= s0.avg_Mins --else --to_char(s0.avg_Mins) end median_Mins, sjs.START_TIME, sjs.END_TIME --sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS, FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats sjs, s0 WHERE sjs.scb_country =UPPER(:COUNTRY) and sjs.scb_country=s0.scb_country and sjs.job_name=s0.job_name AND sjs.reporting_date=:RD AND sjs.job_success ='Y' --AND (lower(sjs.job_name)<>'ins_scb_file_stats') ORDER BY sjs.start_time

with sod as (SELECT reporting_date, scb_country, start_time stime, end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where (lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_cpy_ext_table_data' or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_cpy_ext_table_data_ts') --and reporting_date=to_date(:RDATE,'yyyymmdd') and (reporting_date > sysdate-180) and job_success='Y' and scb_country=UPPER(:COUNTRY) AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE ('VN','BD','NP','PH','LK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','GH') and lower(job_name) = 'pack_scb_data_adjustment.scb_common_data_adjustments') or (scb_country in ('KR') and lower(job_name) = trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN c0.reporting_date,c0.scb_country,round(sum(c0.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS)/60,2) mins FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats c0 left join ce on c0.reporting_date=ce.reporting_date and c0.scb_country=ce.scb_country left join sod on c0.reporting_date=sod.reporting_date and c0.scb_country=sod.scb_country where (c0.reporting_date > sysdate-180) and c0.job_success='Y' and (c0.scb_country=sod.scb_country and c0.reporting_date=sod.reporting_date and c0.start_time>=sod.stime) and (c0.scb_country=ce.scb_country and c0.reporting_date=ce.reporting_date and c0.end_time<=ce.etime) --and c0.scb_country in ('HK','MY','EU','SG') and c0.scb_country=UPPER(:COUNTRY) AND ( (c0.scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (c0.scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (c0.scb_country IN ('NP') AND display.name: 3 ALM job status - Group 1 Drilldown - by rd

query.sql: -- drilldown of group 1 report timing with rbau as (SELECT reporting_date, --start_time stime scb_country, end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where lower(job_name) = 'scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_rep_load_rbau' and reporting_date=to_date(:RDATE,'yyyymmdd') and job_success='Y' --AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) -- OR (scb_country IN ('BD') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) -- OR (scb_country IN ('NP') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) -- OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) ), C1e as (SELECT reporting_date, scb_country, end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where ( (scb_country in ('VN','BD','NP','PH','LK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','GH') and lower(job_name) = 'pack_scb_data_adjustment.scb_common_data_adjustments') or (scb_country in ('KR') and lower(job_name) = 'pack_cust_process.cust_adj_time_series') or (scb_country in ('HK','SG','EU') and lower(job_name) = 'scb_alm_etl_complete') or ( scb_country not in ('VN','BD','NP','PH','LK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','GH','KR','HK','SG','EU') and (lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_parallel' or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_fermat_check_errors' or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_tables') ) ) and reporting_date=to_date(:RDATE,'yyyymmdd') and job_success='Y' --AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) -- OR (scb_country IN ('BD') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) -- OR (scb_country IN ('NP') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) -- OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) ), C2e as (SELECT reporting_date, scb_country, end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where lower(job_name) in ( 'scb_exec_alm_process','scb_exec_alm_process_bau') and reporting_date=to_date(:RDATE,'yyyymmdd') and job_success='Y' --AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) -- OR (scb_country IN ('BD') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) -- OR (scb_country IN ('NP') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) -- OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) ) SELECT c0.scb_country COUNTRY, --c0.reporting_date, to_char(c0.reporting_date,'YYYYMMDD') rdate, --c0.reporting_date RD, to_char(c0.start_time+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') etl_start_time_SGT, to_char(c1e.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') etl_end_time_SGT, round((c1e.etime-c0.start_time)*24*60,0) ETL_mins, to_char(c2e.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') bau_end_time_SGT, round((c2e.etime-c1e.etime)*24*60,0) BAU_mins, to_char(rbau.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') rbau_end_time_SGT, round((rbau.etime-c2e.etime)*24*60,0) RBAU_mins, round((rbau.etime-c0.start_time)*24*60,0) group1_total_mins, c0.reporting_date RD FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats c0 left join rbau on c0.reporting_date=rbau.reporting_date and c0.scb_country=rbau.scb_country left join c1e on c0.reporting_date=c1e.reporting_date and c0.scb_country=c1e.scb_country left join c2e on c0.reporting_date=c2e.reporting_date and c0.scb_country=c2e.scb_country where (c0.job_name = 'init_scb_cpy_ext_table_data' or c0.job_name = 'init_scb_cpy_ext_table_data_ts') --and c0.reporting_date='05-Sep-16' --and c0.reporting_date=rbau.reporting_date --and c0.reporting_date=c1e.reporting_date --and c0.reporting_date=c2e.reporting_date and c0.reporting_date=to_date(:RDATE,'yyyymmdd') and c0.job_success='Y' --AND ( (c0.scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) -- OR (c0.scb_country IN ('BD') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) -- OR (c0.scb_country IN ('NP') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) -- OR (c0.scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) order by 3

with s0 as ( -- max, min and average of last 7 days SELECT scb_country, JOB_NAME, Round(avg(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS) / 60, 2) AS AVG_Mins, Round(median(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS) / 60, 2) AS Median_Mins FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where scb_country=:COUNTRY --and job_name = '&job' and reporting_date>=sysdate-361 and reporting_date<sysdate-1 AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) and job_success='Y' group by scb_country,job_name order by scb_country,job_name ) SELECT sjs.REPORTING_DATE, sjs.SCB_COUNTRY, sjs.JOB_NAME, CASE WHEN (lower(sjs.job_name) = 'init_scb_cpy_ext_table_data' or lower(sjs.job_name) = 'init_scb_cpy_ext_table_data_ts') THEN 'ETL started' WHEN (sjs.scb_country in ('VN','BD','NP','PH','LK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','GH') and lower(sjs.job_name) = 'pack_scb_data_adjustment.scb_common_data_adjustments') THEN 'ETL completed' WHEN (sjs.scb_country in ('KR') and lower(sjs.job_name) = 'pack_cust_process.cust_adj_time_series') THEN 'ETL completed' WHEN (sjs.scb_country in ('HK','SG','EU') and lower(sjs.job_name) = 'scb_alm_etl_complete') THEN 'ETL completed' WHEN (sjs.scb_country not in ('VN','BD','NP','PH','LK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','GH','KR','HK','SG','EU') and (lower(sjs.job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_parallel' or lower(sjs.job_name) = 'init_scb_fermat_check_errors')) THEN 'ETL completed' WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'INIT_DASH_CPY_STG_DATA' THEN 'BAU started' WHEN lower(sjs.job_name) in ('scb_exec_alm_process','scb_exec_alm_process_bau') THEN 'BAU completed' WHEN lower(sjs.job_name) = 'scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_rep_load_rbau' THEN 'Group1 completed' WHEN lower(sjs.job_name) = 'scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_rep_load_rliq' THEN 'Group2 completed' WHEN lower(sjs.job_name) = 'scb_pack_obi_daily_load.scb_obi_batch_end' THEN 'Group3 completed' WHEN lower(sjs.job_name) = 'scb_context_drop' THEN 'All completed' END stage, ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) AS ELAPSED_Mins, case when ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) > ROUND(s0.avg_Mins,2) then '>'||to_char(s0.avg_Mins) --when ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) <= s0.avg_Mins --else --to_char(s0.avg_Mins) end avg_Mins, case when ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) > ROUND(s0.Median_Mins,2) then '>'||to_char(s0.Median_Mins) --when ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) <= s0.avg_Mins --else --to_char(s0.avg_Mins) end Median_Mins, sjs.START_TIME, sjs.END_TIME --sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS, FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats sjs, s0 WHERE sjs.scb_country =:COUNTRY and sjs.scb_country=s0.scb_country and sjs.job_name=s0.job_name AND sjs.reporting_date=:RD AND sjs.job_success ='Y' --AND (lower(sjs.job_name)<>'ins_scb_file_stats') ORDER BY sjs.start_time

with sod as (SELECT reporting_date, scb_country, start_time stime, end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where (lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_cpy_ext_table_data' or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_cpy_ext_table_data_ts') and scb_country=UPPER(:COUNTRY) --and reporting_date=to_date(:RDATE,'yyyymmdd') and (reporting_date > sysdate-180) and job_success='Y' AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) ), ce as (SELECT reporting_date, scb_country, start_time stime, end_time etime FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats where ( (scb_country in ('VN','BD','NP','PH','LK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','GH') and lower(job_name) = 'pack_scb_data_adjustment.scb_common_data_adjustments') or (scb_country in ('KR') and lower(job_name) = 'pack_cust_process.cust_adj_time_series') or ( scb_country not in ('VN','BD','NP','PH','LK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','GH','KR') and (lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_parallel' or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_fermat_check_errors' or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_tables') ) AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) ) --and reporting_date=to_date(:RDATE,'yyyymmdd') and (reporting_date > sysdate-180) and job_success='Y' and scb_country=UPPER(:COUNTRY) ) select c0.reporting_date,c0.scb_country,round(sum(c0.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS)/60,2) mins FROM scbrpt.scb_job_stats c0 left join ce on c0.reporting_date=ce.reporting_date and c0.scb_country=ce.scb_country left join sod on c0.reporting_date=sod.reporting_date and c0.scb_country=sod.scb_country where (c0.reporting_date > sysdate-180) and c0.job_success='Y' and (c0.scb_country=sod.scb_country and c0.reporting_date=sod.reporting_date and c0.start_time>=sod.stime) and (c0.scb_country=ce.scb_country and c0.reporting_date=ce.reporting_date and c0.end_time<=ce.etime) --and c0.scb_country in ('HK','MY','EU','SG') and c0.scb_country=UPPER(:COUNTRY) AND ( (c0.scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (c0.scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (c0.scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (c0.scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) ) group by c0.reporting_date,c0.scb_country order by 1 desc

display.name: 4 RAY job status - 1 job 1 country
display.description: Display Dispaly ALM batch job status - average of single job in 30 days

query.sql: -- max, min and average of last 30 days SELECT scb_country COUNTRYNAME, JOB_NAME JOBNAME, Round(avg(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS) / 60, 0) AS avg_Mins FROM fmtrpt_b3l_prod.SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS where --scb_country=UPPER(:COUNTRY) --scb_country=trim(UPPER(:COUNTRY)) scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and job_name = UPPER(:JOB_NAME) and reporting_date>=sysdate-31 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_status='Y' and trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') group by job_name,scb_country

display.name: Job Stats
display.description: Dispaly ALM batch job status - single job in 30 days

query.sql: SELECT REPORTING_DATE, Round(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) AS ELAPSED_Mins FROM fmtrpt_b3l_prod.SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS where scb_country=:COUNTRYNAME and job_name in (:JOBNAME) and reporting_date>=sysdate-181 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_status='Y' AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) --OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US')) ) order by REPORTING_DATE

SELECT Round(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) AS ELAPSED_Mins, REPORTING_DATE FROM fmtrpt_b3l_prod.SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS where scb_country=:COUNTRYNAME and job_name in (:JOBNAME) and reporting_date>=sysdate-181 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_status='Y' AND ( (scb_country IN ('AE','OM','BH','JO','QA') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday')) OR (scb_country IN ('BD') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('friday','saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('NP') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday')) OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US') AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday')) --OR (scb_country IN ('JP','KR','MY','SG','CN','HK','TW','PH','BN','ID','TH','VN','NP','IN','LK','PK','KE','BW','ZA','ZW','NG','EU','GH','US')) ) order by REPORTING_DATE

display.name: 4 RAY job status - 1 job all countries

query.sql: -- max, min and average of last 30 days SELECT scb_country COUNTRYNAME, JOB_NAME JOBNAME, Round(avg(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS) / 60, 0) AS avg_Mins FROM fmtrpt_b3l_prod.SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS where --scb_country=UPPER(:COUNTRY) --scb_country=trim(UPPER(:COUNTRY)) --upper(scb_country)=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --upper(job_name) like 'RAY_'||scb_country||'_'||UPPER(:JOB) upper(job_name) like UPPER(:JOB) and reporting_date>=sysdate-31 --and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_status='Y' and trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') group by job_name,scb_country order by job_name
