SELECT REPORTING_DATE, Round(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) AS ELAPSED_Mins FROM fmtrpt_b3l_prod.SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS where scb_country=:COUNTRYNAME and job_name in (:JOBNAME) and reporting_date>=sysdate-181 --and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_status='Y' order by REPORTING_DATE

display.name: 4 RAY job status - all jobs 1 country

query.sql: -- max, min and average of last 30 days SELECT scb_country COUNTRYNAME, JOB_NAME JOBNAME, Round(avg(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS) / 60, 0) AS avg_Mins FROM fmtrpt_b3l_prod.SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS where --scb_country=UPPER(:COUNTRY) --scb_country=trim(UPPER(:COUNTRY)) upper(scb_country)=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --upper(job_name) = 'RAY_'||scb_country||'_'||UPPER(:JOB) and reporting_date>=sysdate-31 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_status='Y' and trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') group by job_name,scb_country order by 3 desc

display.name: Job Stats
display.description: Dispaly ALM batch job status - single job in 180 days

query.sql: SELECT REPORTING_DATE, Round(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) AS ELAPSED_Mins FROM fmtrpt_b3l_prod.SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS where scb_country=:COUNTRYNAME and job_name in (:JOBNAME) and reporting_date>=sysdate-181 --and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_status='Y' order by REPORTING_DATE

display.name: 4 RAY job status - RRT Drilldown - by country

query.sql: -- drilldown of RRT report timing WITH rrt AS (SELECT reporting_date, --start_time stime end_time etime, elapsed_time_secs FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS WHERE scb_country=UPPER(trim(REPLACE(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) AND ( (SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_RRT_PROCESS' AND reporting_date >=sysdate-246 AND reporting_date <=sysdate-1) OR (SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP','SOLO') AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_ALMM_' ||scb_country ||'_RRT' AND reporting_date >=sysdate-246 AND reporting_date <=sysdate-1) OR (SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP') AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_FSB2_RRT' AND reporting_date >=sysdate-246 AND reporting_date <=sysdate-1) OR (upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_RRT_RUN' AND reporting_date>=sysdate-246 AND reporting_date<=sysdate-1) ) AND job_status ='Y' --AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ), etl AS (SELECT reporting_date, end_time etime, elapsed_time_secs FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS WHERE scb_country=UPPER(trim(REPLACE(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --and (lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_parallel' --or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_fermat_check_errors' --or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_tables') AND upper(job_name)='RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_ETL_GLREC_MAPPING' AND reporting_date>=sysdate-246 AND reporting_date<=sysdate-1 AND job_status ='Y' --AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ), ce AS (SELECT reporting_date, end_time etime, elapsed_time_secs FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS WHERE scb_country =UPPER(trim(REPLACE(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_CHECK_ERROR1' AND reporting_date>=sysdate-246 AND reporting_date<=sysdate-1 AND job_status ='Y' -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ), b3l AS (SELECT reporting_date, start_time, end_time etime, elapsed_time_secs FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS WHERE scb_country =UPPER(trim(REPLACE(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_B3LR_PROCESS' AND ((SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP','SOLO') AND reporting_date>=sysdate-246 AND reporting_date<=sysdate-1) OR (reporting_date>=sysdate-246 AND reporting_date<=sysdate-1)) AND job_status ='Y' -- AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ) SELECT c0.scb_country COUNTRY, --c0.reporting_date, TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') RDATE, --c0.reporting_date RD, TO_CHAR(c0.start_time+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') etl_start_time_SGT, CASE WHEN C0.SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP','SOLO') THEN TO_CHAR(c0.end_time+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(etl.etime +8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') END etl_end_time_SGT, CASE WHEN C0.SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP','SOLO') THEN ROUND((c0.end_time-c0.start_time)*24*60,0) ELSE ROUND((etl.etime -c0.start_time)*24*60,0) END ETL_mins, TO_CHAR(ce.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') ce_end_time_SGT, CASE WHEN C0.SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' OR C0.SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP','SOLO') THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((ce.etime-etl.etime)*24*60,0) END CE_mins, TO_CHAR(b3l.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') b3l_end_time_SGT, ROUND(b3l.elapsed_time_secs/60,0) b3l_mins, --group1 TO_CHAR(rrt.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') rrt_end_time_SGT, ROUND(rrt.elapsed_time_secs/60,0) rrt_mins, ROUND((rrt.etime -c0.start_time)*24*60,0) total_mins, c0.reporting_date RD FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS c0 LEFT JOIN rrt ON c0.reporting_date=rrt.reporting_date LEFT JOIN b3l ON c0.reporting_date=b3l.reporting_date LEFT JOIN etl ON c0.reporting_date=etl.reporting_date LEFT JOIN ce ON c0.reporting_date=ce.reporting_date WHERE c0.scb_country=UPPER(trim(REPLACE(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) AND ((C0.SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(c0.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||c0.scb_country ||'_ETL_COMMLKP') OR (C0.SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP') AND upper(c0.job_name) = 'RAY_GB_COPY_T_TABLE_TO_CONSO') OR (C0.SCB_COUNTRY IN ('SOLO') AND upper(c0.job_name) = 'RAY_GB_COPY_T_TABLE_TO_SOLO') OR upper(c0.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||c0.scb_country -- ||'_ETL_ENTITY_LKUP') ||'_ETL_ACBS') AND ((c0.SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP','SOLO') AND c0.reporting_date>=sysdate-246 AND c0.reporting_date<=sysdate-1) OR (c0.reporting_date>=sysdate-246 AND c0.reporting_date<=sysdate-1)) AND c0.job_status ='Y' --AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ORDER BY c0.reporting_date DESC

WITH s0 AS ( -- max, min and average of last 7 days SELECT scb_country, JOB_NAME, ROUND(avg(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS) / 60, 2) AS avg_Mins, ROUND(median(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS) / 60, 2) AS median_Mins FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS WHERE scb_country=:COUNTRY --and job_name = '&job' AND reporting_date>=sysdate-361 AND reporting_date <sysdate-1 AND job_status ='Y' GROUP BY scb_country, job_name ORDER BY scb_country, job_name ) SELECT sjs.REPORTING_DATE, sjs.SCB_COUNTRY, sjs.JOB_NAME, CASE WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_CREATE_CONTEXT' THEN 'Context Creation completed' --WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_'||sjs.scb_country||'_ETL_CTYPES' WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||sjs.scb_country --||'_ETL_ENTITY_LKUP' ||'_ETL_ACBS' THEN 'ETL started' WHEN (sjs.SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_ETL_COMMLKP') THEN 'ETL started' WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_ETL_GLREC_MAPPING' THEN 'ETL completed' WHEN (sjs.SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_ETL_ACONT') THEN 'ETL completed' WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_BUILD_CONTRACT_REF' THEN 'CE started' WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_CHECK_ERROR1' THEN 'CE completed' WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_B3LR_PROCESS' THEN 'LCR completed' WHEN (sjs.SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_LCR_PROCESS') THEN 'LCR completed' WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_RRT_RUN' THEN 'RRT completed' WHEN (sjs.SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_RRT_PROCESS') THEN 'RRT completed' WHEN (sjs.SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP','SOLO') AND upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_ALMM_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_RRT') THEN 'RRT completed' WHEN (sjs.SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP') AND upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_FSB2_RRT') THEN 'RRT completed' WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_LOAD_SCB_ADJUSTMENT_DIM' THEN 'DQ/CP completed' WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_POS1_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_RRT_RERUN' THEN 'All completed' END stage, ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) AS ELAPSED_Mins, CASE WHEN ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) > ROUND(s0.avg_Mins,2) THEN '>' ||TO_CHAR(s0.avg_Mins) --when ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) <= s0.avg_Mins --else --to_char(s0.avg_Mins) END avg_Mins, CASE WHEN ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) > ROUND(s0.median_Mins,2) THEN '>' ||TO_CHAR(s0.median_Mins) --when ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) <= s0.avg_Mins --else --to_char(s0.avg_Mins) END median_Mins, sjs.START_TIME, sjs.END_TIME --sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS, FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS sjs, s0 WHERE sjs.scb_country =:COUNTRY AND sjs.scb_country =s0.scb_country AND sjs.job_name =s0.job_name AND sjs.reporting_date=:RD AND sjs.job_status ='Y' --AND (upper(sjs.job_name)<>'ins_scb_file_stats') ORDER BY sjs.start_TIME

with sod as (SELECT reporting_date, scb_country, job_name, start_time stime FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS where --scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --and (lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_parallel' --or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_fermat_check_errors' --or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_tables') --and upper(job_name)='RAY_'||scb_country||'_ETL_CTYPES' ((SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_ETL_COMMLKP') OR ((SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP') AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_GB_COPY_T_TABLE_TO_CONSO') OR (SCB_COUNTRY IN ('SOLO') AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_GB_COPY_T_TABLE_TO_SOLO')) OR upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country --||'_ETL_ENTITY_LKUP') ||'_ETL_ACBS') and reporting_date>=sysdate-120 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_status='Y' --AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ), etl as (SELECT reporting_date, scb_country, job_name, end_time etime FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --and (lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_parallel' --or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_fermat_check_errors' --or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_tables') --and upper(job_name)='RAY_'||scb_country||'_ETL_GLREC_MAPPING' and ((SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_ETL_ACONT') OR upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_ETL_GLREC_MAPPING') and reporting_date>=sysdate-120 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_status='Y' --AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ), ce as (SELECT reporting_date, scb_country, job_name, end_time etime FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --and upper(job_name) = 'RAY_'||scb_country||'_CHECK_ERROR1' and ((SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_CHECK_ERR') OR upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_CHECK_ERROR1') and reporting_date>=sysdate-120 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_status='Y' --AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ), lcr as (SELECT reporting_date, scb_country, job_name, elapsed_time_secs FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --and upper(job_name) = 'RAY_'||scb_country||'_B3LR_PROCESS' and ((SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_LCR_PROCESS') OR upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_B3LR_PROCESS') and reporting_date>=sysdate-120 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_status='Y' --AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ), rrt as (SELECT reporting_date, scb_country, job_name, elapsed_time_secs FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --and upper(job_name) = 'RAY_'||scb_country||'_RRT_RUN' and ( (SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_RRT_PROCESS') OR (SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP','SOLO') AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_ALMM_' ||scb_country ||'_RRT') OR (SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP') AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_FSB2_RRT') OR upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_RRT_RUN' ) and reporting_date>=sysdate-120 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_status='Y' --AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ) SELECT --to_char(c0.reporting_date,'YYYYMMDD') rdate, sod1.reporting_date, 'ETL' description, round((etl1.etime-sod1.stime)*24*60,0) ETL_mins --round((b3l.etime-etl.etime)*24*60,0) b3l_mins, --round((rrt.etime-b3l.etime)*24*60,0) rrt_mins FROM sod sod1,etl etl1 where sod1.reporting_date=etl1.reporting_date and sod1.scb_country=etl1.scb_country and sod1.scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --AND trim(TO_CHAR(sod1.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') --and upper(sod1.job_name) = 'RAY_'||sod1.scb_country||'_B3LR_PROCESS' --and sod.reporting_date>=sysdate-31 --and sod.reporting_date<=sysdate-1 --and sod.job_status='Y' union all SELECT --to_char(c0.reporting_date,'YYYYMMDD') rdate, etl2.reporting_date, 'CE' description, round((ce1.etime-etl2.etime)*24*60,0) ETL_mins --round((b3l.etime-etl.etime)*24*60,0) b3l_mins, --round((rrt.etime-b3l.etime)*24*60,0) rrt_mins FROM ce ce1,etl etl2 where ce1.reporting_date=etl2.reporting_date and ce1.scb_country=etl2.scb_country and etl2.scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --AND trim(TO_CHAR(ce1.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') --and upper(etl2.job_name) = 'RAY_'||etl2.scb_country||'_B3LR_PROCESS' union all SELECT --to_char(c0.reporting_date,'YYYYMMDD') rdate, lcr1.reporting_date, 'LCR' description, round(elapsed_time_secs/60,0) ETL_mins --round((b3l.etime-etl.etime)*24*60,0) b3l_mins, --round((rrt.etime-b3l.etime)*24*60,0) rrt_mins FROM lcr lcr1 where lcr1.scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --AND trim(TO_CHAR(lcr1.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') --and upper(ce2.job_name) = 'RAY_'||ce2.scb_country||'_B3LR_PROCESS' union all SELECT --to_char(c0.reporting_date,'YYYYMMDD') rdate, rrt1.reporting_date, 'RRT' description, round(rrt1.elapsed_time_secs/60,0) ETL_mins --round((b3l.etime-etl.etime)*24*60,0) b3l_mins, --round((rrt.etime-b3l.etime)*24*60,0) rrt_mins FROM rrt rrt1 where rrt1.scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --AND trim(TO_CHAR(rrt1.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') --and upper(lcr2.job_name) = 'RAY_'||lcr2.scb_country||'_B3LR_PROCESS' order by reporting_date,description

with lcr as (SELECT reporting_date, scb_country, job_name, elapsed_time_secs FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --and upper(job_name) = 'RAY_'||scb_country||'_B3LR_PROCESS' and ((SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_LCR_PROCESS') OR upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_B3LR_PROCESS') and reporting_date>=sysdate-246 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_status='Y' AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ), rrt as (SELECT reporting_date, scb_country, job_name, elapsed_time_secs FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --and upper(job_name) = 'RAY_'||scb_country||'_RRT_RUN' and ( (SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_RRT_PROCESS') OR (SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP','SOLO') AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_ALMM_' ||scb_country ||'_RRT') OR (SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP') AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_FSB2_RRT') OR upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_RRT_RUN' ) and reporting_date>=sysdate-246 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_status='Y' AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ) SELECT --to_char(c0.reporting_date,'YYYYMMDD') rdate, lcr1.reporting_date, 'LCR' description, round(elapsed_time_secs/60,0) ETL_mins --round((b3l.etime-etl.etime)*24*60,0) b3l_mins, --round((rrt.etime-b3l.etime)*24*60,0) rrt_mins FROM lcr lcr1 where lcr1.scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) AND trim(TO_CHAR(lcr1.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') --and upper(ce2.job_name) = 'RAY_'||ce2.scb_country||'_B3LR_PROCESS' union all SELECT --to_char(c0.reporting_date,'YYYYMMDD') rdate, rrt1.reporting_date, 'RRT' description, round(rrt1.elapsed_time_secs/60,0) ETL_mins --round((b3l.etime-etl.etime)*24*60,0) b3l_mins, --round((rrt.etime-b3l.etime)*24*60,0) rrt_mins FROM rrt rrt1 where rrt1.scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) AND trim(TO_CHAR(rrt1.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') --and upper(lcr2.job_name) = 'RAY_'||lcr2.scb_country||'_B3LR_PROCESS' order by reporting_date,description

display.name: 4 RAY job status - RRT Drilldown - by rd

query.sql:
-- drilldown of RRT report timing WITH rrt AS (SELECT reporting_date, scb_country, --start_time stime end_time etime, elapsed_time_secs FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS WHERE ( (SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_RRT_PROCESS') OR (SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP','SOLO') AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_ALMM_' ||scb_country ||'_RRT') OR (SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP') AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_FSB2_RRT') OR upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_RRT_RUN' ) AND reporting_date=to_date(:RDATE,'yyyymmdd') AND job_status ='Y' --AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ), etl AS (SELECT reporting_date, scb_country, end_time etime, elapsed_time_secs FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS WHERE ((SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_ETL_ACONT') OR upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_ETL_GLREC_MAPPING') AND reporting_date=to_date(:RDATE,'yyyymmdd') AND job_status ='Y' --AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ), ce AS (SELECT reporting_date, scb_country, end_time etime, elapsed_time_secs FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS WHERE ((SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_CHECK_ERR') OR upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_CHECK_ERROR1') AND reporting_date=to_date(:RDATE,'yyyymmdd') AND job_status ='Y' --AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ), b3l AS (SELECT reporting_date, scb_country, start_time, end_time etime, elapsed_time_secs FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS WHERE ((SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_LCR_PROCESS') OR upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_B3LR_PROCESS') AND reporting_date=to_date(:RDATE,'yyyymmdd') AND job_status ='Y' --AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ) SELECT c0.scb_country COUNTRY, --c0.reporting_date, TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'YYYYMMDD') rdate, --c0.reporting_date RD, TO_CHAR(c0.start_time+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') etl_start_time_SGT, CASE WHEN C0.SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP','SOLO') THEN TO_CHAR(c0.end_time+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(etl.etime +8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') END etl_end_time_SGT, CASE WHEN C0.SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP','SOLO') THEN ROUND((c0.end_time-c0.start_time)*24*60,0) ELSE ROUND((etl.etime -c0.start_time)*24*60,0) END ETL_mins, TO_CHAR(ce.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') ce_end_time_SGT, CASE --WHEN C0.SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' --OR C0.SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP','SOLO') WHEN C0.SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP','SOLO') THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((ce.etime-etl.etime)*24*60,0) END CE_mins, TO_CHAR(b3l.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') b3l_end_time_SGT, ROUND(b3l.elapsed_time_secs/60,0) b3l_mins, --group1 TO_CHAR(rrt.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') rrt_end_time_SGT, ROUND(rrt.elapsed_time_secs/60,0) rrt_mins, ROUND((rrt.etime -c0.start_time)*24*60,0) total_mins, c0.reporting_date RD FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS c0 LEFT JOIN rrt ON c0.reporting_date=rrt.reporting_date AND c0.scb_country =rrt.scb_country LEFT JOIN b3l ON c0.reporting_date=b3l.reporting_date AND c0.scb_country =b3l.scb_country LEFT JOIN etl ON c0.reporting_date=etl.reporting_date AND c0.scb_country =etl.scb_country LEFT JOIN ce ON c0.reporting_date=ce.reporting_date AND c0.scb_country =ce.scb_country --where upper(c0.job_name) = 'RAY_'||c0.scb_country||'_ETL_CTYPES' WHERE ((C0.SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(c0.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||c0.scb_country ||'_ETL_COMMLKP')
OR (C0.SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP') AND upper(c0.job_name) = 'RAY_GB_COPY_T_TABLE_TO_CONSO') OR (C0.SCB_COUNTRY IN ('SOLO') AND upper(c0.job_name) = 'RAY_GB_COPY_T_TABLE_TO_SOLO') OR upper(c0.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||c0.scb_country -- ||'_ETL_ENTITY_LKUP') ||'_ETL_ACBS') AND c0.reporting_date=to_date(:RDATE,'yyyymmdd') AND c0.job_status ='Y' --AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ORDER BY 3 ASC

WITH s0 AS ( -- max, min and average of last 7 days SELECT scb_country, JOB_NAME, ROUND(avg(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS) / 60, 2) AS AVG_Mins, ROUND(median(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS) / 60, 2) AS median_Mins FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS WHERE scb_country=:COUNTRY --and job_name = '&job' AND reporting_date>=sysdate-361 AND reporting_date <sysdate-1 AND job_status ='Y' GROUP BY scb_country, job_name ORDER BY scb_country, job_name ) SELECT sjs.REPORTING_DATE, sjs.SCB_COUNTRY, sjs.JOB_NAME, CASE WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_CREATE_CONTEXT' THEN 'Context Creation completed' --WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_'||sjs.scb_country||'_ETL_CTYPES' WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||sjs.scb_country --||'_ETL_ENTITY_LKUP' ||'_ETL_ACBS' THEN 'ETL started' WHEN (sjs.SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_ETL_COMMLKP') THEN 'ETL started' WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_ETL_GLREC_MAPPING' THEN 'ETL completed' WHEN (sjs.SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_ETL_ACONT') THEN 'ETL completed' WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_BUILD_CONTRACT_REF' THEN 'CE started' WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_CHECK_ERROR1' THEN 'CE completed' WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_B3LR_PROCESS' THEN 'LCR completed' WHEN (sjs.SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_LCR_PROCESS') THEN 'LCR completed' WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_RRT_RUN' THEN 'RRT completed' WHEN (sjs.SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_RRT_PROCESS') THEN 'RRT completed' WHEN (sjs.SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP','SOLO') AND upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_ALMM_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_RRT') THEN 'RRT completed' WHEN (sjs.SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP') AND upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_FSB2_RRT') THEN 'RRT completed' WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_LOAD_SCB_ADJUSTMENT_DIM' THEN 'DQ/CP completed' WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'RAY_POS1_' ||sjs.scb_country ||'_RRT_RERUN' THEN 'All completed' END stage, ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) AS ELAPSED_Mins, CASE WHEN ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) > ROUND(s0.avg_Mins,2) THEN '>' ||TO_CHAR(s0.avg_Mins) --when ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) <= s0.avg_Mins --else --to_char(s0.avg_Mins) END avg_Mins, CASE WHEN ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) > ROUND(s0.median_Mins,2) THEN '>' ||TO_CHAR(s0.median_Mins) --when ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) <= s0.avg_Mins --else --to_char(s0.avg_Mins) END median_Mins, sjs.START_TIME, sjs.END_TIME --sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS, FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS sjs, s0 WHERE sjs.scb_country =:COUNTRY AND sjs.scb_country =s0.scb_country AND sjs.job_name =s0.job_name AND sjs.reporting_date=:RD AND sjs.job_status ='Y' --AND (upper(sjs.job_name)<>'ins_scb_file_stats') ORDER BY sjs.start_TIME

with sod as (SELECT reporting_date, scb_country, job_name, start_time stime FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS where --scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --and (lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_parallel' --or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_fermat_check_errors' --or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_tables') --and upper(job_name)='RAY_'||scb_country||'_ETL_CTYPES' ((SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_ETL_COMMLKP') OR ((SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP') AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_GB_COPY_T_TABLE_TO_CONSO') OR (SCB_COUNTRY IN ('SOLO') AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_GB_COPY_T_TABLE_TO_SOLO')) OR upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country --||'_ETL_ENTITY_LKUP') ||'_ETL_ACBS') and reporting_date>=sysdate-120 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_status='Y' --AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ), etl as (SELECT reporting_date, scb_country, job_name, end_time etime FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --and (lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_parallel' --or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_fermat_check_errors' --or lower(job_name) = 'init_scb_check_errors_tables') --and upper(job_name)='RAY_'||scb_country||'_ETL_GLREC_MAPPING' and ((SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_ETL_ACONT') OR upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_ETL_GLREC_MAPPING') and reporting_date>=sysdate-120 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_status='Y' --AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ), ce as (SELECT reporting_date, scb_country, job_name, end_time etime FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --and upper(job_name) = 'RAY_'||scb_country||'_CHECK_ERROR1' and ((SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_CHECK_ERR') OR upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_CHECK_ERROR1') and reporting_date>=sysdate-120 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_status='Y' --AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ), lcr as (SELECT reporting_date, scb_country, job_name, elapsed_time_secs FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --and upper(job_name) = 'RAY_'||scb_country||'_B3LR_PROCESS' and ((SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_LCR_PROCESS') OR upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_B3LR_PROCESS') and reporting_date>=sysdate-120 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_status='Y' --AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ), rrt as (SELECT reporting_date, scb_country, job_name, elapsed_time_secs FROM SCB_DQ_RAY_JOB_STATS where scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --and upper(job_name) = 'RAY_'||scb_country||'_RRT_RUN' and ( (SCB_COUNTRY LIKE '%MA%' AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_RRT_PROCESS') OR (SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP','SOLO') AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_ALMM_' ||scb_country ||'_RRT') OR (SCB_COUNTRY IN ('GROUP') AND upper(job_name) = 'RAY_FSB2_RRT') OR upper(job_name) = 'RAY_' ||scb_country ||'_RRT_RUN' ) and reporting_date>=sysdate-120 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_status='Y' --AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ) SELECT --to_char(c0.reporting_date,'YYYYMMDD') rdate, sod1.reporting_date, 'ETL' description, round((etl1.etime-sod1.stime)*24*60,0) ETL_mins --round((b3l.etime-etl.etime)*24*60,0) b3l_mins, --round((rrt.etime-b3l.etime)*24*60,0) rrt_mins FROM sod sod1,etl etl1 where sod1.reporting_date=etl1.reporting_date and sod1.scb_country=etl1.scb_country and sod1.scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --AND trim(TO_CHAR(sod1.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') --and upper(sod1.job_name) = 'RAY_'||sod1.scb_country||'_B3LR_PROCESS' --and sod.reporting_date>=sysdate-31 --and sod.reporting_date<=sysdate-1 --and sod.job_status='Y' union all SELECT --to_char(c0.reporting_date,'YYYYMMDD') rdate, etl2.reporting_date, 'CE' description, round((ce1.etime-etl2.etime)*24*60,0) ETL_mins --round((b3l.etime-etl.etime)*24*60,0) b3l_mins, --round((rrt.etime-b3l.etime)*24*60,0) rrt_mins FROM ce ce1,etl etl2 where ce1.reporting_date=etl2.reporting_date and ce1.scb_country=etl2.scb_country and etl2.scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --AND trim(TO_CHAR(ce1.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') --and upper(etl2.job_name) = 'RAY_'||etl2.scb_country||'_B3LR_PROCESS' union all SELECT --to_char(c0.reporting_date,'YYYYMMDD') rdate, lcr1.reporting_date, 'LCR' description, round(elapsed_time_secs/60,0) ETL_mins --round((b3l.etime-etl.etime)*24*60,0) b3l_mins, --round((rrt.etime-b3l.etime)*24*60,0) rrt_mins FROM lcr lcr1 where lcr1.scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --AND trim(TO_CHAR(lcr1.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') --and upper(ce2.job_name) = 'RAY_'||ce2.scb_country||'_B3LR_PROCESS' union all SELECT --to_char(c0.reporting_date,'YYYYMMDD') rdate, rrt1.reporting_date, 'RRT' description, round(rrt1.elapsed_time_secs/60,0) ETL_mins --round((b3l.etime-etl.etime)*24*60,0) b3l_mins, --round((rrt.etime-b3l.etime)*24*60,0) rrt_mins FROM rrt rrt1 where rrt1.scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --AND trim(TO_CHAR(rrt1.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') --and upper(lcr2.job_name) = 'RAY_'||lcr2.scb_country||'_B3LR_PROCESS' order by reporting_date,description

WITH CTX AS (SELECT PK_RD_WS PARTITION_KEY, CONTEXT_ID AS CONTEXT_ID, REPORTING_DATE AS RD, SUBSTR(description,19) WORKSPACE_NAME FROM contexts WHERE --reporting_date= -- (SELECT reporting_date FROM SCB_REPORTING_DATE WHERE run_type='D' -- ) --AND position =1 AND workspace_id NOT IN (31,54) ) SELECT T1.Country, --context_id, T1.DESCRIPTION , t1.task_id, l.Log_key , floor((CAST(sysdate AS DATE)-CAST(MAX(l.datetime) AS DATE))*1440) idle_min, t1.CONTEXT_ID FROM (SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(CTX.WORKSPACE_NAME,'SCB_'),'EBA','RAY'),'HKMA','MAS'),'GRP_') AS COUNTRY, ctx.CONTEXT_ID, --t.EXEC_START_DATE, T.DESCRIPTION, T.EXEC_SESSION_ID , CTX.PARTITION_KEY, t.task_id FROM task t INNER JOIN CTX ON ctx.context_id = t.context_id AND t.STATUS = 'R' ) T1 INNER JOIN log_table l ON l.SESSION_ID = T1.EXEC_SESSION_ID AND l.PARTITION_KEY = T1.PARTITION_KEY AND l.TASK_ID IS NOT NULL GROUP BY T1.Country, context_id, t1.task_id, T1.DESCRIPTION, l.Log_key order by 1,5 desc

display.name: 5 IRRBB job status - Drilldown - by country

query.sql: SELECT distinct c0.scb_country COUNTRY, to_char(c0.reporting_date,'YYYYMMDD') rdate, c0.reporting_date RD FROM scb_job_stats c0 where c0.scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and c0.reporting_date>=sysdate-181 and c0.reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and c0.job_success='Y' order by c0.reporting_date desc

with s0 as ( -- max, min and average of last 7 days SELECT scb_country, JOB_NAME, Round(avg(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS) / 60, 2) AS avg_Mins FROM scb_job_stats where scb_country=:COUNTRY --and job_name = '&job' and reporting_date>=sysdate-361 and reporting_date<sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' group by scb_country,job_name order by scb_country,job_name ) SELECT sjs.REPORTING_DATE, sjs.SCB_COUNTRY, sjs.JOB_NAME, CASE WHEN sjs.job_name = 'create_context_irrbb' THEN 'Context Creation Completed' WHEN sjs.job_name = 'ALM Account, Loandepo, Swap Data Extraction Job' THEN 'BAU Table Copied' WHEN sjs.job_name = 'scb_rate_input_rate_data_past' THEN 'Rate Job Run Completed' WHEN sjs.job_name = 'pack_scb_task.run_check_error' THEN 'ETL and Check Errors For' WHEN sjs.job_name = 'scb_exec_post_aggregation' THEN 'Aggregation and Post Aggregation Completed' WHEN sjs.job_name = 'pack_scb_irrbb_custo.pre_alm_process' THEN 'Pre ALM Completed' WHEN sjs.job_name = 'pack_scb_irrbb_custo.batch_process' THEN 'ALM Completed' WHEN sjs.job_name = 'scb_irrbb_obi_load.scb_config_load_obi' THEN 'Insight Loading Completed' END stage, ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) AS ELAPSED_Mins, case when ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) > ROUND(s0.avg_Mins*1.1,2) then '>'||to_char(s0.avg_Mins) end avg_Mins, sjs.START_TIME, sjs.END_TIME --sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS, FROM scb_job_stats sjs, s0 WHERE sjs.scb_country =:COUNTRY and sjs.scb_country=s0.scb_country and sjs.job_name=s0.job_name AND sjs.reporting_date=:RD AND sjs.job_success ='Y' --AND (lower(sjs.job_name)<>'ins_scb_file_stats') ORDER BY sjs.start_time

display.name: 5 IRRBB job status - Drilldown - by rd

query.sql: SELECT distinct c0.scb_country COUNTRY, to_char(c0.reporting_date,'YYYYMMDD') rdate, c0.reporting_date RD FROM scb_job_stats c0 where c0.reporting_date =to_date(:rd_yyyymmdd,'yyyymmdd') and c0.job_success='Y' order by 1

with s0 as ( -- max, min and average of last 7 days SELECT scb_country, JOB_NAME, Round(avg(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS) / 60, 2) AS avg_Mins FROM scb_job_stats where scb_country=:COUNTRY --and job_name = '&job' and reporting_date>=sysdate-361 and reporting_date<sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' group by scb_country,job_name order by scb_country,job_name ) SELECT sjs.REPORTING_DATE, sjs.SCB_COUNTRY, sjs.JOB_NAME, CASE WHEN sjs.job_name = 'create_context_irrbb' THEN 'Context Creation Completed' WHEN sjs.job_name = 'ALM Account, Loandepo, Swap Data Extraction Job' THEN 'BAU Table Copied' WHEN sjs.job_name = 'scb_rate_input_rate_data_past' THEN 'Rate Job Run Completed' WHEN sjs.job_name = 'pack_scb_task.run_check_error' THEN 'ETL and Check Errors For' WHEN sjs.job_name = 'scb_exec_post_aggregation' THEN 'Aggregation and Post Aggregation Completed' WHEN sjs.job_name = 'pack_scb_irrbb_custo.pre_alm_process' THEN 'Pre ALM Completed' WHEN sjs.job_name = 'pack_scb_irrbb_custo.batch_process' THEN 'ALM Completed' WHEN sjs.job_name = 'scb_irrbb_obi_load.scb_config_load_obi' THEN 'Insight Loading Completed' END stage, ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) AS ELAPSED_Mins, case when ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) > ROUND(s0.avg_Mins*1.1,2) then '>'||to_char(s0.avg_Mins) end avg_Mins, sjs.START_TIME, sjs.END_TIME --sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS, FROM scb_job_stats sjs, s0 WHERE sjs.scb_country =:COUNTRY and sjs.scb_country=s0.scb_country and sjs.job_name=s0.job_name AND sjs.reporting_date=:RD AND sjs.job_success ='Y' --AND (lower(sjs.job_name)<>'ins_scb_file_stats') ORDER BY sjs.start_time

display.name: GT FSA graph - post ETL
display.description: time of completion of FSA reports in 80 days between322,GTCBNDEALADJ and 336,GTRUNRRTREPADJ excluding rd Friday

query.sql: ---- time of completion of group 1 reports in one day for one countries select * from ( with switch0 as ( select --scb_country , end_time, reporting_date from scb_job_stats@LNK_GT where reporting_date>=sysdate-91 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' --and scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and job_name ='SCB_RUN_RRT_REPORTS_ADJ' ) SELECT sjs.reporting_date, round(to_number((s0.end_time-sjs.start_time)*24*60),2) group1_ELAPSED_MINS FROM scb_job_stats@LNK_GT sjs,switch0 s0 where --sjs.scb_country=s0.scb_country sjs.reporting_date=s0.reporting_date --and sjs.scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and upper(sjs.job_name) ='SCB_UPDATE_CBN_INFLOW' and sjs.job_success='Y' and sjs.reporting_date>=sysdate-91 and sjs.reporting_date<=sysdate-1 --group by sjs.scb_country --order by 1 ) res where trim(to_char(res.reporting_date,'day')) <> 'friday' order by 1

display.name: GT FSA graph - post LIQ
display.description: time of completion of FSA reports in 80 days between 329,GTRUNRRTDIM and 336,GTRUNRRTREPADJ excluding rd Friday

query.sql: ---- time of completion of group 1 reports in one day for one countries select * from ( with switch0 as ( select --scb_country , end_time, reporting_date from scb_job_stats@LNK_GT where reporting_date>=sysdate-61 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' --and scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --and trim(to_char(reporting_date,'day')) <> 'friday' and job_name ='SCB_RUN_RRT_REPORTS_ADJ' ) SELECT sjs.reporting_date, round(to_number((s0.end_time-sjs.start_time)*24*60),2) group1_ELAPSED_MINS FROM scb_job_stats@LNK_GT sjs,switch0 s0 where --sjs.scb_country=s0.scb_country sjs.reporting_date=s0.reporting_date --and sjs.scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) and upper(sjs.job_name) ='SCB_RUN_RRT_DIM' and sjs.job_success='Y' and sjs.reporting_date>=sysdate-61 and sjs.reporting_date<=sysdate-1 --and trim(to_char(sjs.reporting_date,'day')) <> 'friday' --group by sjs.scb_country ) res where trim(to_char(res.reporting_date,'day')) <> 'friday' order by 1

display.name: GT job status - all jobs
display.description: Display Dispaly GT batch job status - average of single job in 30 days

query.sql: -- max, min and average of last 30 days SELECT country_code COUNTRY, JOB_NAME JOBNAME, Round(avg(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS) / 60, 0) AS avg_Mins FROM scb_job_stats@LNK_GT where --scb_country=UPPER(:COUNTRY) --scb_country=trim(UPPER(:COUNTRY)) --scb_country=UPPER(trim(replace(:COUNTRY,chr(10),''))) --and job_name = 'scb_exec_alm_process' reporting_date>=sysdate-31 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' and JOB_NAME not like '%_UVT%' group by job_name,country_code order by 3 desc, 1

display.name: Job Graph
display.description: Dispaly GT batch job status - single job in 30 days

query.sql: SELECT REPORTING_DATE, Round(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) AS ELAPSED_Mins FROM scb_job_stats@LNK_GT where --scb_country=:COUNTRYNAME job_name in (:JOBNAME) and country_code=:COUNTRY and reporting_date>=sysdate-361 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 --and ELAPSED_TIME_SECS<1800 and job_success='Y' order by REPORTING_DATE

SELECT REPORTING_DATE, country_code, Round(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) AS ELAPSED_Mins, trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) as day, start_time, end_time FROM scb_job_stats@LNK_GT where --scb_country=:COUNTRYNAME job_name in (:JOBNAME) and reporting_date>=sysdate-181 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and country_code=:COUNTRY and job_success='Y' order by REPORTING_DATE

display.name: 3 GT job status - RRT Drilldown - by rd

query.sql: -- drilldown of RRT report timing WITH rrt AS (SELECT reporting_date, --start_time stime country_code, end_time etime FROM scb_job_stats@LNK_GT WHERE upper(job_name) = 'SCB_RUN_RRT_REPORTS_ADJ' AND reporting_date=to_date(:RDATE,'yyyymmdd') --AND country_code='GT' AND job_success ='Y' AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ), ce AS (SELECT reporting_date, country_code, end_time etime FROM scb_job_stats@LNK_GT WHERE upper(job_name) = 'GT_CHECK_ERRORS' --AND country_code='GT' AND reporting_date=to_date(:RDATE,'yyyymmdd') AND job_success ='Y' AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ), liq AS (SELECT reporting_date, country_code, end_time etime FROM scb_job_stats@LNK_GT WHERE upper(job_name) = 'SCB_LIQ_PROCESS' --AND country_code='GT' AND reporting_date=to_date(:RDATE,'yyyymmdd') AND job_success ='Y' AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ) SELECT TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'YYYYMMDD') rdate, --c0.reporting_date RD, TO_CHAR(c0.start_time+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') etl_end_time_SGT, TO_CHAR(ce.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') ce_end_time_SGT, ROUND((ce.etime-c0.end_time)*24*60,0) CE_mins, TO_CHAR(liq.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') liq_end_time_SGT, ROUND((liq.etime-ce.etime)*24*60,0) liq_mins, TO_CHAR(rrt.etime+8/24,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') rrt_end_time_SGT, ROUND((rrt.etime -liq.etime)*24*60,0) rrt_mins, ROUND((rrt.etime -c0.start_time)*24*60,0) total_mins, c0.reporting_date RD FROM scb_job_stats@LNK_GT c0 LEFT JOIN rrt ON c0.reporting_date=rrt.reporting_date AND c0.country_code =rrt.country_code LEFT JOIN liq ON c0.reporting_date=liq.reporting_date AND c0.country_code =liq.country_code LEFT JOIN ce ON c0.reporting_date=ce.reporting_date AND c0.country_code =ce.country_code WHERE upper(c0.job_name) = 'SCB_UPDATE_CBN_INFLOW' AND c0.country_code in ('GT') AND c0.reporting_date=to_date(:RDATE,'yyyymmdd') AND c0.job_success ='Y' AND trim(TO_CHAR(c0.reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ORDER BY 3 ASC

WITH s0 AS ( -- max, min and average of last 7 days SELECT JOB_NAME, ROUND(AVG(ELAPSED_TIME_SECS) / 60, 2) AS avg_Mins FROM scb_job_stats@LNK_GT WHERE reporting_date>=sysdate-361 AND reporting_date <sysdate-1 AND job_success ='Y' GROUP BY job_name ORDER BY job_name ) SELECT sjs.REPORTING_DATE, sjs.JOB_NAME, CASE WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'SCB_CREATE_CONTEXT' THEN 'Context Creation completed' WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'SCB_UPDATE_CBN_INFLOW' THEN 'ETL completed' WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'GT_CHECK_ERRORS' THEN 'CE completed' WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'SCB_LIQ_PROCESS' THEN 'LIQSTRESS completed' WHEN upper(sjs.job_name) = 'SCB_RUN_RRT_REPORTS_ADJ' THEN 'RRT completed' END stage, ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) AS ELAPSED_Mins, CASE WHEN ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) > ROUND(s0.avg_Mins*1.1,2) THEN '>' ||TO_CHAR(s0.avg_Mins) --when ROUND(sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS / 60, 2) <= s0.avg_Mins --else --to_char(s0.avg_Mins) END avg_Mins, sjs.START_TIME, sjs.END_TIME --sjs.ELAPSED_TIME_SECS, FROM scb_job_stats@LNK_GT sjs, s0 WHERE sjs.job_name =s0.job_name AND sjs.reporting_date=:RD AND sjs.job_success ='Y' --AND (upper(sjs.job_name)<>'ins_scb_file_stats') ORDER BY sjs.start_TIME

with etl as (SELECT reporting_date, job_name, end_time etime FROM scb_job_stats@LNK_GT where upper(job_name)='SCB_UPDATE_CBN_INFLOW' and reporting_date>=sysdate-181 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 AND country_code='GT' and job_success='Y' AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ), ce as (SELECT reporting_date, job_name, end_time etime FROM scb_job_stats@LNK_GT where upper(job_name) = 'GT_CHECK_ERRORS' and reporting_date>=sysdate-181 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 AND country_code='GT' and job_success='Y' AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ), liq as (SELECT reporting_date, job_name, end_time etime FROM scb_job_stats@LNK_GT where upper(job_name) = 'SCB_LIQ_PROCESS' and country_code='GT' and reporting_date>=sysdate-181 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 and job_success='Y' AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ), rrt as (SELECT reporting_date, job_name, end_time etime FROM scb_job_stats@LNK_GT where upper(job_name) = 'SCB_RUN_RRT_REPORTS_ADJ' and reporting_date>=sysdate-181 and reporting_date<=sysdate-1 AND country_code='GT' and job_success='Y' AND trim(TO_CHAR(reporting_date,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = American')) NOT IN ('saturday','sunday') ) SELECT --to_char(c0.reporting_date,'YYYYMMDD') rdate, etl2.reporting_date, 'CE' description, round((ce1.etime-etl2.etime)*24*60,0) exec_mins --round((b3l.etime-etl.etime)*24*60,0) b3l_mins, --round((rrt.etime-b3l.etime)*24*60,0) rrt_mins FROM ce ce1,etl etl2 where ce1.reporting_date=etl2.reporting_date union all SELECT --to_char(c0.reporting_date,'YYYYMMDD') rdate, ce2.reporting_date, 'LCR' description, round((liq1.etime-ce2.etime)*24*60,0) exec_mins --round((b3l.etime-etl.etime)*24*60,0) b3l_mins, --round((rrt.etime-b3l.etime)*24*60,0) rrt_mins FROM ce ce2,liq liq1 where ce2.reporting_date=liq1.reporting_date union all SELECT --to_char(c0.reporting_date,'YYYYMMDD') rdate, liq2.reporting_date, 'RRT' description, round((rrt1.etime-liq2.etime)*24*60,0) exec_mins --round((b3l.etime-etl.etime)*24*60,0) b3l_mins, --round((rrt.etime-b3l.etime)*24*60,0) rrt_mins FROM liq liq2,rrt rrt1 where liq2.reporting_date=rrt1.reporting_date order by reporting_date,description

display.name: Task - 0 Context Viewer
display.description: Display information from contexts and drill down to task server and log_table

query.sql: -- from fermat -- 0 contxt id SELECT reporting_date, description CONTEXTDESC, context_id CONTEXTID, copy_context_id, workspace_id, position, rd_id, pk_rd_ws PARTITIONKEY, pk_rd, creation_date, status_id, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(c.description,0,8) IN ('GTF_PROD','VARIANCE','HONGKONG') THEN 'GT' WHEN SUBSTR(NVL(c.description,'N'),0,13) IN ('Daily Context','Month-end Con','Daily Master ') THEN 'RAY' WHEN SUBSTR(NVL(c.description,'N'),0,11) IN ('Context for') THEN 'IRRBB' ELSE 'ALM' END AS APPNAME FROM contexts c ORDER BY reporting_date DESC,context_id asc

display.name: Task - 1 Log Viewer - ALM
display.description: Display information from log_table by task_id

query.sql: SELECT c.pk_rd_ws PARTITIONKEY, t.context_id, t.task_id, ----t.post_date, --t.post_machine, --p.name, ----t.parent_task_id parentid, t.process_id, --t.post_session_id SESSIONID, T.EXEC_SESSION_ID SESSIONID, --post_session_id, --expiration_date, --t.status status, CASE WHEN t.status ='F' THEN 'Finished' WHEN t.status ='R' THEN 'Running' WHEN t.status ='K' THEN 'Killed' WHEN t.status ='H' THEN 'Crashed' WHEN t.status ='C' THEN 'Cancelled' ELSE 'Unkown' END AS STATUS, p.description process_DESC, --t.description task_DESC, case --when p.description = 'SAVE_CONFIG_PARAM' when p.description = 'SAVE_CONFIG_PARAM' then 'Phase I started' when p.description = 'Prepare all RCo inputs' then 'Phase I completed' when p.description = 'Launch RCo process' then 'RCO Process' when p.description = 'Fill CF_IMPORT calc tables' then 'Phase II started' when p.description = 'Fill LDR Table' then 'Phase II completed' --when p.description = 'Fill Supervisor Keys (Conso)' --then 'Post Conso started' --when p.description = 'Regulatory Reporting Tool' --then 'Post Conso completed' when p.description = 'B3 Result Trends Calculation' then 'LCR completed' when p.description = 'Prepare Conso Treatment' then 'RRT started' when p.description = 'Regulatory Reporting Tool' then 'RRT completed' when p.description = 'Pre Reco gran results' then 'GL_RECON started' when p.description = 'Post Reco agg results' then 'GL_RECON completed' else null end as phase, --vs.status vss, CASE WHEN t.exec_end_date IS NOT NULL THEN floor(to_number(t.exec_end_date-t.exec_start_date)*24*60*60) WHEN t.exec_start_date IS NOT NULL THEN floor(to_number(sysdate -t.exec_start_date)*24*60*60) ELSE NULL END AS execution_secs, pack_utils.readable_duration(exec_start_date, nvl(exec_end_date,sysdate)) execution_duration, t.exec_start_date start_date, t.exec_end_date end_date, t.status_text, case when s.name is not null then substr(t.exec_machine,14,12) else null end as exec_machine, --case when --substr(nvl(c.description,'N'),0,13) in ('Daily Context') --then --t.description --else --p.description --end --as description, s.name task_server, --vs.machine vsm, case when s.name is not null then '\\'||substr(t.exec_machine,14,12)||'\'||replace(REPLACE(t.trace_file,'/','\'),':','$') else null end as trace_file, case when :APPNAME = 'ALM' then CASE WHEN c.workspace_id='1' or c.workspace_id='9' or c.workspace_id='4' THEN 'BAU - ' ||TO_CHAR(c.reporting_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') ||',Id ' ||c.context_id WHEN c.workspace_id='2' THEN 'LIQSTRESS - ' ||TO_CHAR(c.reporting_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') ||',Id ' ||c.context_id WHEN c.workspace_id='99' THEN 'HORIZON - ' ||TO_CHAR(c.reporting_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') ||',Id ' ||c.context_id WHEN c.workspace_id='11' THEN 'MAS - ' ||TO_CHAR(c.reporting_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') ||',Id ' ||c.context_id ELSE c.workspace_id ||TO_CHAR(c.reporting_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') ||',Id ' ||c.context_id END when :APPNAME = 'GT' then CASE WHEN SUBSTR(c.pk_rd_ws,9,4)='0001' THEN 'GTF_PROD - ' ||TO_CHAR(c.reporting_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') ||',Id ' ||c.context_id WHEN SUBSTR(c.pk_rd_ws,9,4)='0002' THEN 'VARIANCE - ' ||TO_CHAR(c.reporting_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') ||',Id ' ||c.context_id WHEN SUBSTR(c.pk_rd_ws,9,4)='0024' THEN 'HONGKONG - ' ||TO_CHAR(c.reporting_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') ||',Id ' ||c.context_id ELSE c.pk_rd_ws ||TO_CHAR(c.reporting_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') ||',Id ' ||c.context_id END end AS context, p.token_name, --vs.trace_file service_trace_file, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(c.description,0,8) IN ('GTF_PROD','VARIANCE','HONGKONG') THEN 'GT' WHEN SUBSTR(NVL(c.description,'N'),0,13) IN ('Daily Context') THEN 'RAY' WHEN SUBSTR(NVL(c.description,'N'),0,11) IN ('Context for') THEN 'IRRBB' ELSE 'ALM' END AS APPNAME FROM task t LEFT JOIN contexts c ON t.context_id=c.context_id LEFT JOIN server_activity sa ON t.exec_activity_id=sa.activity_id LEFT JOIN server s ON s.server_id = sa.server_id LEFT JOIN process p ON t.process_id =p.process_id WHERE t.context_id = :CONTEXTID ORDER BY task_id ASC

Select session_id,log_type,datetime,log_key,function,step,message,parameters,task_id,root_Task_id from log_table where (partition_key=:PARTITIONKEY and (:APPNAME='ALM' or :APPNAME='RAY') and task_id=:TASK_ID) or (partition_key=:PARTITIONKEY and (:APPNAME='GT' or :APPNAME='IRRBB') and session_id=:SESSIONID) --and (task_id=:TASKID or session_id=:SESSIONID) --and task_id=:TASKID order by datetime desc

Select :DESCRIPT DESCRIPTION, l.Log_key, floor((CAST(sysdate AS DATE)-CAST(MAX(l.datetime) AS DATE))*1440) idle_min from log_table l where (partition_key=:PARTITIONKEY and (:APPNAME='ALM' or :APPNAME='RAY') and task_id=:TASK_ID) or (partition_key=:PARTITIONKEY and :APPNAME='GT' and session_id=:SESSIONID) --and (task_id=:TASKID or session_id=:SESSIONID) --and task_id=:TASKID GROUP BY :DESCRIPT, l.Log_key order by 3 desc

display.name: Task - 1 Log Viewer - RAY
display.description: Display information from log_table by task_id

query.sql:
SELECT c.pk_rd_ws PARTITIONKEY, t.context_id, substr(:CONTEXTDESC,19,20) workspace, t.task_id, CASE WHEN t.status ='I' THEN 'Initialized' WHEN t.status ='W' THEN 'Waiting' WHEN t.status ='R' THEN 'Running' WHEN t.status ='B' THEN 'Blocked' WHEN t.status ='F' THEN 'Finished' WHEN t.status ='C' THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN t.status ='K' THEN 'Killed' WHEN t.status ='H' THEN 'Crashed' WHEN t.status ='E' THEN 'Expired' ELSE 'Unkown' END AS STATUS, t.chain_step_id, p.description process_DESC, t.description task_DESC, case --when p.description = 'SAVE_CONFIG_PARAM' when t.description = 'B3 Configuration backup' then 'Liquidity Phase I started' --when t.description = 'Prepare all RCo inputs' when t.description = 'Liquidity PreRun' then 'Liquidity Phase I completed' when t.description = 'Launch RCo process' then 'RCO Process' when t.description = 'Fill tables CF_IMPORT calc tables' --when t.description = 'LR Phase 2 Init' then 'Liquidity Phase II started' when t.description = 'Fill LDR' then 'Liquidity Phase II completed' when t.description = 'Fill supervisor_keys (CO)' and (t.chain_step_id=16 or t.chain_step_id=17) then 'Consolidation started' when t.description = 'Charts calculation' and (t.chain_step_id=39 or t.chain_step_id=40) then 'Consolidation completed' --when t.description = 'Loading T_LR_BUFFER' --then 'LCR completed' when t.description = 'Prepare Reporting Process' then 'RRT started' when t.description = 'Report Workflow Inactive' then 'RRT completed' when t.description = 'Pre Fill GL Granular Results' then 'GL_RECON started' when t.description = 'Charts calculation' and t.chain_step_id=12 then 'GL_RECON completed' else null end as phase, --vs.status vss, CASE WHEN t.exec_end_date IS NOT NULL THEN floor(to_number(t.exec_end_date-t.exec_start_date)*24*60*60) WHEN t.exec_start_date IS NOT NULL THEN floor(to_number(sysdate -t.exec_start_date)*24*60*60) ELSE NULL END AS execution_secs, pack_utils.readable_duration(exec_start_date, nvl(exec_end_date,sysdate)) execution_duration, t.exec_start_date start_date, t.exec_end_date end_date, t.status_text, case when s.name is not null then substr(t.exec_machine,14,12) else null end as exec_machine, --case when --substr(nvl(c.description,'N'),0,13) in ('Daily Context') --then --t.description --else --p.description --end --as description,
s.name task_server, --vs.machine vsm, case when s.name is not null then '\\'||substr(t.exec_machine,14,12)||'\'||replace(REPLACE(t.trace_file,'/','\'),':','$') else null end as trace_file, ----t.post_date, t.post_machine, --p.name, ----t.parent_task_id parentid, t.process_id, t.chain_id, --t.post_session_id SESSIONID, T.EXEC_SESSION_ID SESSIONID, --post_session_id, --expiration_date, --t.status status, case when :APPNAME = 'ALM' then CASE WHEN c.workspace_id='1' or c.workspace_id='9' or c.workspace_id='4' THEN 'BAU - ' ||TO_CHAR(c.reporting_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') ||',Id ' ||c.context_id WHEN c.workspace_id='2' THEN 'LIQSTRESS - ' ||TO_CHAR(c.reporting_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') ||',Id ' ||c.context_id WHEN c.workspace_id='99' THEN 'HORIZON - ' ||TO_CHAR(c.reporting_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') ||',Id ' ||c.context_id WHEN c.workspace_id='11' THEN 'MAS - ' ||TO_CHAR(c.reporting_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') ||',Id ' ||c.context_id ELSE c.workspace_id ||TO_CHAR(c.reporting_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') ||',Id ' ||c.context_id END when :APPNAME = 'GT' then CASE WHEN SUBSTR(c.pk_rd_ws,9,4)='0001' THEN 'GTF_PROD - ' ||TO_CHAR(c.reporting_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') ||',Id ' ||c.context_id WHEN SUBSTR(c.pk_rd_ws,9,4)='0002' THEN 'VARIANCE - ' ||TO_CHAR(c.reporting_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') ||',Id ' ||c.context_id WHEN SUBSTR(c.pk_rd_ws,9,4)='0024' THEN 'HONGKONG - ' ||TO_CHAR(c.reporting_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') ||',Id ' ||c.context_id ELSE c.pk_rd_ws ||TO_CHAR(c.reporting_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') ||',Id ' ||c.context_id END end AS context, p.token_name, --vs.trace_file service_trace_file, :APPNAME FROM task t LEFT JOIN contexts c ON t.context_id=c.context_id LEFT JOIN server_activity sa ON t.exec_activity_id=sa.activity_id LEFT JOIN server s ON s.server_id = sa.server_id LEFT JOIN process p ON t.process_id =p.process_id WHERE t.context_id = :CONTEXTID ORDER BY task_id ASC

Select session_id,log_type,datetime,log_key,function,step,message,parameters,task_id,root_Task_id from log_table where (partition_key=:PARTITIONKEY and (:APPNAME='ALM' or :APPNAME='RAY') and task_id=:TASK_ID) or (partition_key=:PARTITIONKEY and :APPNAME='GT' and session_id=:SESSIONID) --and (task_id=:TASKID or session_id=:SESSIONID) --and task_id=:TASKID order by datetime desc

Select :DESCRIPT DESCRIPTION, l.Log_key, floor((CAST(sysdate AS DATE)-CAST(MAX(l.datetime) AS DATE))*1440) idle_min from log_table l where (partition_key=:PARTITIONKEY and (:APPNAME='ALM' or :APPNAME='RAY') and task_id=:TASK_ID) or (partition_key=:PARTITIONKEY and :APPNAME='GT' and session_id=:SESSIONID) --and (task_id=:TASKID or session_id=:SESSIONID) --and task_id=:TASKID GROUP BY :DESCRIPT, l.Log_key order by 3 desc

Select session_id, l.Log_key, floor((CAST(MAX(l.datetime) AS DATE)-CAST(min(l.datetime) AS DATE))*1440) idle_min from log_table l where (partition_key=:PARTITIONKEY and (:APPNAME='ALM' or :APPNAME='RAY') and task_id=:TASK_ID) or (partition_key=:PARTITIONKEY and :APPNAME='GT' and session_id=:SESSIONID) --and (task_id=:TASKID or session_id=:SESSIONID) --and task_id=:TASKID GROUP BY session_id, l.Log_key order by 3 desc
